Traditional Games Space Station 13

Forum | Wiki | Source Code

Join our Discord channel
Current Project Maintainers
 Recent GitHub contributors
 Thanks to: Baystation 12, /vg/station, NTstation, CDK Station devs, FacepunchStation, GoonStation devs, the original Space Station 13 developers, Invisty for the title image and the countless others who have contributed to the game, issue tracker or wiki over the years.
Have a bug to report? Visit our Issue Tracker.
 Please search first to ensure that the bug has not already been reported.

05 November 2020

Ghilker updated:

  • Hypernoblium stops reaction only from 20 K and up
  • Hypernoblium formation has been changed to be under 15 K and it requires a lot of BZ as catalyst to lower the energy released by the reaction.
  • Lowered research points amount per moles from 1000 to 30
  • Hypernobilium export price lowered to 5

Ghommie updated:

  • Ripley mechas will now display the right overlays for their armor plates.

IndieanaJones updated:

  • Networked Fiber blobs can now place down tiles with their nodes along with their cores and have the same movement effect as well.

Krysonism updated:

  • fixed a gulag stacking machine exploit that would let you farm points with minimal or no ores mined.

Skoglol updated:

  • Immovable rods should more consistently hit the station, will reset target if adminbused, and added more logs.
  • Stuffing people into crates, closets and pods works again.

XDTM updated:

  • Spreading nanite programs (Exo-locomotion and Nanite Sting) now properly transfer the infector's cloud ID to the infectee.

04 November 2020

Qustinnus updated:

  • All turfs now support transparency
  • Datum material floors and walls now support transparency
  • Glass floors are now destructible

necromanceranne updated:

  • Removes the now depreciated high-priority cargo bounty event, that does nothing.

03 November 2020

81Denton updated:

  • Added logging for handcuff attempts and renaming GPS devices

ArcaneMusic updated:

  • added damaged icons for the retro arcade flooring,
  • The Rod of Asclepius and mini-meteors now have unique inhand sprites.
  • Cargo consoles can once again accept crewmember's purchase requests.

Dennok updated:

  • CENTCOM cleaning staff remembered that it would be nice to clean hangars from remains of the catastrophed shuttles. Fixed shuttle catastrophe. Now shuttle catastrophes propertly.

Fikou updated:

  • adds kitchen tools to omnitool

Ghommie updated:

  • Assessing the impressiveness of artwork (such as painting) can now only be done through examine and takes a few seconds, just like how attack_hand (structures) and attack_self (items) used to.

IndieanaJones updated:

  • Dynamic Mode can now spawn Swarmers
  • Swarmers have received a software update, changing some of their capabilities. Nanotrasen reports a slight increase in strange objects in the neighboring sector.

InvalidArgument3 updated:

  • new Ripley movement sounds!
  • new hydraulic clamp interaction sounds!

Jared-Fogle updated:

  • The View Tracked Playtime has been updated to be made easier to read.

Krysonism updated:

  • You can now cook fried chicken.

Owai-Seek updated:

  • Garbage Bags and Paint Remover now available in service protolathe.
  • Light Replacer is now in "Equipment" tab of service protolathe.
  • Push Broom can be printed at Service Lathe

ShizCalev updated:

  • Meta's tool storage APC is now connected to the powergrid.

Skoglol updated:

  • Onetank bombs icon no longer shows a tank holder.

Timberpoes updated:

  • You can once again place hats on the heads of cyborgs in an ordinary and everyday manner, without having to throw them like you're playing a drunken party game.

TiviPlus updated:

  • Fixes mecha rotate sounds
  • makes mech silence flag instead of null based

Tlaltecuhtli updated:

  • The chemical bottler no longer clears reagents when its settings are changed.
  • Chemical bottlers can now fill reagents into dart shotgun rounds.

XDTM updated:

  • Fixes psychologists and unknown job titles being incorrectly bolded in the crew monitor UI.

actioninja updated:

  • lighting rotates properly with client.dir

cacogen updated:

  • Fixes ChemMaster not outputting pills to inserted pill bottle

necromanceranne updated:

  • Mechs no longer explode upon deletion. This was a reversion from previous mech code.
  • Fixes null rods that replace your hand being able to be placed into storage slots on accident.

nightred updated:

  • Meta now has more access to great coffee products and coffee accessories, we all need more latte's and maccha's, and cold brews in our lives.
  • Moved mule bots to the cargo storage
  • Moved all the tools in to the smallest room in the area, it is a mess
  • Fly people will not become full on eating that vomit
  • Vomiting now removes reagents properly

02 November 2020

Inept updated:

  • the pettiest errata ever in the chisel description

Rohesie updated:

  • The infinite table stacking exploit is fixed. One table per turf allowed only.

cacogen updated:

  • StartProcessingAtom() uses drop_location() instead of get_turf(src)

01 November 2020

EOBGames updated:

  • pea soup now requires a bowl, and obeys the laws of conservation of kitchenware

Inept updated:

  • a few wee issues on Delta

Skoglol updated:

  • Vampire blood level status no longer has excess spans.

XDTM updated:

  • Fixed nanite comm remotes not working at all.

cacogen updated:

  • Lifeform stasis units have all lowercase names now

31 October 2020

Krysonism updated:

  • Added 3 new types of fancy carpets.
  • A crate of decorative items now sometimes spawns in maintenance.

Rohesie updated:

  • Fixed an issue preventing afterattacks from happening, which broke regenerative crossbreeds, fulton packs and other interactions.

necromanceranne updated:

  • Ridden vehicles always pass any object that would normally pass through tables, such as thrown weapons and bullets.
  • Makes ridden objects more consistent with what causes you to fall off if they require hand availability, checking for the incapacitation traits.

30 October 2020

LemonInTheDark updated:

  • Stripping is logged just a bit better

Timberpoes updated:

  • Fixed various shapeshifting runtimes that would affect vampries in bat form and players in ash drake from in particular.
  • Interactions with mobs in shapeshifted form and the Wabbajack force-tranformation effects (including the Staff of Change) should now make more sense and not leave behind random corpses.

VexingRaven updated:

  • Assistants no longer spawn in the chapel on Pubby

cacogen updated:

  • Settings, Ghost and Sound menus on menu bar at top are correctly capitalised now
  • Slicing food in your hand (e.g. pizza) no longer results in it "disappearing" (i.e. having the slices created inside you)

necromanceranne updated:

  • Roboticist unique labcoat! Because you're worth it! Aesthetics!
  • All other labcoats no longer utilize the oldest labcoat sprites we have for their icons!
  • The virologist labcoat no longer lies about being more resistant to biological effects! Not that bio armor does anything in the first place.
  • Some stuff that could be worn in the suit storage slot no longer shows pink! Hooray!

tralezab updated:

  • Blind messages for gunpointing and tackling are fixed

29 October 2020

Ghommie updated:

  • The reactive teleport armor will now actually teleport the owner instead of forcemoving them to the picked turf. Expect some slight changes to the item's behaviour as result.

Megarop updated:

  • Sweet pea donuts no longer cause a giant "error" sign to appear when you put them in a donut box.

Skoglol updated:

  • Removed changeling team objectives and hivemind chat channel. Now a pure solo antagonist, use pheromone receptors if you insist on teaming up.

Stewydeadmike#0068, Ghilker updated:

  • new crystal invasion mob sprites
  • old crystal invasion mob sprites

tralezab updated:

  • Capitalism (golem) and Communism (golem) are dead.

28 October 2020

Denton updated:

  • Fixed the Pubby toxins mass driver door toggle button.
  • Replaced var edited mass driver machinery with proper subtypes.

Gamer025 and ATHATH updated:

  • Refunding Lesser Summon Guns or Arcane Barrage as a wizard will now remove any instances of that spell's associated kind of projectile weapon from your inventory.
  • Non-cultists who try to fire a blood bolt from a Blood Barrage "spell"'s hand will be in for a nasty surprise.

Kylerace updated:

  • holodecks now have one less way of producing infinite cloth

Ryll/Shaps updated:

  • Fixed another issue with persistent dismemberment scars

TheChosenEvilOne updated:

  • You can now change piping layers on the RPD by scrolling with the mouse wheel.

Timberpoes updated:

  • Mobs that are in stasis now have a new visual effect.

YPOQ updated:

  • Fixed an issue that prevented split personalities from switching control.

Yenwodyah updated:

  • A few bounties that accepted/refused the wrong items will now accept/refuse the right ones.

skoglol updated:

  • Removed a duplicate table and holopad from MetaStation

26 October 2020

ArcaneMusic updated:

  • The off sprites of the new stasis bed look correctly turned off.

Azarak updated:

  • Broken light fixtures will now spark much less often
  • Added functional directional lighting. You can notice them with flashlights, hardsuit lamps, hardhats and the likes.
  • Made the static light system respect the light_on variable

Dennok updated:

  • Double evacuation fixed.

Denton updated:

  • Alien resin floors can no spread to cover up Z level transitions like stairs.
  • Added a large toner pack to cargo - six cartridges for 3000 credits.
  • Increased the capacity of large toner cartridges from 15 to 25. This should make decal/airlock painting less frustrating.
  • Added a missing bucket for the Icebox hermit ghost role.

Fikou updated:

  • adds alternate medborg sprites

Jared-Fogle updated:

  • Runechat messages will now also display the icon.

LemonInTheDark updated:

  • All pixel scaling prefs properly save now.

MadMedicineMan updated:

  • Canisters now display correct max. pressure

Mickyan updated:

  • Removed grab shortcut for shoe stealing, use the strip menu for your shoe stealing needs

Ryll/Shaps updated:

  • The Photographer quirk is now neutral and does not cost a quirk point to take. It also no longer allows you to take photos 50% quicker.

SmArtKar updated:

  • Megafauna once again gibs immortal miners

The0bserver, Stewydeadmike, and TripleZeta updated:

  • Adds 3 new plants, and 6 new recipes ,as well as a juice reagent. Check out your local Megaseed Vendor today!

Timberpoes updated:

  • Pacifists can now taunt secbots such as Beepsky. Secbots absolutely loathe pacifist scumbags and will chase down any pacifist who taunts them, informing security in the process.

bobbahbrown updated:

  • Added the interview system, a 'soft' panic bunker which lets players who would normally be blocked from joining be interviewed by admins to be selectively allowed to play.

dragomagol updated:

  • Meta and Delta EVA shutters and windoors can be accessed using EVA access

sergeirocks100 updated:

  • Adds fingerless insulated gloves as a Assistant heirloom item.

zxaber updated:

  • AI combat and surveillance upgrades work properly again.
  • Mech pilots can once again open doors they have access to without exiting their mech.
  • Upgrading a MK-I Ripley to MK-II no longer deletes the equipment, and will now match the same percentage integrity that the MK-I had before the upgrade.
  • Ripleys no longer spawn with ore boxes. Go raid the mining outpost if you really need one.

25 October 2020

ArcaneMusic updated:

  • The Stasis beds on station have been given a bold, moderné new design.

Capsandi updated:

  • HoS and Captain Laserguns are now normal sized.

    • Timberpoes updated:

  • New Status Panel!

    • 26 June 2020

    Arkatos updated:

    • Portable Turret now uses tgui.

    Ryll/Shaps updated:

    • Nanotrasen now uses smaller fonts on ID's to show age and account information, requiring a closer look to read

    ShizCalev updated:

    • Fixed revenant's light overload ability not blowing lights in a square if there was another broken/burnt out/empty light in it.
    • Fixed showing a piece of paper to a camera not working if there was an AI that had died or has remote access disabled.
    • Bank cards will now still give you notifications if you're standing next to another player who has them disabled.
    • Fixed bronze golems' gong ability not working if there was a dead mob on screen.
    • Fixed bone golems' bonechill ability not working if there was any mobs that were undead, resistant to cold, or also golems on screen.
    • Fixed a scenario where you would be unable to offer someone an item if you already had a pending item offer with someone else standing near you.

    WarlockD updated:

    • Suit cell charge on stat panel
    • Suit cell gauge works now

    coiax updated:

    • The Nanite Host Scan program can now scan the host for wounds.

    sergeirocks100 updated:

    • Malt Liquor can now be obtained from your local Booze-O-Mat

    25 June 2020

    ATHATH updated:

    • The tox purging threshold for livers has been changed from 3u to 3u * [liver's health]/[liver's maximum health].

    EdgeLordExe updated:

    • Otherwordly presence has taken more control over the holes in reality.
    • Influences now actually spawn randomly on the station.

    Jared-Fogle updated:

    • The search bar will now automatically focus when you open up the orbit menu, the uplink, the biogenerator, and the camera console.

    Melbert updated:

    • Allows the HONK Oingo-Boingo Punch-Face to toggle between lethal and non-lethal modes.
    • The HONK Oingo-Boingo Punch-Face's throw distance now scales on how much damage it deals. By default, it's the same distance as before.
    • Pacifists can no longer use the HONK Oingo-Boingo Punch-Face to damage people.
    • Admins can now edit the damage of the HONK Oingo-Boingo Punch-Face. Honk.

    WarlockD updated:

    • You can open paper ui with double shift click

    dearmochi updated:

    • Fix thrown bolas (and other items) bypassing weapon/shield blocking

    24 June 2020

    ArcaneMusic updated:

    • Sentient regal and regular rats can now eat cheese wedges to recover a small amount of health.

    Arkatos updated:

    • Turret Control Panel now uses tgui.

    Caldony updated:

    • fixed a bug with the battle arcade game where the combos would sometimes not register correctly.

    EdgeLordExe updated:

    • Wizard can no longer mindswap into a statue to become neigh invicible, fire throwing bastard.
    • Wizard can no longer mindswap into laughter or slaughter demons to gain a free jaunt and an unlimited heals for killing people. You know one thing that wizard is good at...

    LemonInTheDark updated:

    • Nitryl decomposition reaction: requires oxygen as a catalyst, under 600k, make sure to breathe nitryl with pluoxium
    • Nitryl no longer causes burns when breathed, but will cause lung damage proportional to the amount you are breathing at a rate proportional to the amount you are breathing when it makes up more than 10% of your breath.
    • Nitryl may cause burping

    Denton updated:

    • Removed a duplicate chair on Metastation.

    Fikou updated:

    • alien alloy now makes abductor walls
    • gives heads eva access and lowpop teleporter access

    Mickyan updated:

    • Added a visible effect to giving the best hugs while using the friendly quirk. Aww!

    dragomagol updated:

    • Added vox announcements to individual say logs

    24 October 2020

    Ryll/Shaps updated:

    • You can now high-five your fellow crewmembers! Simply have a slapper in hand (emote *slap), walk up to someone, and press the "offer item" key (default G) to offer them a high-five! Show off how well you and your crew vibe today!

    23 October 2020

    ArcaneMusic updated:

    • Completing a bounty now rewards a hardlight, bounty cube that must be exported for your payout.
    • Cargo no longer has static, roundstart bounties.
    • In addition, the Bounty App and Bounty Console have been removed.
    • Civilian bounties have a higher payout now, but require larger quantities of their target object, as before.
    • Cargo Tech, QM, and HOP bounties are now fully random bounties, as opposed to assistant bounties.

    Azarak updated:

    • Runechat messages now won't be obstructed by darkness or lighting, or other effects
    • Flashlights now make a sound whenever they're toggled on or off
    • fixed dynamic lighting not counting for things such as emote visibility

    Gandalf2k15 updated:

    • Vended items now go straight into your hand.

    Kylerace updated:

    • dressers are allowed to cease existing without needless littering

    Ryll/Shaps updated:

    • Felinids can no longer contract heart attacks and appendicitis from licking the wounds of the injured.

    Timberpoes updated:

    • Shapeshifting code will no longer runtime when attempting to cast a shapeshift spell. In particular, this now enables Vampires to bat themselves up once again just in time for Halloween.

    Time-Green updated:

    • Plungers can now change plumbing machinery layers. Simply use it in-hand once and then alt-click the plunger to select a layer.

    actioninja updated:

    • A button to quickly fix chat if it fails to initialize in the actual output.
    • Fix chat should actually fix chat.

    22 October 2020

    Ghilker updated:

    • Crystal invasion triggers only between 4500 and 5000 MeV

    Timberpoes updated:

    • Motorized wheelchairs now work again.
    • Cuffs no longer prevent all actions that require a progress bar to complete. This includes cuffs preventing you from resisting out of cuffs (yikers!) and cuffs preventing you from standing up after resting.
    • Container contents, including storage boxes and backpacks, can once again be dumped onto the floor.

    alphanerdd updated:

    • Adds lasagna as a food item, including a craftable recipe and sprite.

    carshalash updated:

    • New Alcohol Amaretto and various cocktails

    tralezab updated:

    • Updates pride hammer sprites!

    21 October 2020

    Azarak updated:

    • Bots have now slightly less respect for authority bots
    • PDA now has sounds for interacting with it, aswell as inserting or ejecting items, such as the ID

    EdgeLordExe updated:

    • Adds support to anonimizing radios
    • Chapel confession intercom now anonimizes the speaker.

    Fikou updated:

    • replaces instances of NanoTrasen with Nanotrasen

    Jared-Fogle updated:

    • AIs can now flip again.

    LemonInTheDark updated:

    • The sentient disease status panel is no longer a 1x1 line of letters, and works properly again.

    NamelessFairy updated:

    • Gold walls actually have icons now

    Qustinnus updated:

    • Improves fall-off code and moves away from byond's inbuilt falloff as much as possible.

    SmArtKar updated:

  • Supply Consoles and Express Supply Consoles will once again be built pre-emagged if their boards used to build them are emagged.
  • Supply Consoles will now once again allow Cargonia to buy contraband when their circuit boards are appropriately configured with a multitool.
  • Dronespeak manual on KS13 is once again infinite use, and can once again only be used on drones or silicons.
  • Hilbert's Hotel Bag of Holding has been replaced with a raw bluespace anomaly core and inert bag of holding. For flavour.
  • Self-recharging basic yellow slime cores have been removed.
  • Self-recharging hypercharged yellow slime cores are no longer self-recharging. They are now a high capacity cell choice. Their capacity is above Bluespace Cells but they recharge slower than ordinary cells.
  • Motorised wheelchairs now use SIGNIFICANTLY less power and should last around 20 times as long before they run out of charge.
  • Removes a redundant check in fire code

    • Maurukas updated:

    • Boxstation and Icebox medbays have been completely reworked

    ShizCalev updated:

    • Fixed the backpack setting showing up twice in the preferences window.
    • Chameleon ties can no longer disguise as skill capes.
    • The SM will no longer pull mobs not affected by gravity.

    TemporalOroboros updated:

    • Synthflesh works again.

    Timberpoes updated:

    • DNA Console will no longer bluescreen in certain scenarios when disks are ejected.

    WarlockD updated:

    • allows the air alarm to let vents suck are as well as pressurize.

    tmtmtl30 updated:

    • stopped midround dynamic families ruleset from picking mindshielded starting family members

    23 June 2020

    Kathy Ryals updated:

    • Fixed Box wires and pipes near R&D, as well as the door that got deleted.

    LemonInTheDark updated:

    • Fixed stealth implants not properly boxing the user, and doors not shocking
    • Renamed COOLDOWN_CHECK to COOLDOWN_FINISHED
    • Removed some old unused clockcult status effects

    LemonInTheDark, Heather Shadelight updated:

    • Changed some portal sprites, hope ya like em :)

    Paxilmaniac updated:

    • PP-95 smg and it's magazine
    • replaced mosin with pp-95 in the nuke op uplink

    ShizCalev updated:

    • Fixed logging / admin message coordinate handling for items being held by mobs / in containers / in containers inside other containers giving nullspace / 0,0,0 location references.

    Timberpoes updated:

    • Belts in Delta EVA and the Ashwalker Ruins no longer show up as ERRORs.
    • Science are now able to print DNA Scanner boards. Boards associated with Genetics are now only printable in Science and have been removed from Medical printers.

    bobbahbrown updated:

    • Removed exploitable world/topic command server_hop

    silicons updated:

    • onZImpact no longer does throw_impact. This was broken anyways. Code must now manually handle multiz falling impacts. This fixes runtimes occuring whenever something fell.

    zxaber updated:

    • Nuke Ops (and Lone Ops) now start with a Syndicate-themed tablet, rather than the pinpointer. The Syndicate tablet comes pre-installed with an app that replaces the function of disk pinpointers.
    • Lifeline and Fission360, the apps that track suit sensors and nuke disks respectively, now show the tracking status on the screen of the tablet/laptop object itself, without needing to keep the window open.

    22 June 2020

    EdgeLordExe updated:

    • You can no longer raise the living as ghouls.
    • Mansus grasp and blood siphon no longer have infinite range.
    • Armsy can now actually attack with any of his bodyparts. fix:Armsy can now acutally walk in space.
    • replaced a few type paths with more descriptive ones.

    Gamer025 updated:

    • Blood drunk miner megafauna can no longer move structures like bolted down doors / windows

    Kathy Ryals updated:

    • Due to some very convincing paramedics, the medidrobe has been updated to include the paramedic jumpsuit and jumpskirt.

    Melbert updated:

    • Obsession picture objective no longer needs the obsessed themselves to be in the picture.
    • Obsession picture objective now works properly.

    TemporalOroboros updated:

    • Reagent exposure proc names now accurately describe their function.
    • Reagent exposure code is less `istype` dependent.

    WarlockD updated:

    • Preview works now
    • Clicking on "save" now previews correctly
    • Form fields now sized correctly
    • Form fields now save the data

    21 June 2020

    Jared-Fogle updated:

    • Pointing will now animate starting from you to the object you pointed at.

    20 June 2020

    Caldony updated:

    • NT finally decided to update the arcade battle video game after its terrible space game reviews from syndicate gaming.

    LemonInTheDark updated:

    • Fixed a "Feature" from 2 years ago. The sm will now pull objects closer to it based on the eer. This includes you, so be careful.
    • I've documented all of the sms variables.
    • Refactored sm code to be more modular. Badmins do not rejoice!

    19 June 2020

    Kathy Ryals updated:

    • The plant analyzer has been updated to be able to analyze a Podman health or chemical contents.

    LemonInTheDark updated:

    • The singularity will no longer turn snow or ice on icebox into lattices when at stage 5

    Ryll/Shaps updated:

    • Added new icons for ORM and mining vendors
    • Added new icons for mining and genetic scanners
    • Fixed xenomorphs being able to pick up items through /give()

    TheChosenEvilOne updated:

    • Forced dynamic rulesets no longer ignore configurations.
    • Moved dynamic forced midround/latejoin ruleset execution buttons from game panel to game mode panel.

    TheVekter updated:

    • It is no longer possible to rupture someone's eardrums by spam clicking on the Jukebox's music selection while the cooldown is active.

    TiviPlus updated:

    • fixed a few mech bugs
    • Moved mecha gun logging to attacklog instead of mechalog

    zxaber updated:

  • Tank holders have been added. You can craft them using metal rods.
  • Empaths are able to detect deafness derived from hearing damage
  • Inacusiate and Sensory Restoration no longer instantly heal all hearing damage when applied, instead rapidly removing both ear damage and deafness.
  • MedHUDs and observers now display quirks as intended on examine
  • Nanotrasen's Central Shipping department has put limits on the free shipping it offers on goody crates, to discourage abuse of its bluespace packaging

    • SteelSlayer updated:

    • Removed a handful of unnecessary variables from intercoms.
    • Refactored intercom's code so that it doesn't need to process() and constantly check whether it's powered or EMP'd every few seconds.

    WarlockD updated:

    • Cyborgs can now use multi layer cable interface

    genessee596 updated:

    • Malf AIs no longer fail their survive objective if piloting a shell when the round ends.

    19 October 2020

    Fikou updated:

    • removes hexane
    • fixes halon's speed thing being removed by consuming tiny amounts of hexane

    Ghilker updated:

    • lower amount of lavaland bz/miasma
    • lower amount of icemoon miasma

    Ghommie updated:

    • SSeconomy/var/bank_accounts is now an association list of account identifiers and datums and also was renamed to bank_accounts_by_id.

    JohnFulpWillard updated:

    • Flypeople can now get wounds

    Ryll/Shaps updated:

    • As a changeling, you can no longer readapt your mutations while in fakedeath stasis, which would cause you to stay in sleepies forever

    TheChosenEvilOne updated:

    • Dynamic midround traitor triggered by roundstart traitor ruleset no longer ignores protected roles.

    TiviPlus updated:

    • Cleaned up vehicle code

    farie82 updated:

    • The animal progress bar in the DNA vault UI now actually shows the progress

    necromanceranne updated:

    • Fixed shuttles docking in the wrong spot when hijacked successfully.

    spessbro updated:

    • Changes monkeypowder's behavior in carbons

    18 October 2020

    Timberpoes updated:

    • Silver soldification is now possible with 20u silver reagent and 10u carbon reagent, heated to 630 Kelvin.

    nightred updated:

    • Fixed check in rags preventing smothering.

    zxaber updated:

    • You can now use the Activate Held Object and Drop Object hotkeys (default Z and Q, respectively) to activate arm-implanted tools and put objects away. You must have the hand free before you can activate it this way.
    • Arm implant tools are no longer no-drop, and instead simply snap back if they get dropped. Don't sweat it, if you slip just press Z again.

    17 October 2020

    EdgeLordExe updated:

    • Silicons can't see pierced realities or transmutation runes anymore.
    • You can no longer cheese influences by alt clicking on tiles.

    Ghilker updated:

    • hexane no longer grand you dchat hearing
    • hexane makes you heat resistant (can still die due to pressure)
    • Hexane no longer deals brain damage

    MrDoomBringer updated:

    • Nanotrasen has replaced the broken target stakes with a new model.
    • Training toolboxes have been added! Harmless, but useful for practicing your clicking skills and bugging your crewmembers at the same time.

    Timberpoes updated:

    • Shuttle navigation computers can no longer switch to z-levels the shuttle is not present on.
    • The Hilbert's orb Hotel can no longer be used via telekinesis, requires adjacency to teleport, will not teleport while incapacitated, requires you to have the item in your possession to teleport yourself and others and has new unforeseen consequences for attempting to transport the item into one of its own hotel rooms.

    Yenwodyah updated:

    • Borgs take slightly longer to load people from adjacent tiles but can load people instantly from the same tile

    16 October 2020

    EdgeLordExe updated:

    • Heretics can no longer get dagd and hijack at the same time.
    • Protection objective now works as it should.

    Qustinnus updated:

    • Timers wont kamikaze anymore removesound: normal computers no longer have looping audio

    ShizCalev updated:

    • Fixed a lot of animal masks not counting as small objects.
    • Fixed horse / pig / cow masks not being counter as face coverings in mask checks.
    • Fixed a consistency issue where picking up some cursed masks and equipping it wasn't sending the playing a message that the mask was cursed.
    • Fixed a minor inconsistency between the descriptions of cursed masks.
    • Fixed cow masks not fully covering a player's head in certain directions.
    • Admins are now able to varedit an animal masks' cursed var to change if it's cursed or not!
    • Admins can now change the phrases that cursed masks say.
    • Admins can now enable and disable a mask's speech effects by editing it's modifies_speech variable.
    • Added more animal masks to the pool for wizard mask spells!

    Timberpoes updated:

    • Delta time probability code improved. This should stop the socially anxious from eternally stuttering when nobody is around. It may also impact laser pointer recharge times which could potentially have suffered or benefitted from a similar issue.

    Tlaltecuhtli updated:

    • ageusia works

    15 October 2020

    ArcaneMusic updated:

    • Added the Nanotrasen Internal Requisition Network (NIRN) modular computer app, for heads of staff to download.
    • Use NIRN to order departmentally-related cargo crates using your department's budget funds, without all the hassle!

    Dennok updated:

    • tweaked some shuttle code
    • fixed lavaland podding

    EdgeLordExe updated:

    • fixes heretic mass deletion during transmutation bug.

    IndieanaJones updated:

    • Abductor spawns in Dynamic actually function now
    • Paystands have visible feedback after for payment, making them usable if your id card is muted
    • lowered default volume for musical instruments

    Skoglol updated:

    • Cleaned up roundend report somewhat.
    • TCG brand trading cards now show their rarity on the card, with tiers of rarity attached to a background color on the 'N' box on the bottom right corner.

    18 June 2020

    ATHATH updated:

    • pAIs no longer start with a medHUD, secHUD, and diagHUD turned on as soon as they're downloaded, even if they haven't bought any HUDs yet.
    • You can now take obligate carnivory grafts from jupiter cups.
    • You can now take fire resistance grafts from lavaland plants.

    Iamgoofball updated:

    • Gangsters are, in fact, antags, and can totally kill, destroy, and murder all they want.
    • Fixes GARBAGE DAY
    • Dynamic Families now goes from 30 to 15 minutes, instead of 60 to 30 minutes.
    • Space Cop Objectives have been changed in Families.

    ShizCalev updated:

    • Fixed a scenario that allowed infinite resource generation via ore machines.
    • Swarmers can no longer cut power lines by deconstructing catwalks underneath them.
    • Corrected a minor grammar error when attacking mobs with sharp stuff.
    • Clothing repair now works.
    • Fixed redundant "shredded x fell apart, completely shredded!" message when damaging clothing in your hands.
    • Added better pronoun handling for clothing that consist of a pair of items (ie shoes, gloves, ect)
    • Shredding clothing while holding it will no longer make you drop it.
    • Shredding clothing while holding it will no longer tell you that it fell off you.
    • Moths can no longer infinitely eat shredded clothing.
    • Tears in the very fabric of reality created by Eldritch gods can no longer be mended with acid, fire, and TK.

    TheSpaghetti updated:

    • orang

    Timberpoes updated:

    • Added scroll bar to ghost Orbit target selection menu.

    Tlaltecuhtli updated:

    • organ transport box, if filled with cryostylene or ice it ll keep organs and bodyparts like heads inside frozen ( they dont decay)

    WarlockD updated:

    • Added markdown for paper

    tralezab updated:

    • heretics raising the living into ghouls

    17 June 2020

    EdgeLordExe updated:

    • Having Codex Cicatrix in a pocket while sacrificing someone will give you charges now.

    Firecage updated:

    • Clown cars are now unable to be driven over ice chasms.

    LoserWasTaken updated:

    • ooc no longer checks if message is ic if round hasn't started

    Melbert updated:

    • Fixed staff of animation being able to spawn animated objects inside containers (ie bags)

    Mickyan updated:

    • fixed missing icon appearing while wearing wigs, again!
    • wigs will once again change inventory icon based on hairstyle

    TheChosenEvilOne updated:

    • Cyborgs can now interact with the communications console just like the AI.
    • Silicons are no longer given the option to recall. It didn't work in the first place, but now it gives a clear message.
    • The allied sectors list now properly goes down, rather than horizontal.

    Krysonism updated:

    • Removed silver from the chemical dispenser and synthesizer.

    necromanceranne updated:

    • Adds an emergency shuttle console to the BYO Shuttle.
    • Fixes bolt action guns having a mysterious additional bullet chambered upon initialization.

    raffclar updated:

    • Monkeys will once again show missing limbs

    silicons updated:

    • Shuttle hijacking has been completely reworked.
    • To hijack the shuttle, you must Alt-Click the emergency shuttle console (the one you emag) to begin the hijack process after a timed delay. You must be hijack capable to do this.
    • Each successful hack attempt (with a time based on antag role and whether or not you have the hijack objective) will push the hijack stage one step, up to 5.
    • After five successful hack attempts, the shuttle will be redirected.
    • The antagonists who can hijack include: traitor, blood brothers, wizard, nuke ops, highlanders, wizards, changelings and heretics.
    • Preserves the old hijack as the new 'Elimination' objective. Nobody but highlanders have this, and their version accounts for only their solo hijacking.

    14 October 2020

    CaptainZorg updated:

    • Fancier on-mob antenna sprites for antenna and mind reader mutations

    Couls updated:

    • some more unused devil code

    IndieanaJones updated:

    • Dynamic mode can now spawn Abductors

    Jared-Fogle updated:

    • The communications console has received a face lift.
    • Fixed improper radio names.

    LemonInTheDark updated:

    • The panic bunker now supports living time, set it to 100000000 minutes today!

    Rohesie updated:

    • Getting up from the ground is steamlined. Instead of going up instantly after a stun and taking 2 seconds if you had rested, you take 1 second on both conditions but you can do so while moving without interrupting it. Shove stuns have been modified accordingly in light of this.

    Ryll/Shaps updated:

    • Temporal Scarring now has separate scar slots for each of your character slots, meaning scars saved to Character 1 will no longer be loaded by Character 2.
    • Changelings now save the scars someone has when DNA stinging them, and will recreate those scars when using that disguise. These fake scars are removed when the disguise is changed or dropped, though real scars that the Changeling has suffered will remain through disguises and still need to be removed via fleshmend or carpotoxin

    VexingRaven updated:

    • It is now possible to use item actions (internals!) while laying down
    • Being buckled to something no longer prevents using item actions

    Yenwodyah updated:

    • You can buckle people to guillotines again

    actioninja updated:

    • Increased photocopier accuracy

    dragomagol updated:

    • fixed main cargo doors to include mining access

    • A sprite for the pride hammer in-hand.
    • New inhands for the moonlight greatsword and extradimensional sword.

    02 October 2020

    ATHATH updated:

    • Morphs no longer have to wait 5 seconds between disguising themselves and undisguising themselves (or vice versa).
    • Because they don't have to drag around a heavy body made of runed metal, shades now move faster than the other cult constructs.
    • The "Avoid killing in plain sight." and "Hinder the crew while attempting to avoid being noticed." revenant objectives have been replaced with new, (hopefully) better ones.

    ArcaneDefence updated:

    • Synthmeat works for burgers again, and colored burgers are colored once more.
    • The markings on mothpeople will not show over missing or augmented limbs any more.

    ArcaneDefence updated:

    • Species without blood won't spawn with a vestigial heart any more

    ArcaneMusic updated:

    Couls updated:

    • You can slap people by aiming at the mouth with disarm intent

    • ammonia crystals

    • all three gas crystal_production
    • proto_nitrate_plasma_response

    IndieanaJones updated:

    • Reports indicate that space dragons now come in a variety of colors akin to space carps. Due to this, our researchers have started giving them names to distinct them from one another.
    • Space dragons now vomit up anything living inside them, preventing changelings and blob zombies from killing them from the inside.
    • Carp rifts now move around every so often when fully charged, making it harder to simply box them in.
    • Random space dragons are now as common as random blobs.

    Jared-Fogle updated:

    • Teleporter machinery now auto links with each other. This makes the old screwdriver + wirecutter interaction redundant, so it has been removed.

    Kathy Ryals updated:

    • Nanotrasen has recently hired a new clothing company to design some stylish, science-themed beret ! The Research Director is provided with a free sample in his locker, and three more are available in your nearest Sci-Drobe !

    • Nanotrasen has begun producing Peacekeeper plushes to improve public reception of silicons

    13 June 2020

    ATHATH updated:

    • The message that you receive when you try to use a gang induction package as a mindshielded person no longer implies that your mindshield has given you fake memories of attending an anti-gang seminar.

    Arkatos updated:

    • Theoretical radiuses will now show properly in the Tachyon-Doppler Array UI.

    Ryll/Shaps updated:

    • Medbot interaction menus are fixed
    • You can no longer queue multiple medbot flips at once
    • Medbots now have lots more to say, especially if you knock them over!

    • Balanced access to portable turrets, now requiring Security access instead of Brig access.

    ShizCalev updated:

    • Fixed a scenario where camouflage items would have missing textures.
    • Items in your suit storage should have less missing textures now.

    12 June 2020

    ATHATH updated:

    • Borgs and AIs now start with their borgHUDs/siliconHUDs on by default.

    Orange man actually looked at the runtimes, Willox, Inept-At-Job figured out the symptoms, Kylerace owned a map editor, ActionNinja figured out why it was broken, and LemonInTheDark did a one line change updated:

    • Fixes a memory leak, there's a good chance that it's the same one that killed kilo.

    Owai-Seek updated:

    • Serving Trays can now hold things again.

    PolishUser updated:

    • HoS and Captain Laserguns are now normal sized.

    TemporalOroboros updated:

    • Makes plasteel/plastitanium and a few other alloys actual materials.
    • Ghosts will now be revealed when the round is over.

    Ryll/Shaps updated:

    • Introduces medical wounds, new injuries that can happen to fleshy carbons when they sustain lots of damage on a bodypart. There's quite a lot of change here, but you can read the guide at: https://tgstation13.org/wiki/Guide_to_wounds and an extended changelog is available here: https://hackmd.io/l_FI9b3tSqa_woDadewJXA
    • Introduces scars and temporal scarring! Healing a wound leaves a scar behind that can be seen by examining someone twice rapidly, and if Temporal Scarring is enabled in character prefs, surviving a round with scars will save them to be granted at roundstart another round! Let your body tell stories!
    • Bleeding is now fully bodypart-focused, and 95% of bleeding comes from cut wounds from sharp weapons. Gauze is applied on a limb-by-limb basis, and helps staunch bloodflow rather than totally stop it. Notably, you no longer bleed just from having 40+ brute damage on a limb.
    • Organic bodyparts are no longer disabled at maximum damage, but are easier to cause wounds to
    • O2 medkits in emergency lockers have been replaced with new emergency medkits with basic tools for diagnosing and treating wounds and basic damage
    • Herapin now rapidly increases bleeding on all open cuts, rather than causing bleeding by itself. The more cuts on the target, the more it will affect them.
    • Neckgrab table slams now hit the targeted limb rather than just the head, with a large chance to dislocate or break a bone
    • Sharp weapons and burning weapons can now shred zones on jumpsuits, disabling protection on that limb. Damaged clothes can be repaired with cloth.
    • Slaughter demons now deal less raw damage, but gain the ability to cause cut wounds, which becomes more powerful with each attack on a humanoid but resets when bloodcrawling.

    Timberpoes updated:

    • Even more dark omens can befall anyone unlucky enough to get a cursed coupon...
    • Admins can now smite players with Bad Luck to make them rather accident prone.
    • Using mecha drills to turn living things into not living piles of gibs will no longer prevent you from doing surgery for the rest of the round.
    • Null rods will no longer banish themselves into the nether realms (never to be seen again) when you select a new null rod skin while your active hand contains anything but the null rod.
    • Latejoin chaplains should no longer have invisible bibles in certain circumstances.
    • Crafting recipes that require both bottles and reagents now craft properly when the bottle contains the reagent, without duplicating items.
    • Crafting that consumes items that have some sort of inventory should now dump the inventory contents out instead of deleting them.

    VexingRaven updated:

    • Nanotrasen has performed repairs on the escape pod navigation computers and they will once again dock at the CentComm recovery ship in the unlikely event of an evacuation.

    necromanceranne updated:

    • Moves the marisa robe back sprite one pixel to the left.

    qustinnus updated:

    • sodium chloride is now called salt

    09 October 2020

    ATH1909 updated:

    • The Disco Inferno emergency escape shuttle is back, but it's admin-only now.

    ArcaneMusic updated:

    • Science has been given a more experimentally themed set of bounties.
    • Much of the old science bounties were discontinued.
    • ...As have the glass shard and cheese honker assistant bounties.
    • Jerry the cat is now his own subtype, and cannot catch Tom the Mouse.
    • Regal rats can now heal off of cheese wheels as well as more royal cheese.
    • Royal rats can now occasionally appear during the mouse migration event.
    • Rats, when killed, spawn dead rat items that can be eaten or cooked, like dead mice..
    • Rats and mice now interact with mousetraps, albeit differently than mice do.

    Couls updated:

    • adminhelping no longer removes entire admin tab
    • end of round no longer removes entire admin tab
    • Delta's Genetics Lab has been redesigned.
    • Pubby's Genetics Lab has been redesigned.
    • Science ID Card access levels have been redesigned. R&D now has its own dedicated access level with Toxins and Toxins Storage having their own dedicated access levels.
    • Science doors across all maps have had their access levels tweaked, especially around maintenance access and R&D access.
    • Geneticists now have R&D Access across all maps.
    • Xenobiology's Winter Coats now have a new set of pockets that can hold all the same equipment as a lab coat.
    • All Xenobiology secure containment areas there were missing them, now have Connector/Injector pairs for injecting gasses directly into secure containment.
    • Pubby's Xenobiology lab now has three slime spawns.
    • Pubby's Xenobiology lab has been expanded with addtional containment pens.
    • Meta's Xenobiology freezer no longer shares a pipe with Xenobio's air distribution pipes. Scientists should no longer freeze to death and space suits with internals are no longer necessary.
    • Delta's Xenobiology lab now requires Xenobiology access to enter.
    • Delta's Xenobiology lab has been expanded with additional containment pens.
    • Pubby's Toxins Mass Driver room now has an intercom.
    • Delta's Toxins Mass Driver room's intercom has been moved closer to the Tachyon-Doppler Research Array.
    • Prototype Hardsuits have been moved to the RD's Office on from Toxins on Meta and Pubby.
    • All Genetics Labs across all station now come fully equipped with Body Bags, Space Cleaner and Mutadone.
    • Box's Genetics Lab now has an air alarm.
    • Meta's Genetics Lab's camera has been moved so the AI can see the entire lab, including the Air Alarm.
    • Geneticists will no longer spawn in the monkey pen on Meta.
    • The Medical Laptop in Delta's Genetics lab can now be accessed by Geneticists.
    • Pubby's Robotics Lab now has a Cautery!
    • Probably more minor quality of life changes I forgot to document as I made them.

    • Reverse wrench mode upgrade to the RPD. Attention, due to budget cuts, the mode is hard linked to the destroy mode control button.
    • replace button to shuttle panel, load button now only load new shuttle

    • Shuttle loader no more lost big shuttles.

    ATHATH updated:

    • The in-game podcloning guide (The Human Harvest: From Seed to Market) has been updated.

    • Holopad now uses tgui.

    Cobby updated:

    • craftable medbots now only heal brute unless they are built with specialized medkits.
    • medbots built with the brute medkit heal 10% more
    • medbots built with the advance medkit heal all damage types

    Fox McCloud updated:

    • Fixes attack animations being stuttery and twitchy; they should, once again, be buttery smooth

    GoldenAlpharex updated:

    • Statues can be rotated by alt clicking, if unanchored

    MrDoomBringer updated:

    • The orbit menu now has an Auto-Observe button! No more sifting through the lame observe menu to snoop in people's backpacks! Also, you can refresh the orbit menu now.

    Owai-Seek updated:

    • Vendor refills in cargo are now in their own tab.

    PKPenguin321 updated:

    • Blind people can't read wound scanner output
    • Iron falsewalls are no longer invisible.

    Putnam3145 updated:

    • Pluoxium generation is back to normal.

    Qustinnus updated:

    • Uranium material gives less radioactivity per unit
    • Sheets now have more material effects
    • Statues now have less material effects

    RaveRadbury updated:

    • Scarves are smaller now and can fit in boxes.

    Rohesie updated:

    • Admins and byond users can now set their OOC (and ASAY) color to light values and it will save in the preferences.

    Ryll/Shaps updated:

    • Sleeping carp users are no longer immune to piercing, which means they can once again use most medical supplies, but will trip on glass and such like normal people. In return, they are now somewhat more resistant to suffering wounds.
    • Medical, chemical, and wound scanners are now consistent in that they are all inaccessible to the blind. Progress!
    • Thick material checks (like syringes and such) are now applied on a bodypart by bodypart basis, rather than just depending on your suit.

    TMTIME updated:

    • Clowns no longer harm themselves with toy dualsabers

    Timberpoes updated:

    • Supply Consoles and Express Supply Consoles will once again be built pre-emagged if their boards used to build them are emagged.
    • Supply Consoles will now once again allow Cargonia to buy contraband when their circuit boards are appropriately configured with a multitool.
    • Dronespeak manual on KS13 is once again infinite use, and can once again only be used on drones or silicons.
    • Hilbert's Hotel Bag of Holding has been replaced with a raw bluespace anomaly core and inert bag of holding. For flavour.
    • Self-recharging basic yellow slime cores have been removed.
    • Self-recharging hypercharged yellow slime cores are no longer self-recharging. They are now a high capacity cell choice. Their capacity is above Bluespace Cells but they recharge slower than ordinary cells.
    • Motorised wheelchairs now use SIGNIFICANTLY less power and should last around 20 times as long before they run out of charge.

    VexingRaven updated:

    • The kitchen cold room and medbay freezer air alarms on Metastation have been given reasonable temperature thresholds

    Wallem updated:

    • Sign language users now make a visual effort to sign when their hands are full, and can't sign if they're holding an item in their one existing arm.
    • Sign language users are no longer "cured" by ling revives, regenerative extracts, or aheals.

    necromanceranne updated:

    • Golems can wear a much larger variety of cosmetic clothing.

    nicbn updated:

    • Tank holders have been added. You can craft them using metal rods.

    nightred updated:

    • Corrected start check in blood filter surgery

    qustinnus updated:

    • some cursed snowflake proc call now uses a blessed signal in trauma code
    • Non-gameplay impacting runtime related to antag datums.
    • Code causing antag datums to silently fail when unusual error states occur has been replaced. This will cause errors that were previously ignored to now generate runtimes.
    • Assuming direct control of mobs now appropriately updates the verb tabs. Notably, this fixes ghosts who accept offered AI roles not getting the AI verb tab, but will fix all instances of special verbs not unlocking for every other mob type too.
    • Machine boards and components are now stored in the machine contents list instead of in nullspace. This allows for new interactions with the contents of machines. To give context - C4 attached to a circuitboard that is then used to build a machine will actually explode inside the machine instead of exploding off the map in the hypothetical nullspace. Find new and creative ways to murder your friends!
    • Monkeys using bars of soap will no longer cause runtimes.
    • The AI will no longer partially state laws or potentially even state incorrect laws entirely whenever their lawset is changed in the middle of stating laws.
    • Portable Turret now uses tgui.
    • New Modular Console Preset added: /obj/machinery/modular_computer/console/preset/id

    Inept updated:

    • The Nanotrasen Entertainment Division has released a new product: Tarot cards! They're available from the Fun vendor for all your divination needs.

    Jared-Fogle updated:

    • Fixed the medical HUD sometimes reporting undefibbable bodies as defibbable and vice versa.
    • Fixed plasmamen needing hearts in order to be defibbed.
    • Fixed crew with HARS needing a brain to be defibbed.
    • Fixed defibrillators being borked. Sorry!

    Kelenius updated:

    • Hygienebot construction has been fixed.
    • Hygienebots now require a proximity sensor between welding and tubing.
    • Hygienebots no longer slip their path while chasing someone.
    • Hygienebots are less spammy.

    Ryll/Shaps updated:

    • You can now tip over medbots!

    ShizCalev updated:

    • Defibbing now works properly on ALL species that don't require hearts to survive, as opposed to just plasmamen.
    • Defibbing now works properly on mobs with the Muscled Veins trait if their heart was removed.

    • bababooey

    04 June 2020

    ATHATH updated:

    • The 16 second hardstun that non-pAI mulebots with cut avoidance wires apply to living creatures they bump into has been replaced with a much more tame 8 second knockdown.

    ArcaneMusic updated:

    • Organic Pest Killer is now available in the biogenerator.
    • Pest Killer and Weed Killer now applies the correct amount of toxicity and doesn't individually harm the plant's health.
    • Pest/Week killer bottles now have a transfer rate of 1 ,2, and 5 units per use, and a max capacity of 30 units.

    Fikou updated:

    • atmos jumpsuit now has the same armor values as engi jumpsuit
    • replaces plasma in bluespace beaker design with plastic

    Ryll/Shaps updated:

    • Cigarette packets now have coupons on the back for small cargo items! Smoking DOES pay!
    • Single/small items in cargo have been rebranded as goodies, come in lockboxes rather than crates, and can only be purchased with private accounts. They also are immune to the 10% private account fee, obviously.

    Skoglol updated:

    • Removed some dead unused code in languages.
    • Box gravity generator and AI core APC rewired to smes, will not run out roundstart anymore. P.A.C.M.A.N. added to grav gen for emergencies.

    TheChosenEvilOne updated:

    • Dynamic will no longer give antagonist roles to jobs who shouldn't have them when restricted roles is set in the config.

    Tlaltecuhtli updated:

    • lightfloor makes colored lights and are more visible
    • you can turn them off/on by using your screwdriver
    • you can emp em
    • breaking them actually works
    • using a broken bulb wont fix em sprites: flicker states for each colour

    necromanceranne updated:

    • Neckgrabs and especially floor neckgrabs are no longer near impossible to escape.
    • Resisting a grab is more consistent across the board, but you get less chances at resisting a grab and take more stamina damage.

    02 June 2020

    ArcaneMusic updated:

    • The hallway on icebox mining is slightly longer. and the ladder deposits you in the locker room.
    • The icebox mining ladder works again.

    • DNA scanner can now store any amount of mutations and chromosomes.

    Fhaxaris updated:

    • baton, health analyzer, classic baton, PDA and pinpointer.

    Fikou updated:

    • Our Nanotrasen Elite Anti-Animal Team hunted down King Goat and stopped his reign forever. As a memorial of this event you can now get a cute goat plushie from the arcades.

    • Split the Ignore verb into two verbs (Ignore and Unignore)
    • Unignore allows you to view your ignore list
    • Unignore allows you to unignore players who are offline
    • Ignore and Unignore should not interfere with Stealth Mode

    • Psychologists gets a new Hud icon that's not a P
    • The "incarcerated" sec hud icon gets a new sprite that is not a P

    TemporalOroboros updated:

    • Firesuits and radiation suits can now fit most internals tanks.

    Timberpoes updated:

    • Only the Descendents of Asclepius who have taken the Hippocratic Oath may perform the Healing Touch miracle and conduct multiple concurrent surgeries. Everyone else is limited to a single surgery step at a time.

    • Glow will now always be a random color.
    • Antiglow will now absorb all light equally.
    • Improved waddling for big things.

    04 October 2020

    Couls updated:

    • keybinding conflict alerts now wait a bit before being sent

    Mickyan updated:

    • Fixes certain clothes displaying blood overlays incorrectly

    Rohesie updated:

    • The rest verb works differently now: it will let you set your desired state. If you set it to resting then you'll fall to the floor as soon as you can (such as if you are buckled to a chair and are unbuckled), else you'll try to get up whenever you can. You can also get up while moving (crawling) now.
    • AIs can no longer pull things.

    TheVekter updated:

    • A new dance-themed emergency shuttle has been added to the rotation. Buy it today!

    Fikou updated:

    • makes portal and gravity gun inhands more visible on flooring

    • Name given to condiment container by pen persists when container contents changed

    ATHATH updated:

    • Morphs no longer have to wait 5 seconds between disguising themselves and undisguising themselves (or vice versa).
    • Because they don't have to drag around a heavy body made of runed metal, shades now move faster than the other cult constructs.

    • Synthmeat works for burgers again, and colored burgers are colored once more.

    • fixes golem ship having rocks on engine places
    • fixes pubby chapel having centcom airlocks
    • fixes ice box having shifted lights on mining base

    Ghilker updated:

    • Crystal Invasion event is no longer random and is now a delamination event. When a delaminating crystal has high power, but not enough to collapse into a tesla, it may instead trigger the Crystal Invasion event when the countdown hits 0. This gives the crew one last opportunity to complete the event and restore their crystal back to normal.

    Hamcha updated:

    • Jumpskirts no longer re-sew themselves into jumpsuits when being dyed in a washing machine

    Hulkamania updated:

    09 May 2020

    RaveRadbury updated:

    • light tiles are less picky about how you hold the multitool
    • Health Analyzers only detect Major Disabilities, rather than all quirks
    • Advanced Health Analyzers can detect Minor Disabilities as well

    Ryll/Shaps updated:

    • The INTERACTING_WITH macro now tracks all kinds of do_after

    zxaber updated:

    • Cyborgs now have a Highlander module to use when said gamemode is enabled. The Highlander borg module comes equipped with a claymore, a pinpointer, and traditional garments for the occasion. Like humanoid contenders, Highlander borgs will die in three strikes.
    • AIs will become Highlander Cyborgs upon Highlander mode being triggered.
    • Humanoid Highlander contenders now get a syndicate headset, so that banter may live on even if telecomms does not.
    • Humanoid Highlander contenders are now immune to shocks, preventing them from being able to claim a cyborg killed them with an unfair shocked door.
    • It is no longer possible to succeed as a highlander contenders if other contenders are alive on the shuttle.
    • Borg tool storage huds no longer freak out if there are zero stored modules.
    • Borgs can choose their flashlight colors again.
    • Delta's Genetics Lab has been redesigned.
    • Pubby's Genetics Lab has been redesigned.
    • Science ID Card access levels have been redesigned. R&D now has its own dedicated access level with Toxins and Toxins Storage having their own dedicated access levels.
    • Science doors across all maps have had their access levels tweaked, especially around maintenance access and R&D access.
    • Geneticists now have R&D Access across all maps.
    • Xenobiology's Winter Coats now have a new set of pockets that can hold all the same equipment as a lab coat.
    • All Xenobiology secure containment areas there were missing them, now have Connector/Injector pairs for injecting gasses directly into secure containment.
    • Pubby's Xenobiology lab now has three slime spawns.
    • Pubby's Xenobiology lab has been expanded with addtional containment pens.
    • Meta's Xenobiology freezer no longer shares a pipe with Xenobio's air distribution pipes. Scientists should no longer freeze to death and space suits with internals are no longer necessary.
    • Delta's Xenobiology lab now requires Xenobiology access to enter.
    • Delta's Xenobiology lab has been expanded with additional containment pens.
    • Pubby's Toxins Mass Driver room now has an intercom.
    • Delta's Toxins Mass Driver room's intercom has been moved closer to the Tachyon-Doppler Research Array.
    • Prototype Hardsuits have been moved to the RD's Office on from Toxins on Meta and Pubby.
    • All Genetics Labs across all station now come fully equipped with Body Bags, Space Cleaner and Mutadone.
    • Box's Genetics Lab now has an air alarm.
    • Meta's Genetics Lab's camera has been moved so the AI can see the entire lab, including the Air Alarm.
    • Geneticists will no longer spawn in the monkey pen on Meta.
    • The Medical Laptop in Delta's Genetics lab can now be accessed by Geneticists.
    • Pubby's Robotics Lab now has a Cautery!
    • Probably more minor quality of life changes I forgot to document as I made them.

      • Skoglol updated:

      • Trash bags can no longer be equipped on belt.

      TheVekter updated:

      • Removed the ability to print mini meteor toys from the autolathe and obtain them from cargo crates.

      nemvar updated:

      • Staff of nothing now shoots nothing.
      • Wand of nothing shoots nothing again, instead of doing nothing.

      08 May 2020

      LemonInTheDark updated:

      • Added Psychologist features to the SM

      29 September 2020

      Timberpoes updated:

      • Whiteships no longer lose their GPS signal when their bridge consoles get deconstructed and rebuilt.

      28 September 2020

      ATHATH updated:

      • The Grasp of Ash upgrade now causes Mansus Grasp to blind the people you use it on instead of causing it to fling the people you use it on away from you.

      MrLostman updated:

      • Heavy armors have received a new design, from a land down under.

      Timberpoes updated:

      • Arcade machines no longer require deconstructing and reconstructing in order to work.
      • Adds door seals to the game, printable at engineering and security lathes after they've been researched. Makes airlocks much harder to smash down if you can't remove them.
      • Slightly changed how bonus health to an airlock works
      • I comes before E, except after C.
      • Wearing a gun on your armor / belt will no longer result in your waist turning purple and black.

      06 May 2020

      ATHATH updated:

      • Unborks the sensory restoration symptom. It should work like having oculine and inacusiate in your system now.
      • Adjusts inacusiate's description to more accurately reflect what it actually does.
      • The eye_blind and eye_blurry healing from oculine is no longer instant, although oculine still has its 20% chance per chem tick to instantly remove the TRAIT_BLIND trait from you (if it was caused by eye damage).
      • Replaces the "You are now blinking manually." fake positive message from the hallucigen symptom with a "Your ears feel great." message.
      • Fixes a typo in one of the messages from the sensory restoration symptom.

      ArcaneMusic updated:

      • Almost all food items are now exportable from cargo.
      • Adjusts the Bananium Shield to be properly covered when held in the opposite hands.

      • you can uniquely rename the kinetic crusher

      • Light tiles no longer cycle into white

      • gigachad fugu slimes can now break walls

      • Fixed various broken functionality between defibrilators and defibrilator mounts.
      • Hardsuits now no longer drain cell charge when thermal regulators are off.

      • Doesn't make every" X" into "KSS"
      • Adjusts lizard Autohissing on "X" to be more phonetically accurate.

      • Added missing headset mob display icons.

      nemvar updated:

      • Fixes a bug that could cause the ORM to scoop up ores although it was not anchored.
      • The ORM will now always scoop up from the correct turf.
      • Fixed a bug where the stabilized black crossbreed would not restore nutrition nor damage the target if you were at full health.

      • You can now eat bees.
      • Yes, you can even eat live bees.

      Fikou updated:

      • Icebox The Research Directors office has been updated

      27 September 2020

      ArcaneDefence updated:

      • Moths won't have limb-shaped holes in their wings when facing certain directions if they have lost a limb any more.

      CoffeeDragon16 updated:

      • Animals will now properly punctuate their eating.
      • A few little fixes on Deltastation.
      • Lavaland elite loot drops for Broodmother and Legionnaire now have in-hand use functions
      • Lavaland elites now have more health in their arena fights, along with several other balance changes
      • Fixed lavaland elites not being able to damage mechs
      • The clown now bleeds Colorful Reagent on April Fools.

      Timberpoes updated:

      • RnD Consoles will no longer list BEPIS-exclusive research nodes in list view as available for research.

      necromanceranne updated:

      • The stechkin pistol is now a makarov. It comes chambered in 9mm. Nothing has really changed for performance or ammo availability. It's just all in 9mm now.
      • The stechkin APS is now normal sized and available to nukies for 10 tc. It sprays bullets like mad and fires very quickly.
      • The caravan now has stechkin APS magazines.
      • The Spetznaz bundle uses incendiary magazines for the APS.
      • .45 is stronger across the board by about 5 damage, and has more bullet variety.
      • the c20-r is a 3 burst weapon and costs 13tc.
      • 5.56mm now has 30 armor penetration and has some bullet spread.. This only affects the m90gl and the Boarder assault rifles.
      • You can buy phasic ammo for the m90 for 8 tc out of the uplink. It passes through walls and objects, and does significantly less damage. (comparatively speaking of course)
      • X-Ray beams now pass through doors, machinery, and structures like lockers.

      uomo91 updated:

      • Pubby Station has had some small budget increases; the stasis bed room is no longer extremely crowded, and some extra IV drips have been supplied.
      • Nanotrasen has fixed a clerical error which gave medical doctors clearance to enter the genetics lab.

      willox updated:

      • removed some duplicate proc definitions
      • syndicate holster now properly sets itself as silent
      • rend tears and temporary object used by fulton extraction can no longer be eaten by singularity
      • hygiene bot no longer cleans objects twice when passed over

      04 May 2020

      EdgeLordExe updated:

      • Nitroglycerin : You now have to use exotic stabilizer.
      • TaTP : The more you use it, the more powerful it becomes. You now have to stabilize it with exotic stabilizer
      • RDX : produces slightly bigger heatwave and slightly bigger shockwave. Now requires gold.
      • Gunpowder : strengthdiv 8 - > 10 (nerf), modifier 2 - > 5 (buff).
      • Methamphetamine : strengthdiv 6 -> 12 (nerf), modifier 1 - > 5 (buff).
      • Moved some power from facid to nitric acid.
      • Hyper-plasmium oxide can be commonly found in lavaland geysers
      • Exotic stabilizer can now be crafted with hyper-plasmium oxide and stabilizing agent

      • Fixes an issue with sentient diseases and darkness

      ATHATH updated:

      • Macrobomb implants now have a weak explosion radius of 20 (up from 16).

      Timberpoes updated:

      • Additional language manuals available from certain space ruins. Lets you learn a new basic language from the roundstart species language pool - And if you're lucky, your friends can too.
      • Pubby and Ceres whiteships now have nav consoles.
      • All whiteships now emit GPS signals from their nav consoles. As a result, the Pubby whiteship now has a GPS signal.
      • Space exploration got a number of tweaks. Expect to see some old loot vanish and some new loot to appear in its place. New random loot spawns have been added in various ruins. More ruins have GPS signals. Space-ruin and whiteship GPS signals are no longer uniquely named.

      Cenrus updated:

      • right pews are no longer left pews.

      • Lizards now pronounce x's as "kss"

      qustinnus updated:

      • Nerfs the cybersun hardsuit and moves it out of the uplink

      uomo91 updated:

      • You can now craft plaques using gold in hand, and with a fountain pen can engrave a title and description on them. They can be mounted on walls. No good deed shall ever go forgotten now.
      • Refactored signs heavily. A bunch of sign types previously left out of using a pen on a sign to change it are now included. They're also sorted sensibly now. You can no longer change sign types that shouldn't be changeable (guidance signs, maps, etc)
      • Signs (and plaques) can now be repaired with a welder.
      • Signs placed on walls now are only placed on one side of that wall, and are not visible through the wall.

      willox updated:

      • Shaved Mohawk hair-style is now available
      • deleted redundant "Drill Hair" icon
      • deleted redundant "Drill Hair" hair-style

      ArcaneDefence updated:

      • Bombing an area heavily on icebox's top 2 floors can also result in chasms leading to the second level.

      • vis dir changes are now handled by vis_flags

      • Ash ascension now deals 5 times less damage

      • Marks are now applied using the mansus grasp and procced using the sickly blade
      • You can now shatter your sickly blade, which teleports you to a random safe turf on the station.
      • Blood siphon is a pointed spell
      • you can now choose your sacrifice out of 3 random people.
      • sacrifices now give you 2 charges
      • less influences now spawn on the station
      • Changed a few summon recipes.
      • Flesh ascension now triples your max amount of ghouls
      • heretics no longer have stalk objective
      • heretics now can roll die a glorius death or hijack objective.
      • pierced realities start to appear 10 seconds after being harvested.

      • Craftable jumbo chess pieces. Have an 8x8 space on the station? Have a public match people can watch!
      • New shutter sprites. Adds windowed and radiation-proofed shutters.
      • New sofa, craftable in-game with metal like the regular sofas.
      • Sofas now have working armrests.

      Investigator77 updated:

      • Large welding fuel tanks are now red instead of white. Large tanks now also have a difference in size.
      • Cell chargers, PKA Modkits, light switches and buttons have been touched up a bit.
      • The incinerator button no longer looks like just a light switch
      • Ligthing aoe projectile now have a no_stun version for the boss rank
      • Crystal mobs have TRAIT_TESLA_SHOCKIMMUNE to prevent boss from hurting himself and the other crystal mobs
      • Revamped mode, announced main portals with location, close them to be able to stabilize the SM
      • Balanced mobs spawn from portal and how much damage they deal
      • Fixed grammar stuff on crystal consume announcement
      • Lowered time needed to use the crystal stabilizer to 7 second total
      • Refractored code so that the more_portals() proc gets called by the event instead of a CALLBACK
      • Added check at start of event for presence of the supermatter crystal
      • lightfloor makes colored lights and are more visible
      • you can turn them off/on by using your screwdriver
      • you can emp em
      • breaking them actually works
      • using a broken bulb wont fix em sprites: flicker states for each colour
      • More toys are available from the Autolathe's contraband selection.

      stylemistake updated:

      • Yet another Canister UI rework. But this time, it's perfection.

      zxaber updated:

      • A syndicate cyborg monitor program for modular computers, showing the status of syndicate borgs, is now available from syndicate repositories.
