    /tg/ Station 13 Changelog
    Traditional Games Space Station 13

    Forum | Wiki | Source Code

    Join our Discord channel
    Current Project Maintainers
     Recent GitHub contributors
     Thanks to: Baystation 12, /vg/station, NTstation, CDK Station devs, FacepunchStation, GoonStation devs, the original Space Station 13 developers, Invisty for the title image and the countless others who have contributed to the game, issue tracker or wiki over the years.
    Have a bug to report?     Visit our Issue Tracker.
     Please search first to ensure that the bug has not already been reported.

    29 July 2020

    ATHATH updated:

    • The third law of the reporter lawset no longer obligates you to interfere with Mining and Xenobiology.
    • The fourth law of the corporate lawset no longer obligates you to depower/shut down Cargo.

    Jared-Fogle updated:

    • Added the "Check Timer Sources" debug command to help isolate problematic cases of addtimer.

    Melbert updated:

    • Fixes a cyborg runtime error
    • middle mouse click to cycle modules for cyborgs works properly again

    Memedoktor updated:

    • adds positive moodlet for chaplain eating holymelon

    Ryll/Shaps updated:

    • Non-emagged mediborgs will no longer embed people with lollipops. Emagged borgs, on the other hand..... well, they can. Fun!
    • Spears and other embeddables are now somewhat less effective at causing damage and bloodloss

    ike709 and bobbahbrown updated:

    • Admins can now see your bans on (some) other servers.

    nightred updated:

    • Prevents showing AI law changes after revival
    • Clown ops reinforcements spawn properly

    oranges updated:

    • disappointment has been reworked

    28 July 2020

    Jared-Fogle updated:

    • Fixed a bug where you could not start messages with an ellipses.
    • Fixed not being able to sing over comms.

    Skoglol updated:

    • Statues can now properly not cast spells.

    Time-Green updated:

    • Instabitulari is called synthflesh again

    27 July 2020

    Ryll/Shaps updated:

    • Stepping on an unopened bag of chips will pop it and ruin all the chips inside
    • Added 2 unit tests for wounds

    ShizCalev updated:

    • Fixed a minor runtime caused by ghosts pressing the lookup / lookdown keybind.
    • Supermatter slivers thrown by bombs / mass drivers will now consume a mob if they're hit by it.
    • Fixed an exploit allowing jaunting mobs to consume supermatter slivers on the ground.
    • Fixed simple animals (ie gorillas) not being consumed by supermatter slivers after picking them up.
    • Fixed an exploit allowing you to kill jaunting mobs with supermatter slivers held by tongs.
    • Objects and mobs that have move resist set to INFINITY will no longer be moved by a singularity.
    • Varediting a solar array assembly's anchored var will now correctly update its pixel offsets.
    • Smartfridges will now drop boards set to the type of fridge they were when deconstructed.
    • Fixed survival pods, black boxes, and drying racks potentially dropping basic smartfridge boards.
    • Newly constructed survival pods will no longer say that they're old and dusty.
    • Fixed "your MMI was unable to receive your mind" being sent to emagged borgs when self_destructed via a robotics console.

    Wayland-Smithy updated:

    • The "See runechat emotes" preference now works as intended.

    nightred updated:

    • Sheetifier now deconstructs properly
    • Fixed guardian runtime on ghost disconnect

    26 July 2020

    Ryll/Shaps updated:

    • The "Disk, Please!" achievement will now be granted to any nuclear operative who holds up any conscious non-nukie holding the disk, rather than needing the Captain. Good luck!

    Skoglol updated:

    • Express supply console has had emagged pod amount reduced slightly and now has a cooldown.
    • *crack has a new sound effect.

    Timberpoes updated:

    • Cybernetic Stomachs are now correctly categorised under Cybernetics in the Exosuit Fabricator.

    WondaMegapon updated:

    • Telecommunication machines now use a TGUI based interface
    • Removed HTML based telecommunication machine code
    • Telecommunication machines can have their interfaces viewed without a multitool
    • Telecommunication machines now log changed settings

    bobbahbrown updated:

    • Runechat now runs under its own subsystem, this should improve performance and allow for finer control over its performance.

    lordpidey updated:

    • Arcade toy companies have found a surplus of promotional balloons from an old boyband and put them in the prize rotation. Warning: balloons may only be partially inflated, and may incite security forces to arrest you.

    25 July 2020

    ArcaneMusic updated:

    • Adds a metric ton of belt icons.
    • Paper cash, when stacked, now displays an icon scaling with it's appropriate value.

    Donkie updated:

    • Fixed being able to cheese the voice analyzer by using multiple consecutive whitespaces

    Indie-ana Jones updated:

    • Swarmers have changed tactics. They now utilize a swarmer beacon for spawning, and have received a number of other changes.

    Jared-Fogle updated:

    • Fixed several edge cases where some reagents would prevent metabolization.

    Ryll/Shaps updated:

    • Anyone with an antag datum now is shown as an antag to admin features like (?|F)
    • You can now properly repair mangy/shredded clothing with cloth

    Timberpoes updated:

    • AI integrity restorer program now appropriately restores the integrity of AIs.

    nightred updated:

    • Titanium does not devolve in to iron when it rusts

    24 July 2020

    ArcaneMusic updated:

    • The BEPIS has been moved to the Cargo Bay from Science, and it's prices have been adjusted to roughly late-game proportions for most players.
    • The Rolling Tables and Mauna Mug BEPIS techs have been merged into one.

    EdgeLordExe updated:

    • Ash ascension no longer kills user.

    Galdar02 updated:

    • Winter Boots and Coats can now be acquired from Clothesmates

    Jared-Fogle updated:

    • You can now take off clothes while in stasis.

    Maurukas updated:

    • All maps now receive a blood crate and surplus limb crate in Medical.
    • All maps now have a chemical locker in the Pharmacy or in Plumbing.
    • The last chemistry wardrobe locker has been removed from DeltaStation.
    • IceBox blood freezer not spawning the correct number of blood bags.

    MrDoomBringer updated:

    • Routing protocols for contractor pods have been fixed - they should no longer send victims to mysterious crystal filled rooms

    Ryll/Shaps updated:

    • Licking wounds on other people will automatically contract any diseases they're carrying. This is a one way transmission vector, you cannot contract disease from a felinid doctor in this way due to the partially antiseptic nature of cat saliva or whatever
    • You also cannot lick wounds if your mouth is covered or if you do not, in fact, possess a tongue
    • Your clothes and items will no longer be covered in distressingly human looking blood when bashing borgs to bits
    • Introduces piercing wounds, a new type of wound mostly related to pointy things like bullets. Piercing wounds cause bleeding that does not clot over time, as well as when that limb is hit.
    • Skeletons and plasmamen can now suffer bone wounds!
    • Dismemberment is now integrated with wounds! Simply apply a critical bleeding wound and a severe bone wound, keep whacking, and pop! Sharp weapons will cut through to bones on limbs with critical bleeding wounds, allowing you to still dismember with just a sword or axe.
    • A few projectile types, namely buckshot and shotgun slugs, have had their damage reduced slightly to account for their new wounding abilities. Buckshot may take three shots to crit now, but you can also blast peoples limbs off! Cool!
    • Health analyzers now tell you if a humanoid is missing a heart, lungs, liver, or stomach (and they need them to survive)
    • Formaldehyde replaces calomel in paramedic belts
    • Having brute damage on a limb no longer causes bleeding. Bandages now apply to all wounds on a limb, rather than be applied per-wound. Gauze also stops bleeding from dragging, but this wears out the gauze faster
    • Wounds that have their removal requirements met while the patient is on a stasis bed will now be cured of their wounds as expected. In addition, burn wounds will slowly recover while stasis'd if they have flesh regen/sanitizer applied
    • Examining a bleeding dead body now reflects that dead bodies don't actually bleed, saying their blood is pooling instead
    • Coagulant is now slightly less effective per bleeding wound for each bleed wound on a patient

    Sirich96 updated:

    • new stunbaton sprites

    YPOQ updated:

    • Fixed an issue that prevented throwing hats onto heads.

    nightred updated:

    • Only living mobs can buckle to borgs
    • The golden bike horn now works after round end,

    zxaber updated:

    • AIs disconnecting from a shell will be left looking at the shell rather than their core.

    23 July 2020

    ArcaneMusic updated:

    • Civilian bounty pads, when submitting a bounty that the department can't pay for, will allow you to submit it later.
    • Fixes 2 duplicate bounties between security/assistants.

    Coul updated:

    • All keybinds send signals when pressed

    Melbert updated:

    • Fixes cyborg slot cycling (and a runtime)

    Nebulacrity updated:

    • Updated the reality fractures (Heretic influences) to have nicer sprites.

    ShizCalev updated:

    • Fixed display cases going invisible when you put things inside of them.
    • Fixed the pedestal for open display cases being glass colored.

    Skoglol updated:

    • electrolysis reaction now outputs 4.5u of reagents instead of 30u.
    • Removed forcesay on getting hit in classic mode.

    nightred updated:

    • Fixed medical records for quirks.
    • Quirks settings trigger after spawn now.

    tralezab updated:

    • More roles added for mafia!
    • Should have (outside of adminbus) way more balanced role lists in mafia now.
    • general improvements to the game have been made as well :)

    22 July 2020

    ArcaneMusic updated:

    • early plant mutations from 30+ instability
    • The Implosion Compressor now has an updated sprite.
    • The photocopier now has a 5 credit cost to use.
    • There is now a uniform component for simple payments.
    • You can now make copies of paper with the photocopier again.

    Coul updated:

    • visible message when someone takes the item you offer them
    • cleaned up some spans and offer messages

    Donkie updated:

    • Prevent being able to finish a reinforced girder using regular metal, making the added reinforcement disappear.

    Jared-Fogle updated:

    • Fixed colorful reagent, red powder, and quantum hair dye breaking metabolization.

    Melbert updated:

    • You can no longer use broken cyborg slots by being fast at clicking
    • Removed a bunch of deprecated cyborg code involving taking toxin and oxygen damage
    • Refactored part of cyborg inventory code

    Ryll/Shaps updated:

    • Corpses buckled to chairs can no longer tackle

    ShizCalev updated:

    • Fixed a minor runtime caused by a mob being deleted while in a coma.
    • Converted everything to use setAnchored() as opposed to setting the anchored var directly. This means that COMSIG_MOVABLE_SETANCHORED can now actually be used reliably to track if an object's anchored var has changed.
    • The refactor also means that varediting the anchored var will now properly update most items' other states that rely on it being set a certain way.
    • Fixed bookcases having the incorrect icon when they're unanchored.
    • Fixed bookcases not automatically picking up spellbooks / storage books when made/spawned.
    • Fixed bookcases not dropping spellbooks / storage books when deconstructed.
    • Fixed a runtime causing emags to not properly emag airlocks.
    • Fixed a runtime caused by a target being deleted by a gun's projectiles.
    • The light eater will now eat -even more- lights.
    • Fixed a runtime when using the peacekeeper borg's Hyperkinetic Dampener Field.
    • Player/pAI controlled MULEbots will now use power when they move.
    • Player/pAI controlled MULEbots will now turn off properly if they ran out of power while moving.
    • MULEbot's power levels now show up on the diagnostic HUD.
    • Players controlling a MULEbot will now see their power level and current load on the status panel.
    • Player controlled bots (ie securitrons, ED209's, MULEbots, ect) will now get a chat notification when they're turned on/off.

    Skoglol updated:

    • Fixed a simplemob AI issue that prevented them from processing.
    • dead people can no longer slimelink
    • Re-added old keybinds for quick equip, set new default for suit storage slot if none was set yet.
    • Savefile version minimum bumped to 32.

    Timberpoes updated:

    • Revenants are no longer deaf.

    Winterous updated:

    • Changed some text for Medbots, including fixing incorrect message after updating research. Contributor's brain irreparably melted from hurdles.

    bobbahbrown updated:

    • Improved SIGN macro performance

    nightred updated:

    • Family heirloom moods clear on loss of the quirk.
    • Fixed the location of an Engineering sign on Meta
    • Fixed up plumbing issues in security for Meta

    21 July 2020

    ArcaneMusic updated:

    • We got hydroponics belt and suit sprites.
    • We also got engineering tool mirror sprites.

    Dennok updated:

    • look_down verb that allow look down
    • look_up and look_down verbs don't interrupt by move, until you step under/over transparent turf.

    EdgeLordExe updated:

    • Ash ascension spells now deal actual damage.

    Fikou updated:

    • changes morphine description to be more accurate

    Melbert updated:

    • Items hidden in bread, cake, and cheeses can now have unique interactions when someone bites into it them.
    • Sharp objects like shards of glass, ammunition, beakers, bottles, syringes, pills, organs, and more will now have unique interactions if you somehow manage to accidentally bite or swallow one that was hidden in food.
    • You can now insert sharp objects into food containers (bread, cake, cheese) if you're on disarm intent.

    Mickyan updated:

    • Spraypaint can no longer be applied to any object type

    RaveRadbury updated:

    • New insect phobia

    Rohesie updated:

    • Emotes now show on runechat. You can disable them on your prefs.

    Skoglol updated:

    • Arrhytmic knife now updates movespeed every time it processes, as intended.
    • Arrhytmic knife movespeed change brought more in line with other speed increasing effects.
    • Moth week start date fixed
    • Added a few new buildmode modes. Outfit, to quickly apply or remove outfits. Delete, to quickly delete any atoms. Slightly overhauled the copy proc used here and in supply pods, now compatible with most mobs.

    Winterous updated:

    • Large water bottles (made from plastic) now have the same starting and optional transfer volumes as large beakers.

    zxaber updated:

    • Hulk arms no longer break with punching things unintended to break hulk arms
    • Hulk arms no longer break when punching machines (but still take a small bit of recoil damage).

    20 July 2020

    ArcaneMusic updated:

    • Icebox NE Maintenance has fewer unnecessary pipes and wires, as well as less space.
    • The Civilian Bounty Pad and Console have been added to every map. Using your ID on the console will allow you to aquire a civilian bounty, which can be sent away for additional profit similar to cargo bounties.
    • Midround, the widely unstable space market can occasionally briefly completely collapse, resulting in vendor prices skyrocketing for short periods of time.
    • For admins, there are new debug items to fiddle with the economy.
    • Several new small bounties have been added to accompany the new sets of civilian bounties per job.
    • The Coin mint has been removed from the code and all maps.
    • Miasma Exports have been nerfed from 10 credits/mol to 2credits/mol when sold.
    • EXPERIMENTAL: Crew now start with higher starting balances, but lower passive income throughout the round.
    • A new economy mechanic has been added, the inflation value. In short, if player accounts hold more money than the station should probably have at a given time, the prices of vendors will go up. If vendor prices are unreasonably high, spend money with cargo or vendors.
    • Adjusted the Telepad sprite into the 2020s. sound: Telepads now make a whoopy teleport sound.

    Cobby updated:

    • You can now tend wounds on all healable mobs if they are organic!

    Fikou updated:

    • you can no longer cheat over the spraycanning clothes black restriction

    Gamer025 updated:

    • You can no longer enter book or author names that are too long for the database to store

    Maurukas updated:

    • Fix hidden pipes and unpowered devices in Icebox turbine.

    ShizCalev updated:

    • Discord urls updated since the old one is being depreciated.
    • The client playtime panel is now sorted alphabetically as opposed to the order in which they were added to the list.
    • Defibbing someone will no longer work if their chest is covered by thick clothing. Used to just check to see if they had a spacesuit someone on their person (even if they weren't wearing it / only had it stuck to their hands.)
    • Defibbing someone will now actually require you to hold the shock paddles for the entire duration of the process. No more defibbing someone if you were disarmed during the charge time.

    stylemistake updated:

    • tgui: Fixed a very rare case of exceptions thrown due to bugged localStorage. No more NTOS bluescreens.

    tralezab updated:

    • landmark cleanup on mafia

    19 July 2020

    ArcaneMusic updated:

    • Mice can now be stored in chef's hats.

    Caldony updated:

    • the microwave will no longer be turned on infinitely when the power is cut off while it's still on

    LemonInTheDark updated:

    • All methods of changing text output, like singing (%), whispering (#), radio (;) and languages (,) all now work together in any order.

    OmegaDarkPotato updated:

    • Increases the amount of Aiuri in burn patches to 2u to match the quantity of Libital in brute patches.

    Ryll/Shaps updated:

    • Be on the lookout for new types of cockroaches wearing miniature 19th century Prussian headgear!

    Skoglol updated:

    • Adminhelps has gotten a little bit smarter. Improved handling of target dis- and re-connections, admin->admin PM now opens a ticket, players can no longer close their own tickets.

    Timberpoes updated:

    • Roboticists rejoice. NanoTrasen has heard your cries for help. They've seen CCTV footage (recorded by the AI) of you all staring enviously at geneticists, lording around their shiny, polished, usable DNA Consoles. Cry no more, for you can now please your Silicon Overlords and robust those Machine Cultist Chaplains in high definition glory with a beautiful new interface added to Exosuit Fabricators.
    • Depowered and/or non-interactive tgui interfaces are now approriately non-interactive.

    carshalash updated:

    • Reintroduces module type to AI shell name

    18 July 2020

    Ryll/Shaps updated:

    • Fix admin pref for ignore cult summons

    ShizCalev updated:

    • Fixed AIs / borgs sometimes singing and whipsering their ion laws to you like they're sweet nothings of death and doom.
    • Fixed a runtime caused by a mob's client disconnecting while boosting around with a jetpack.

    Skoglol updated:

    • Teleporters can now turn any organic living species into a flyperson. Practice good teleporter safety.

    16 July 2020

    ArcaneMusic updated:

    • Added Star Cactus, a new mutation of lavaland cacti.
    • Added the Prickly Adhesion plant trait, enabling embedding on plants, but is mutually exclusive with liquid contents.

    ArcaneMusic Ft. Kriskog updated:

    • Plants above 30 instability when harvested have a (instability/3)% chance of producing a wildly mutated product instead of their own.

    Coul updated:

    • cleans up mech backstabbing code

    Donkie updated:

    • Added label to canisters indicating their pressure rating

    GulDreggrod updated:

    • new regal rat resprite!

    ShizCalev updated:

    • Fixed things like Nar-Sie and CRAB-17 spawning outside the station on icemoon maps.
    • Fixed filters/radiation overlays not being added/cleared properly on action buttons.
    • Fixed cult barriers not getting deleted properly.
    • Added some sanity checking for varedit values.
    • Fixed a scenario which would cause the cultist reveal rune ability to break.
    • Fixed sheets of glass / other materials that don't have a valid false wall type being consumed without doing anything when you try to construct a false wall with them.
    • VScode will now always default to LF line breaks for new files.

    Skoglol updated:

    • Agent card once again disallows IC banned words.

    Wayland-Smithy updated:

    • Random events no longer trigger after emergency shuttle departure. No more Sentient Disease spawning right as the round ends.

    jdawg1290 updated:

    • text files now use lf line endings

    nightred updated:

    • Added door hints to the Meta service area

    stylemistake updated:

    • tgui windows should load faster after an initial load, if using the fancy mode. Please report any breakages.
    • Fixed a bug in tgui that prevents observers from observing UI updates.

    tralezab updated:

    • Obsessed can't win by lynching their target after they're dead.
    • a small wiki link at the start of a mafia game

    15 July 2020

    ATHATH updated:

    • A new hotkey for quickdrawing/quicksheathing items into/from your suit storage slot has been added! It defaults to Shift+Q.
    • Corrects some minor capitalization oddities.

    Donkie updated:

    • Improved user experience when dealing with canister frames

    Fikou updated:

    • you can now get a circuit from destroying the lipid extractor

    Jared-Fogle updated:

    • Fixed SWAT and Armored beat cops spawning without a weapon.
    • Fixed the Syndicate Ship Captain outfit not having a jumpsuit, ID, or belt.
    • Armored fugitive bounty hunters now correctly start with an extra tank of plasma in their hand.

    LemonInTheDark, TetraZeta for the sprites updated:

    • Adds hot ice slush, grind some hot ice to make it, it'll melt down to plasma if you heat it to 30c.
    • Adds hot ice coffee, mix 1 part hot ice slush with 2 parts coffee to make some. Careful it's kinda cold.

    Ryll/Shaps updated:

    • Fixed a runtime when log_wound wasn't passed a wound or a victim to apply it to.

    ShizCalev updated:

    • Readded the button to toggle the plasmaman helmet's welding visor.
    • Fixed the throw button's icon not updating properly if the mob caught something while their client was disconnected.
    • Fixed Factory Error Synths not getting their glowy eyes
    • Fixed admin help tickets not logging the name of the admin who generated a ban.
    • Fixed a minor runtime when cameramobs are ghostized.
    • Fixed a scenario where ice demons wouldn't fire at you if they were unsuccessful in finding a spot to teleport to.
    • Fixed putting on a damaged suit and then it taking more damage afterwards spamming runtime logs with a warning.
    • Fixed another minor pellet cloud runtime when no mobs were hit and a non-mob target was deleted.
    • Tagging an area already tagged by your gang will now say so, instead of generically telling you it's tagged by "a" gang.
    • You can no longer hide your codex in your pockets while gathering research points with it from a reality tear. You have to actually hold it for the full duration now.
    • Corrupted power cells will no longer get reset if you remove plasma from them.

    nightred updated:

    • Meta security airsupply is now in tune

    uomo91 updated:

    • You can now also leave Deltastation's medbay without bugging a doctor to let you out.

    13 July 2020

    Angust updated:

    • Glowshrooms now spread properly again.

    • Vend-a-trays can now be made in the service lathe.
    • Roundstart Vend-a-trays can now be registered to either chefs or bartenders, respectively.
    • Plant reagents are now properly displayed if they've reacted within a plant using a plant analyzer.

    • Cleaned up some of the radiation traits and bitflags

    12 July 2020

    ATHATH updated:

    • To sacrifice someone on a sacrificial altar (such as the ones found in the healing fountain ruin), you must now alt-click the altar, not normal-click it. The default descriptions of sacrificial altars have been updated accordingly.

    Alterist updated:

    • Upgraded Cybernetic Lungs (Tier3) now have improved oxygen absorption, same as Cybernetic Lungs (Tier2)
    • Added 3 tier of Cybernetic Stomachs, researchable by R&D and buildable in the Medical Lathe.

    Angust updated:

    • fixed space vines / kudzu growing slower from better (lower) production speed
    • random event space vines buffed to have 1-6 production instead of 5-10 to compensate

    ArcaneMusic updated:

    • Icebox Maintenance, and Icebox Service Hallway have been rearranged to be more spacious.
    • Bounty boards are properly responsive, and are mapped on icebox dorms as intended.

    • Separate BLOCK_Z_FALL flag to BLOCK_Z_OUT_DOWN, BLOCK_Z_OUT_UP, BLOCK_Z_IN_DOWN, BLOCK_Z_IN_UP

    • Plant mutation chances at 80+ instability is now a sliding scale.

    LemonInTheDark updated:

    • The tesla/sm will ground bolts less jankilly now
    • Wires will no longer burn if they're under a tile that's on fire
    • Reinserted some old checks for if something is over/under a tile

    LoserWasTaken updated:

    • blood cleave does only one wound instead of 3 now

    Maurukas updated:

    • Added reconstructive surgery for moth wings, requiring synthflesh
    • Magical healing and aheals now restore moth wings

    Melbert updated:

    • Fixes railings blocking bullets and immovable rods from a certain direction.

    MrDoomBringer updated:

    • Nanotrasen's Transportation and Logistics Subdivision has spent the better part of their budget developing a brand new model of Supplypod. Internal investigations have revealed the only real differences are almost purely aesthetic.

    Ryll/Shaps updated:

    • As an admin ghost, examining another ghost twice quickly will pull up clickable links to their info in chat
    • Examining someone who has examined you within the last second will give you both a small message saying you made eye contact. Having your face obscured by a helmet or mask will prevent the other person from noticing, no matter who looked first.
    • Those with social anxiety may find eye contact to be stressful, and those who foster unhealthy obsessions over other crewmembers may outright staredown their prey.
    • Throwing people really hard into vending machines is not advised if you don't want to clean them up afterwards. Things are considered thrown really hard if: You're throwing them as a hulk, the person you're throwing is a dwarf, and/or if you're throwing someone from a neckgrab
    • You can now adjust the speed disposal outlets eject contents at with a multitool, and emag the disposal outlet to amp the speed up even further!
    • Player controlled medbots are no longer permanently crippled when tipped over
    • New admin smite for knotting someone's shoes if possible

    ShizCalev updated:

    • Fixed radiation immune mobs getting irradiated.
    • Plasmamen who have acquired the fireproofing trait will no longer get spammed with messages saying they caught on fire.
    • Stacks will now update properly when you varedit their amount. It's clamped to max_amount, so make sure to change that too if you want to increase the amount beyond it.
    • Fixed some constant runtime spam when defib rechargers had their defib destroyed.
    • Fixed a minor runtime when examining paper twice.
    • Cleaned up arcade machine examine-more messages a little.
    • Map placed headpikes will now have heads... and pikes!
    • Fixed headpikes having the wrong mob name.
    • Fixed a minor runtime when removing a monkey's sentience helmet.

    Skoglol updated:

    • Parrot possession now works.
    • Fixed some glowshroom runtimes.
    • Wendigo no longer spams admin messages.

    Tlaltecuhtli updated:

    • conveyor switches now have a wire that can be pulsed with signalers/other assemblies to active it

    Wayland-Smithy updated:

    • Resource and Factory Blobs can only be placed on station where they count towards critical mass.

    YPOQ updated:

    • Fixed an issue that prevented AIs from tracking players in areas they have not yet viewed.

    silicons updated:

    • cameras no longer crash the server

    tralezab updated:

    • Fixed up Mafia maps, at least in all the ways I caught!
    • mind mag helms losing their icon sometimes

    • Mech vs Mech combat system for toy mechs! Hit a toy mech with another toy mech, or attack a player holding a toy mech with a toy mech, and you can initiate battle between toys!
    • Each toy mech now has its own health stat and special attack move for use in mech vs mech combat. Discover them all!
    • Suicide act for mech toys. If you wanted to take part in the toy mech battles yourself.

    • Added more examine text to bots.
    • Fixed player controlled statues being able to speak.

    • Fixed a minor runtime caused by removing a laser pointer's diode while it's still turned on.

    07 July 2020

    ATHATH updated:

    • The description of eldritch essence has been modified to make what it actually does more clear.
    • Eldritch essence and unholy water both now actually use the metabolization_rate variable.

    ArcaneMusic updated:

    • Added a new mutation of geraniums, called Fraxinella, AKA Burning Bush.
    • Added a new mutation of watermelon, called Barrel Melon, which has the new trait Auto-Distilling Composition. (Sprite provided by Kryson)
    • Walking Mushrooms now have a new graftable gene, Occulary Mimicry.

    EdgeLordExe updated:

    • Nitric acid is slightly better
    • Meat hook is now a 11tc cook traitor item. It can no longer be aquired from necropolis chests. sorry miners!

    Fikou updated:

    • servicelathe can now print airlock painters, decal painters and spraycans
    • explorer suits now have space suit level heat protection

    Jared-Fogle updated:

    • Donut boxes will now accurately show what donuts are inside.
    • Fixed a bug where when teleporting naturally (such as going through a z-level in space), if you were pulling someone that was then pulling another person, only you and the person you were pulling would make it through.
    • Removed the healing skill, and by effect dissection surgery and the legendary healer's cloak.

    Jay Smith updated:

    • The Portable Chemical Mixer now uses proper vortex anomaly cores instead of raw ones.

    Kathy Ryals updated:

    • Nanotrasen finally realized they forgot to ship the mandatory anomaly compressor and two anomaly cores to Icebox.

    LemonInTheDark updated:

    • Removed the research modes from tesla coils and radiation collectors.

    Orchian updated:

    • Added a new traitor item for HoP and QM, the OCD

    ShizCalev updated:

    • Fixed gas canisters having a misplaced flashing icon when they are close to empty.
    • Fixed inducers not working on a couple items with internal powercells.
    • Fixed a scenario where mobs would accidentally be kicked off a vehicle if they were handcuffed.
    • Added support to kick a mob off a vehicle if the vehicle is restrained.
    • You can now unlock bots by alt-clicking them when their maintenance panel is open.
    • Optimized a good chunk of MULEbot code, fixing things such as it rebuilding it's overlays/icons 5 times every second while moving to a destination. Less free lag!
    • Fixed MULEbots closing crates when the crate doesn't actually get loaded onto it.
    • Fixed the maintenance hatch on MULEbots visually closing for a moment when emagged.
    • Paranormal MULEbots will no longer briefly turn into a normal MULEbot when emagged.
    • Fixed interface exploits involving paranormal MULEbots carrying ghosts.
    • Fixed MULEbot blood tracks sometimes facing the wrong direction.
    • Player controlled MULEbots will now leave bloody tracks if they've run over a mob.
    • Fixed players riding MULEbots sometimes appearing underneath it instead of ontop of it.
    • Fixed AI's making a chiming noise when they receive a remote notification from a MULEbot. Now only the AI will hear the notification's sound.
    • Fixed MULEbots dropping mobs off at their current location instead of at their dropoff point.
    • Fixed a minor runtime related to MULEbots dropping off deleted items/mobs.
    • Fixed mobs having the wrong height offset when riding MULEbots.
    • Fixed mobs sometimes ending up underneath MULEbots while riding them.
    • Fixed mobs not falling off MULEbots when stunned / incapacitated.
    • Fixed inducers not recharging MULEbots.
    • Fixed MULEbots leaving bloody tracks in space.
    • Fixed MULEbots leaving multiple blood tracks in the same spot if they failed to move.
    • Fixed hacked MULEbots spamming messages about knocking down a mob when they didn't actually do it.
    • Fixed MULEbot commands not resetting when they were turned off.
    • Fixed MULEbots not turning off properly when their maintenance hatch is opened.
    • Fixed MULEbots not turning off properly when they ran out of power while moving.
    • Fixed MULEbots flashing their external warning lights while they're turned off when their avoidance wire is cut.
    • Fixed mobs being able to walk right over MULEbots when they turn off.
    • MULEbots will now try to put their powercell in your hands when you remove them with a crowbar.
    • Fixed the interface for MULEbots briefly looking like you turned it on successfully even though it was out of power.
    • MULEbots will now provide feedback if they fail to turn on due to their maintenance panel being open.
    • MULEbots will no longer flash and beep when their wires are pulsed if they don't have power.
    • MULEbots will now actually flash when their external warning lights are pulsed.
    • MULEbots will now flash when they beep / buzz.
    • Added a bit more examine text to MULEbots.
    • Fixed an exploit involving coins and mints that could crash the server.
    • Fixed buckled mobs sometimes appearing over what they're buckled to.
    • Renamed the "Paranormal MULEbot" to simply, "GHOULbot".
    • L6 Saw's inhands work again.
    • Fixed a couple exploits involving the L6.
    • Guns with a magazine + a round in the chamber won't appear empty anymore.
    • Energy based guns are no longer missing textures when worn.... Again.
    • Touched up and added a few worn / inhand icons for some energy based guns.

    Tlaltecuhtli updated:

    • the nanotransen research science division found that epinephrine has healing effects to people who drank lexorin
    • eye stabbing returns a normal attack if it fails instead of doing nothing

    26 June 2020

    Arkatos updated:

    • Portable Turret now uses tgui.

    Ryll/Shaps updated:

    • Nanotrasen now uses smaller fonts on ID's to show age and account information, requiring a closer look to read

    ShizCalev updated:

    • Fixed revenant's light overload ability not blowing lights in a square if there was another broken/burnt out/empty light in it.
    • Fixed showing a piece of paper to a camera not working if there was an AI that had died or has remote access disabled.
    • Bank cards will now still give you notifications if you're standing next to another player who has them disabled.
    • Fixed bronze golems' gong ability not working if there was a dead mob on screen.
    • Fixed bone golems' bonechill ability not working if there was any mobs that were undead, resistant to cold, or also golems on screen.
    • Fixed a scenario where you would be unable to offer someone an item if you already had a pending item offer with someone else standing near you.

    WarlockD updated:

    • Suit cell charge on stat panel
    • Suit cell gauge works now

    coiax updated:

    • The Nanite Host Scan program can now scan the host for wounds.

    sergeirocks100 updated:

    • Malt Liquor can now be obtained from your local Booze-O-Mat

    25 June 2020

    ATHATH updated:

    • The tox purging threshold for livers has been changed from 3u to 3u * [liver's health]/[liver's maximum health].

    EdgeLordExe updated:

    • Otherwordly presence has taken more control over the holes in reality.
    • Influences now actually spawn randomly on the station.

    Jared-Fogle updated:

    • The search bar will now automatically focus when you open up the orbit menu, the uplink, the biogenerator, and the camera console.

    Melbert updated:

    • Allows the HONK Oingo-Boingo Punch-Face to toggle between lethal and non-lethal modes.
    • The HONK Oingo-Boingo Punch-Face's throw distance now scales on how much damage it deals. By default, it's the same distance as before.
    • Pacifists can no longer use the HONK Oingo-Boingo Punch-Face to damage people.
    • Admins can now edit the damage of the HONK Oingo-Boingo Punch-Face. Honk.

    WarlockD updated:

    • You can open paper ui with double shift click

    dearmochi updated:

    • Fix thrown bolas (and other items) bypassing weapon/shield blocking

    24 June 2020

    ArcaneMusic updated:

    • Sentient regal and regular rats can now eat cheese wedges to recover a small amount of health.

    Arkatos updated:

    • Turret Control Panel now uses tgui.

    Caldony updated:

    • fixed a bug with the battle arcade game where the combos would sometimes not register correctly.

    EdgeLordExe updated:

    • Wizard can no longer mindswap into a statue to become neigh invicible, fire throwing bastard.
    • Wizard can no longer mindswap into laughter or slaughter demons to gain a free jaunt and an unlimited heals for killing people. You know one thing that wizard is good at...

    LemonInTheDark updated:

    • Removes a redundant check in fire code

    Maurukas updated:

    • Boxstation and Icebox medbays have been completely reworked

    ShizCalev updated:

    • Fixed the backpack setting showing up twice in the preferences window.
    • Chameleon ties can no longer disguise as skill capes.
    • The SM will no longer pull mobs not affected by gravity.

    TemporalOroboros updated:

    • Synthflesh works again.

    Timberpoes updated:

    • DNA Console will no longer bluescreen in certain scenarios when disks are ejected.

    WarlockD updated:

    • allows the air alarm to let vents suck are as well as pressurize.

    tmtmtl30 updated:

    • stopped midround dynamic families ruleset from picking mindshielded starting family members

    23 June 2020

    Kathy Ryals updated:

    • Fixed Box wires and pipes near R&D, as well as the door that got deleted.

    LemonInTheDark updated:

    • Fixed stealth implants not properly boxing the user, and doors not shocking
    • Renamed COOLDOWN_CHECK to COOLDOWN_FINISHED
    • Removed some old unused clockcult status effects

    LemonInTheDark, Heather Shadelight updated:

    • Changed some portal sprites, hope ya like em :)

    Paxilmaniac updated:

    • PP-95 smg and it's magazine
    • replaced mosin with pp-95 in the nuke op uplink

    ShizCalev updated:

    • Fixed logging / admin message coordinate handling for items being held by mobs / in containers / in containers inside other containers giving nullspace / 0,0,0 location references.

    Timberpoes updated:

    • Belts in Delta EVA and the Ashwalker Ruins no longer show up as ERRORs.
    • Science are now able to print DNA Scanner boards. Boards associated with Genetics are now only printable in Science and have been removed from Medical printers.

    bobbahbrown updated:

    • Removed exploitable world/topic command server_hop

    silicons updated:

    • onZImpact no longer does throw_impact. This was broken anyways. Code must now manually handle multiz falling impacts. This fixes runtimes occuring whenever something fell.

    zxaber updated:

    • Nuke Ops (and Lone Ops) now start with a Syndicate-themed tablet, rather than the pinpointer. The Syndicate tablet comes pre-installed with an app that replaces the function of disk pinpointers.
    • Lifeline and Fission360, the apps that track suit sensors and nuke disks respectively, now show the tracking status on the screen of the tablet/laptop object itself, without needing to keep the window open.

    22 June 2020

    EdgeLordExe updated:

    • You can no longer raise the living as ghouls.
    • Mansus grasp and blood siphon no longer have infinite range.
    • Armsy can now actually attack with any of his bodyparts. fix:Armsy can now acutally walk in space.
    • replaced a few type paths with more descriptive ones.

    Gamer025 updated:

    • Blood drunk miner megafauna can no longer move structures like bolted down doors / windows

    Kathy Ryals updated:

    • Due to some very convincing paramedics, the medidrobe has been updated to include the paramedic jumpsuit and jumpskirt.

    Melbert updated:

    • Obsession picture objective no longer needs the obsessed themselves to be in the picture.
    • Obsession picture objective now works properly.

    TemporalOroboros updated:

    • Reagent exposure proc names now accurately describe their function.
    • Reagent exposure code is less `istype` dependent.

    WarlockD updated:

    • Preview works now
    • Clicking on "save" now previews correctly
    • Form fields now sized correctly
    • Form fields now save the data

    21 June 2020

    Jared-Fogle updated:

    • Pointing will now animate starting from you to the object you pointed at.

    20 June 2020

    Caldony updated:

    • NT finally decided to update the arcade battle video game after its terrible space game reviews from syndicate gaming.

    LemonInTheDark updated:

    • Fixed a "Feature" from 2 years ago. The sm will now pull objects closer to it based on the eer. This includes you, so be careful.
    • I've documented all of the sms variables.
    • Refactored sm code to be more modular. Badmins do not rejoice!

    19 June 2020

    Kathy Ryals updated:

    • The plant analyzer has been updated to be able to analyze a Podman health or chemical contents.

    LemonInTheDark updated:

    • The singularity will no longer turn snow or ice on icebox into lattices when at stage 5

    Ryll/Shaps updated:

    • Empaths are able to detect deafness derived from hearing damage
    • Inacusiate and Sensory Restoration no longer instantly heal all hearing damage when applied, instead rapidly removing both ear damage and deafness.
    • MedHUDs and observers now display quirks as intended on examine
    • Nanotrasen's Central Shipping department has put limits on the free shipping it offers on goody crates, to discourage abuse of its bluespace packaging

    SteelSlayer updated:

    • Removed a handful of unnecessary variables from intercoms.
    • Refactored intercom's code so that it doesn't need to process() and constantly check whether it's powered or EMP'd every few seconds.

    WarlockD updated:

    • Cyborgs can now use multi layer cable interface

    genessee596 updated:

    • TCG brand trading cards now show their rarity on the card, with tiers of rarity attached to a background color on the 'N' box on the bottom right corner.

    18 June 2020

    ATHATH updated:

    • pAIs no longer start with a medHUD, secHUD, and diagHUD turned on as soon as they're downloaded, even if they haven't bought any HUDs yet.
    • You can now take obligate carnivory grafts from jupiter cups.
    • You can now take fire resistance grafts from lavaland plants.

    Iamgoofball updated:

    • Gangsters are, in fact, antags, and can totally kill, destroy, and murder all they want.
    • Fixes GARBAGE DAY
    • Dynamic Families now goes from 30 to 15 minutes, instead of 60 to 30 minutes.
    • Space Cop Objectives have been changed in Families.

    ShizCalev updated:

    • Fixed a scenario that allowed infinite resource generation via ore machines.
    • Swarmers can no longer cut power lines by deconstructing catwalks underneath them.
    • Corrected a minor grammar error when attacking mobs with sharp stuff.
    • Clothing repair now works.
    • Fixed redundant "shredded x fell apart, completely shredded!" message when damaging clothing in your hands.
    • Added better pronoun handling for clothing that consist of a pair of items (ie shoes, gloves, ect)
    • Shredding clothing while holding it will no longer make you drop it.
    • Shredding clothing while holding it will no longer tell you that it fell off you.
    • Moths can no longer infinitely eat shredded clothing.
    • Tears in the very fabric of reality created by Eldritch gods can no longer be mended with acid, fire, and TK.

    TheSpaghetti updated:

    • orang

    Timberpoes updated:

    • Added scroll bar to ghost Orbit target selection menu.

    • organ transport box, if filled with cryostylene or ice it ll keep organs and bodyparts like heads inside frozen ( they dont decay)

    13 June 2020

    ATHATH updated:

    • The message that you receive when you try to use a gang induction package as a mindshielded person no longer implies that your mindshield has given you fake memories of attending an anti-gang seminar.

    Arkatos updated:

    • Unrestricted directional access settings will now show correct directions in the related UIs.
    • Theoretical radiuses will now show properly in the Tachyon-Doppler Array UI.

    Ryll/Shaps updated:

    • Medbot interaction menus are fixed
    • You can no longer queue multiple medbot flips at once
    • Medbots now have lots more to say, especially if you knock them over!

    Shadark updated:

    • Detective gets roundstart normal sunglasses instead of SecHUDs at PubbyStation.
    • Balanced access to arrest option through SecHUDs, now requiring Security access instead of Brig access.
    • Balanced access to portable turrets, now requiring Security access instead of Brig access.

    ShizCalev updated:

    • Fixed a scenario where changelings would have missing textures when disguised.
    • Fixed a scenario where camouflage items would have missing textures.
    • Items in your suit storage should have less missing textures now.
    • Restore the ion rifle's unique belt texture.
    • Fixed a few more belt items having missing textures.
    • Fixed washing machines sometimes fucking up an item's worn texture.

    tmtmtl30 updated:

    • dynamic families rulesets can now be forced and will execute instead of runtiming

    12 June 2020

    ATHATH updated:

    • Borgs and AIs now start with their borgHUDs/siliconHUDs on by default.

    Jared-Fogle updated:

    • Ghosts will now be revealed when the round is over.

    Ryll/Shaps updated:

    • Introduces medical wounds, new injuries that can happen to fleshy carbons when they sustain lots of damage on a bodypart. There's quite a lot of change here, but you can read the guide at: https://tgstation13.org/wiki/Guide_to_wounds and an extended changelog is available here: https://hackmd.io/l_FI9b3tSqa_woDadewJXA
    • Introduces scars and temporal scarring! Healing a wound leaves a scar behind that can be seen by examining someone twice rapidly, and if Temporal Scarring is enabled in character prefs, surviving a round with scars will save them to be granted at roundstart another round! Let your body tell stories!
    • Bleeding is now fully bodypart-focused, and 95% of bleeding comes from cut wounds from sharp weapons. Gauze is applied on a limb-by-limb basis, and helps staunch bloodflow rather than totally stop it. Notably, you no longer bleed just from having 40+ brute damage on a limb.
    • Organic bodyparts are no longer disabled at maximum damage, but are easier to cause wounds to
    • O2 medkits in emergency lockers have been replaced with new emergency medkits with basic tools for diagnosing and treating wounds and basic damage
    • Herapin now rapidly increases bleeding on all open cuts, rather than causing bleeding by itself. The more cuts on the target, the more it will affect them.
    • Neckgrab table slams now hit the targeted limb rather than just the head, with a large chance to dislocate or break a bone
    • Sharp weapons and burning weapons can now shred zones on jumpsuits, disabling protection on that limb. Damaged clothes can be repaired with cloth.
    • Slaughter demons now deal less raw damage, but gain the ability to cause cut wounds, which becomes more powerful with each attack on a humanoid but resets when bloodcrawling.

    Timberpoes updated:

    • Delta's Genetics Lab has been redesigned.
    • Pubby's Genetics Lab has been redesigned.
    • Science ID Card access levels have been redesigned. R&D now has its own dedicated access level with Toxins and Toxins Storage having their own dedicated access levels.
    • Science doors across all maps have had their access levels tweaked, especially around maintenance access and R&D access.
    • Geneticists now have R&D Access across all maps.
    • Xenobiology's Winter Coats now have a new set of pockets that can hold all the same equipment as a lab coat.
    • All Xenobiology secure containment areas there were missing them, now have Connector/Injector pairs for injecting gasses directly into secure containment.
    • Pubby's Xenobiology lab now has three slime spawns.
    • Pubby's Xenobiology lab has been expanded with addtional containment pens.
    • Meta's Xenobiology freezer no longer shares a pipe with Xenobio's air distribution pipes. Scientists should no longer freeze to death and space suits with internals are no longer necessary.
    • Delta's Xenobiology lab now requires Xenobiology access to enter.
    • Delta's Xenobiology lab has been expanded with additional containment pens.
    • Pubby's Toxins Mass Driver room now has an intercom.
    • Delta's Toxins Mass Driver room's intercom has been moved closer to the Tachyon-Doppler Research Array.
    • Prototype Hardsuits have been moved to the RD's Office on from Toxins on Meta and Pubby.
    • All Genetics Labs across all station now come fully equipped with Body Bags, Space Cleaner and Mutadone.
    • Box's Genetics Lab now has an air alarm.
    • Meta's Genetics Lab's camera has been moved so the AI can see the entire lab, including the Air Alarm.
    • Geneticists will no longer spawn in the monkey pen on Meta.
    • The Medical Laptop in Delta's Genetics lab can now be accessed by Geneticists.
    • Pubby's Robotics Lab now has a Cautery!
    • Probably more minor quality of life changes I forgot to document as I made them.

    Arkatos updated:

    • Holopad now uses tgui.

    • medbots built with the advance medkit heal all damage types

    Jared-Fogle updated:

    • Fixed the medical HUD sometimes reporting undefibbable bodies as defibbable and vice versa.
    • Fixed plasmamen needing hearts in order to be defibbed.
    • Fixed crew with HARS needing a brain to be defibbed.
    • Fixed defibrillators being borked. Sorry!

    Kelenius updated:

    • Hygienebot construction has been fixed.
    • Hygienebots now require a proximity sensor between welding and tubing.
    • Hygienebots no longer slip their path while chasing someone.
    • Hygienebots are less spammy.

    Ryll/Shaps updated:

    • You can now tip over medbots!

    ShizCalev updated:

    • Defibbing now works properly on ALL species that don't require hearts to survive, as opposed to just plasmamen.
    • Defibbing now works properly on mobs with the Muscled Veins trait if their heart was removed.

    TheChosenEvilOne updated:

    • Fixed dynamic giving antagonist roles to jobs that shouldn't get them (again).

    • Succesful restart votes will now complete instantly

    • bababooey

    04 June 2020

    ATHATH updated:

    • The 16 second hardstun that non-pAI mulebots with cut avoidance wires apply to living creatures they bump into has been replaced with a much more tame 8 second knockdown.

    ArcaneMusic updated:

    • Organic Pest Killer is now available in the biogenerator.
    • Pest Killer and Weed Killer now applies the correct amount of toxicity and doesn't individually harm the plant's health.
    • Pest/Week killer bottles now have a transfer rate of 1 ,2, and 5 units per use, and a max capacity of 30 units.

    Fikou updated:

    • atmos jumpsuit now has the same armor values as engi jumpsuit
    • replaces plasma in bluespace beaker design with plastic

    Ryll/Shaps updated:

    • Cigarette packets now have coupons on the back for small cargo items! Smoking DOES pay!
    • Single/small items in cargo have been rebranded as goodies, come in lockboxes rather than crates, and can only be purchased with private accounts. They also are immune to the 10% private account fee, obviously.

    Skoglol updated:

    • Removed some dead unused code in languages.
    • Box gravity generator and AI core APC rewired to smes, will not run out roundstart anymore. P.A.C.M.A.N. added to grav gen for emergencies.

    TheChosenEvilOne updated:

    • Dynamic will no longer give antagonist roles to jobs who shouldn't have them when restricted roles is set in the config.

    Tlaltecuhtli updated:

    • lightfloor makes colored lights and are more visible
    • you can turn them off/on by using your screwdriver
    • you can emp em
    • breaking them actually works
    • using a broken bulb wont fix em sprites: flicker states for each colour

    necromanceranne updated:

    • Neckgrabs and especially floor neckgrabs are no longer near impossible to escape.
    • Resisting a grab is more consistent across the board, but you get less chances at resisting a grab and take more stamina damage.

    ArcaneMusic updated:

    • The hallway on icebox mining is slightly longer. and the ladder deposits you in the locker room.
    • The icebox mining ladder works again.

    Fhaxaris updated:

    • Split the Ignore verb into two verbs (Ignore and Unignore)
    • Unignore allows you to view your ignore list
    • Unignore allows you to unignore players who are offline
    • Ignore and Unignore should not interfere with Stealth Mode

    • The "incarcerated" sec hud icon gets a new sprite that is not a P

    Timberpoes updated:

    • Antiglow will now absorb all light equally.
    • Improved waddling for big things.

      • The Nanotrasen Entertainment Division has released a new product: Tarot cards! They're available from the Fun vendor for all your divination needs.

      Jared-Fogle updated:

      • Fixed the medical HUD sometimes reporting undefibbable bodies as defibbable and vice versa.
      • Fixed plasmamen needing hearts in order to be defibbed.
      • Fixed crew with HARS needing a brain to be defibbed.
      • Fixed defibrillators being borked. Sorry!

      Kelenius updated:

      • Hygienebot construction has been fixed.
      • Hygienebots now require a proximity sensor between welding and tubing.
      • Hygienebots no longer slip their path while chasing someone.
      • Hygienebots are less spammy.

      Ryll/Shaps updated:

      • You can now tip over medbots!

      ShizCalev updated:

      • Defibbing now works properly on ALL species that don't require hearts to survive, as opposed to just plasmamen.
      • Defibbing now works properly on mobs with the Muscled Veins trait if their heart was removed.

      • Fixed dynamic giving antagonist roles to jobs that shouldn't get them (again).

      • Succesful restart votes will now complete instantly

      ATHATH updated:

      • The 16 second hardstun that non-pAI mulebots with cut avoidance wires apply to living creatures they bump into has been replaced with a much more tame 8 second knockdown.

      • Pest Killer and Weed Killer now applies the correct amount of toxicity and doesn't individually harm the plant's health.

      • replaces plasma in bluespace beaker design with plastic

      • Changed the way h2o interacts with the engine. It should acts similar to o2 normally, but in high concentrations it cools the engine down. Have fun :)

      07 September 2020

      CRITAWAKETS updated:

      • Nanotrasen has updated the cooling setup of telecommunications rooms in Delta-Pattern Stations. It now makes the simulation faster.

      Dennok updated:

      • passive gate max out limit pressure settings increased
      • passive gate description more precise

      Maurukas updated:

      • Cryo cells work again and are no longer permanent icy prisons

      Timberpoes updated:

      • Reduced Diagnostics nanite program has been removed.
      • Nanite Debugging nanite program has been added. This program causes your nanites to display their program list when scanned, but comes with a 0.1/s nanite cost.
      • Reduced Diagnostics nanite program functionality is now default behaviour. The nanite program list is hidden from nanite scanners by default. You now now to include the Nanite Debugging program to show the program list on scan.
      • Researching Harmonic Nanite Programming now confers a passive boost of 0.1 regen rate to all nanite clouds. This boost takes effects as soon as the node is researched.
      • Harmonic Nanite Programming research node now requires 3000 General and 3000 Nanite research, an increase of 1000 each.

      06 September 2020

      Bumtickley00 updated:

      • The blood filter can now be put in medical belts and medical aid kits
      • Spray bottles, amputation shears, and surgical tape can now be put in the medical aid kit
      • Printing and recycling bonesetters no longer creates materials from nothing

      Radacitus updated:

      • Adds a new Ingredient Beacon and gives it to the Chef in-place of their Ingredient Box on spawn.
      • Adds some custom text that appears when you use the Chef and Curator Beacons.

      Ryll/Shaps updated:

      • Fixed an issue preventing zombies from being decappable. Krokodil addict zombies are also no longer immune to wounds
      • Eswords/dual sabers/armblades/light eaters/similar weapons no longer have significantly reduced wounding power and are similar in dismembering power to their old incarnations. In addition, they are moderately less hard-countered by armor.
      • Attacking a prone target will now hit the targeted limb 90% of the time rather than the standard 80% (50% less likely to hit a different limb)
      • Sutures and cauterization are more effective at patching up piercing wounds
      • Improvised cauterization (anything hot that isn't a cautery) is now slightly less efficient and requires an aggressive grab to apply to the target. No more accidentally trying to cauterize the guy you just attacked with an esword!

      YPOQ updated:

      • Fixed internal martyrdom.

      nightred updated:

      • Many stomach issues
      • Health Analyzers, and medical kiosk now show stomach contents

    04 September 2020

    ATHATH updated:

    • The "plating repair tool" has been added to the game in the form of a printable upgrade for janiborgs. It's a subtype of the cautery that can repair burnt or damaged hull platings, allowing floor tiles to be placed over them once again.
    • The upgrade that adds it to a janiborg's list of tools can be printed once the Cyborg Upgrades: Utility tech node is researched.

    ArcaneMusic updated:

    • You can't use the civilain bounty console while depowered anymore.

    Fikou updated:

    • spy glasses now use an action button instead of a verb, so they are less cryptic and someone will know how to use them
    • spy glasses are now sunglasses, removes the sunglasses from det's office so you can just take the spy ones from your locker

    Ghilker updated:

    • Icebox pipe layering error

    Jack7D1 updated:

    • Swarmers can no longer break walls with large pressure differences across them.

    Jared-Fogle updated:

    • Suit storage units now use a radial menu.
    • Suit storage units now put the items in your hand, rather than on the ground.
    • Icons have temporarily been removed from the alt click menu citing significant performance concerns. They will be brought back soon.

    ShizCalev updated:

    • Fixed light eaters not consuming helmet / gun lights.

    SpaceManiac updated:

    • Zipper noises are no longer played on the lobby screen when a character joins with a random-colored jumpsuit.
    • The "Fit Viewport" verb and preference now take into account a 300px minimum width for the chat, in case widescreen is combined with a narrow window.

    itseasytosee updated:

    • supermatter tongs holding supermatter shards now have working in hand sprites
    • The obsessed trauma now includes a policy config option like other antagonists.

    bobbahbrown updated:

    • Runechat messages now overlap (roughly) based on the time at which they were said, this means newer messages will be on top of older ones.

    nightred updated:

    • Delta removed an extra intercom in toxins
    • Slime People can swap between their bodies more freely.

    21 August 2020

    ATHATH updated:

    • You can now activate an away mission's exit gateway regardless of whether or not the station-side gateway is still open.

    • Resist now correctly makes you stop, drop, and roll.
    • The Clarke's weight has been reduced, causing it not to break floor tiles anymore.

    11 May 2020

    LemonInTheDark updated:

    • Dear out of date coders, you will now be yelled at to update to the correct version of byond, rather then an unsupported one.

    • Lighting corner updates are ever so slightly faster.

    antropod updated:

    • Chemical Press can now make patches and bottles

    nemvar updated:

    • Fixed a lot of broken sprites.

    10 May 2020

    Couls updated:

    • Give item keybind, default to G. Press it while holding an item to offer it to someone nearby, they can click the alert they get to accept it or move for it to go away
    • There is a right click menu option for giving

    Fikou updated:

    • the lord singulo syndie kit now has a mining id upgrade and a 10000 credits so you can actually bother with getting a singulo running

    • The Nanotrasen Entertainment Division would like to remind everyone that any resemblance Kotahi bears to any other card game, real or fictional, is a coincidence. Kotahi is legally distinct.
    • removed some old sprites they're unimportant please don't look

    • Gold wheelchair, only for people with 5k hardcore random mode points

    Ryll/Shaps updated:

    • MULEbots can't be used as steamrollers anymore.

    • Hydroponics trays now obey transfer amounts when dealing with water.

    Couls updated:

  • Potato Batteries display properly now

    • Thebleh updated:

    Ryll/Shaps updated:

    • Wigs no longer appear on the examine lists of people wearing them
    • You can emote while conscious again

    nightred updated:

    • Prevents fire from becoming permanent

    02 September 2020

    ATHATH updated:

    • Penthrite no longer makes you immune to staminacrit.
    • Penthrite no longer has an effect on people who can't metabolize it.
    • Spam-buckling and spam-unbuckling someone to/from a stasis bed while they have penthrite in their system will no longer cause them to enter a state of permanent critical condition.
    • If you regain the ability to metabolize chems while you have penthrite in your system, you'll also regain the special traits (immunity to hardcrit, immunity to softcrit, and immunity to the effects of heart failure) that penthrite's supposed to give you.
    • Penthrite now makes you immune to the damage over time that being in crit gives you, so as to better mimic its previous/intended effects.
    • Penthrite's description has been modified slightly.

    Arkatos updated:

    • Admin controlled shuttles will now redirect to an actual shuttle controls upon authorization request instead of always targeting CentCom ferry. Admin staff can now also alternatively unlock or relock the shuttle upon request.
    • Escape pods no longer start as admin controlled shuttles, they simply start locked until appropriate code level is set.

    Fikou updated:

    • The Games vendor now holds a box of "Pin the tail on the Corgi".

    Couls updated:

    • You can now rebind OOC, Say and Me
    • Newly added keybinds try to bind to their defaults when added and fail if the key is already taken
    • communication keybinds
    • Communication and movement keybinds can now be properly unbound

    Cyberboss updated:

    • Fixed advanced proc calls not sanitizing returned html correctly.

    Dennok updated:

    • Add back Hilbert's Hotel, which once again correctly loads its stored rooms.
    • fixed a template loaded hidden things.

    EdgeLordExe updated:

    • fixed the bad descriptions in a few summon recipes
    • rust walker now requires a head.
    • stalker needs eyes insted of a knife.

    Fikou updated:

    • fixes golem ship having rocks on engine places
    • fixes pubby chapel having centcom airlocks
    • fixes ice box having shifted lights on mining base

    Ghilker updated:

    • Crystal Invasion event is no longer random and is now a delamination event. When a delaminating crystal has high power, but not enough to collapse into a tesla, it may instead trigger the Crystal Invasion event when the countdown hits 0. This gives the crew one last opportunity to complete the event and restore their crystal back to normal.

    Hamcha updated:

    • Jumpskirts no longer re-sew themselves into jumpsuits when being dyed in a washing machine

    Hulkamania updated:

    • Other stations will now receive your emergency shuttle request reason! Tell them just how much plasma you're breathing!

    Iamgoofball updated:

    • Space Cops now spawn with a Disabler alongside their existing weapon, and no longer have Gang HUDs.

    Jared-Fogle updated:

    • When you get ghost images on inventory buttons, you can now hover over and out to clear it.

    LemonInTheDark updated:

    • Glowshrooms might be a bit faster idk

    • fixed supermatter shutters on pubby

    Skoglol updated:

    • Aux base is now a separate access. Removed construction access from curator. Everyone else that had access to aux base before has gotten the new access, except for geneticists.

    TemporalOroboros updated:

    • Added mapping variants for a bunch of atmos machinery.
    • unlocked atmos full layer potential (now 5 layers avaiable instead of 3, not all objects can use the additional layers)
    • More flavor texts to crystal event related devices and structures to help players on what to do
    • Ability to close the portals by using the combination of Analizer+Signaler
    • Crystal monsters have now different ability but similar health and damage
    • You can sacrifice someone to the crystal to increase the spawn delay by 5 seconds permanently
    • sound effects to the destabilized crystal
    • spawned anomalies don't explode anymore
    • event will end in a reasonable time
    • Added a word to fix messaging with the slot machine.
    • Kotahi decks will now Shuffle properly

    XDTM updated:

    • Abductor healing glands now properly check organ damage when detecting which organs to replace.
    • Abductor healing glands can now replace damaged stomachs and inflamed appendixes.
    • Abductor healing glands now also reject implants (like mindshield implants) on top of cybernetic organs.

    Timberpoes updated:

    • Click-dragging behaviour has been restored to normal. Players will no longer attempt to buckle things to other things except when they quite intend to.
    • R&D Consoles are no longer required to operate other machinery including mechfabs, omni-protolathes, omni-imprinters and the destructive analyzer. These consoles have been removed and replaced with basic modular computers.
    • The destructive analyzer has lost its material reclaimation feature. It now only destroys items and unlocks techweb nodes.

    Wayland-Smithy updated:

    • Spectral Blade - Ghosts that orbit it or the holder are no longer forced to spectate it until the end of time. Huzzah!
    • For real. Not kidding. You can answer the call to aid someone with your spooky presence and then STOP ORBITING ON YOUR OWN AT ANY TIME just like any other object.
    • Ghosts no longer receive a redundant orbit link when the Spectral Blade is raised.
    • Alien larva can no longer evolve in vents and become stuck.

    oranges updated:

    • New achievements for science

    tralezab updated:

    • mafia lobby now refreshes correctly!

    • The public can now exit the labor shuttle arrivals area on Box and Delta, without having to wait for the AI or sec to let them out.
    • The gulag teleporter will now give prison jumpskirts, if the player's preference is set to jumpskirt.

    ArcaneMusic updated:

    tralezab updated:

    • New swab for netherworld critters! Make sure you put them into a different vat system than your other ones, as they do not react well with normal reagents!
    • Hypernoblium now turns into a reagent when inhaled, which stops the combustion if on a Plasmaman system.
    • Plasmaman interaction with Hypernoblium in the air, stop combustion and extinguishes if they are already on fire.
    • Trash bags can no longer be equipped on belt.

    ATHATH updated:

    • Unborks the sensory restoration symptom. It should work like having oculine and inacusiate in your system now.
    • Adjusts inacusiate's description to more accurately reflect what it actually does.
    • The eye_blind and eye_blurry healing from oculine is no longer instant, although oculine still has its 20% chance per chem tick to instantly remove the TRAIT_BLIND trait from you (if it was caused by eye damage).
    • Replaces the "You are now blinking manually." fake positive message from the hallucigen symptom with a "Your ears feel great." message.
    • Fixes a typo in one of the messages from the sensory restoration symptom.

    29 August 2020

    ATHATH updated:

    • The Airlock Painter should now paint airlocks in all appropriate scenarios where it failed to do so before.
    • The Dwarfism mutation no longer bends and breaks reality. As a result, Flat Felinid Friday is once again cancelled.
    • You can now throw a lot of throwable things over railings where previously you couldn't. Including people. Just like God intended.
    • Suit Storage Units will now correctly eject their contents in a variety of scenarios where previously they would refuse to do so.
    • Grinders and Slime Processors no longer eject their own components.
    • Cotton seeds now appear in their appropriate alphabetical place in MegaSeed Servitor vendors.
    • Wizards using the Warp Whistle will no longer become permanently immobilised.
    • Blob spores from gold slime core and hostile life reactions are now marked as being independent, meaning that they can now drag things, but can no longer freely walk through blob tiles.
    • Independent blob spores and blobbernauts can now speak over blob chat like overmind-dependent blob mobs do.
    • Blob spores can no longer damage the environment, for realzies this time. This change does not affect blob zombies.
    • Removed an unused variable from tech nodes (and the unused proc that references it).

    ArcaneMusic updated:

    • Admins can now spawn the Teambuilding machine for assign teams, like Red or Blue, quickly!
    • Sinks and showers can now have reagents piped into them.
    • Using metal sheets on reagent dispensers will now produce a plumbing-enabled supply tank for station use.
    • Added a new stock part, the water recycler, used in building showers and sinks from scratch.
    • Hydroponics trays are now plumbing enabled. Water and nutrients will be sorted into their appropriate slots when piped in.
    • Sinks and showers now have internal water reservoirs, and start filled with water.
    • Showers and sinks must be constructed from a frame, then finished with a water recycler. remove: Hydroponics hoses have been removed in favor of actual plumbing between machines.

    Donkie updated:

    • Fixed regular pump on map icon north/south being misaligned by 1 pixel

    EdgeLordExe updated:

    • Rust_spread will no longer lag servers into oblivion
    • Changed a few flavour texts to better represent lore.
    • Rustbringer's oath now properly only heals while on rusted tiles.

    stylemistake updated:

    • tgchat: Unread message count is now smarter and won't increase on other tabs if you have already read the same message in the active tab.
    • tgchat: Admin PMs are now properly annotated and can be filtered into separate tabs.
    • tgchat: Fix: Highlighted message overlay no longer blocks clicks. Clicking a highlighted `(F)` link should work as it should.
    • tgui: Fixed NTOS bluescreen due to calling `.includes()` on a stylesheet href which could be null on certain browsers.
    • tgchat: Chat schema bumped to version 5. All chat-related settings were reset to avoid breakage.
    • tgchat: Fixed adminsay to no longer show up as [object Object].

    wesoda25 updated:

    • Ethereal power capacity and interactions with power sources has been scaled upwards. Ethereals will now have a more significant impact upon the sources they choose to receive power from.
    • The time it takes for an ethereal to drain a power cell has been increased a little, and the time for lights has been decreased a little.

    zxaber updated:

    • Cyborgs now have a Highlander module to use when said gamemode is enabled. The Highlander borg module comes equipped with a claymore, a pinpointer, and traditional garments for the occasion. Like humanoid contenders, Highlander borgs will die in three strikes.
    • AIs will become Highlander Cyborgs upon Highlander mode being triggered.
    • Humanoid Highlander contenders now get a syndicate headset, so that banter may live on even if telecomms does not.
    • Humanoid Highlander contenders are now immune to shocks, preventing them from being able to claim a cyborg killed them with an unfair shocked door.
    • It is no longer possible to succeed as a highlander contenders if other contenders are alive on the shuttle.
    • Borg tool storage huds no longer freak out if there are zero stored modules.
    • Borgs can choose their flashlight colors again.
