    • pAIs now use a radial menu to choose their holochassis skins.

    CRITAWAKETS updated:

    • Icebox now has an elevator! I just took the trousers of every shaft miner to batter town, word.

    25 September 2020

    ArcaneDefence updated:

    • Mothpeople now have a preference to choose their antennae type from.
    • Mothpeople will no longer have floating antennae when decapitated.

    Couls updated:

    • remove obsolete face-direction keybinds

    Gandalf2k15 updated:

    • Adds a new admin shuttle call option: No recall.
    • Gives admins the option to enable or disable the shuttle.

    Iatots updated:

    • You can now bash your hand on glass with harm intent. (no damage obviously)
    • Paper walls have correct sounds, paper doors are not rotated.

    Mickyan updated:

    • The Freerunning quirk now lets you avoid brute damage from falling
    • Fixed falling from z-levels causing more damage than intended

    NotRanged, Gandalf2k15 updated:

    • Changed explosion sound code to be more noticeable and terrifying throughout the station during siginificant explosive events.

    TheBonded updated:

    • Rebalanced Plastanium windows integrity and damage_deflection

    Timberpoes updated:

    • Additional language manuals available from certain space ruins. Lets you learn a new basic language from the roundstart species language pool - And if you're lucky, your friends can too.
    • Pubby and Ceres whiteships now have nav consoles.
    • All whiteships now emit GPS signals from their nav consoles. As a result, the Pubby whiteship now has a GPS signal.
    • Space exploration got a number of tweaks. Expect to see some old loot vanish and some new loot to appear in its place. New random loot spawns have been added in various ruins. More ruins have GPS signals. Space-ruin and whiteship GPS signals are no longer uniquely named.

    TiviPlus updated:

    • Makes decals an element

    YoYoBatty updated:

    • Wall mounted sparkers should now work

    24 September 2020

    ArcaneDefence updated:

    • Vatbeasts, gelatinous cubes, and sholean grapes are visible after being revived now

    ArcaneMusic updated:

    • RCDing the top 2 levels of icebox's snow will create an open gap, where you can fall between z-levels.
    • Bombing an area heavily on icebox's top 2 floors can also result in chasms leading to the second level.
    • Building atop openspace on icebox no longer produces magical snow under your lattices.

    CoffeeDragon16 updated:

    • Non-motorized wheelchairs are now manufactured to be foldable.

    Couls updated:

    • vis dir changes are now handled by vis_flags

    EdgeLordExe updated:

    • Ash ascension now deals 5 times less damage
    • Ascension achievments for heretics.
    • Flesh ascension was reworked to now allow for you to transform into armsy and into human at will.
    • Marks are now applied using the mansus grasp and procced using the sickly blade
    • You can now shatter your sickly blade, which teleports you to a random safe turf on the station.
    • Blood siphon is a pointed spell
    • you can now choose your sacrifice out of 3 random people.
    • sacrifices now give you 2 charges
    • less influences now spawn on the station
    • Changed a few summon recipes.
    • Flesh ascension now triples your max amount of ghouls
    • heretics no longer have stalk objective
    • heretics now can roll die a glorius death or hijack objective.
    • pierced realities start to appear 10 seconds after being harvested.

    Floof Ball / Kathrin Morrison updated:

    • Craftable jumbo chess pieces. Have an 8x8 space on the station? Have a public match people can watch!
    • New shutter sprites. Adds windowed and radiation-proofed shutters.
    • New sofa, craftable in-game with metal like the regular sofas.
    • Sofas now have working armrests.

    Investigator77 updated:

    • Large welding fuel tanks are now red instead of white. Large tanks now also have a difference in size.
    • Cell chargers, PKA Modkits, light switches and buttons have been touched up a bit.
    • The incinerator button no longer looks like just a light switch

    Jared-Fogle updated:

    • The "Who" verb now uses a table rather than a list.
    • The block movement key now locks turning like it used to.
    • Suit storage unit radial menus now close when you walk away.
    • Clicking a suit storage unit slot will try to put the item inside.
    • You can now use suit storage units while the power is out.

    Melbert updated:

    • Minor fixes for the food storage component.

    Timberpoes updated:

    • Non-gameplay impacting runtime related to antag datums.
    • Code causing antag datums to silently fail when unusual error states occur has been replaced. This will cause errors that were previously ignored to now generate runtimes.
    • Assuming direct control of mobs now appropriately updates the verb tabs. Notably, this fixes ghosts who accept offered AI roles not getting the AI verb tab, but will fix all instances of special verbs not unlocking for every other mob type too.
    • Machine boards and components are now stored in the machine contents list instead of in nullspace. This allows for new interactions with the contents of machines. To give context - C4 attached to a circuitboard that is then used to build a machine will actually explode inside the machine instead of exploding off the map in the hypothetical nullspace. Find new and creative ways to murder your friends!
    • Monkeys using bars of soap will no longer cause runtimes.
    • The AI will no longer partially state laws or potentially even state incorrect laws entirely whenever their lawset is changed in the middle of stating laws.
    • Portable Turret now uses tgui.

    Ryll/Shaps updated:

    • Nanotrasen now uses smaller fonts on ID's to show age and account information, requiring a closer look to read

    ShizCalev updated:

    • Fixed revenant's light overload ability not blowing lights in a square if there was another broken/burnt out/empty light in it.
    • Fixed showing a piece of paper to a camera not working if there was an AI that had died or has remote access disabled.
    • Bank cards will now still give you notifications if you're standing next to another player who has them disabled.
    • Fixed bronze golems' gong ability not working if there was a dead mob on screen.
    • Fixed bone golems' bonechill ability not working if there was any mobs that were undead, resistant to cold, or also golems on screen.
    • Fixed a scenario where you would be unable to offer someone an item if you already had a pending item offer with someone else standing near you.

    WarlockD updated:

    • Suit cell charge on stat panel
    • Suit cell gauge works now

    coiax updated:

    • The Nanite Host Scan program can now scan the host for wounds.

    sergeirocks100 updated:

    • Malt Liquor can now be obtained from your local Booze-O-Mat

    25 June 2020

    ATHATH updated:

    • The tox purging threshold for livers has been changed from 3u to 3u * [liver's health]/[liver's maximum health].

    EdgeLordExe updated:

    • Otherwordly presence has taken more control over the holes in reality.
    • Influences now actually spawn randomly on the station.

    Jared-Fogle updated:

    • The search bar will now automatically focus when you open up the orbit menu, the uplink, the biogenerator, and the camera console.

    Melbert updated:

    • Allows the HONK Oingo-Boingo Punch-Face to toggle between lethal and non-lethal modes.
    • The HONK Oingo-Boingo Punch-Face's throw distance now scales on how much damage it deals. By default, it's the same distance as before.
    • Pacifists can no longer use the HONK Oingo-Boingo Punch-Face to damage people.
    • Admins can now edit the damage of the HONK Oingo-Boingo Punch-Face. Honk.

    • You can open paper ui with double shift click

    Timberpoes updated:

    • Belts in Delta EVA and the Ashwalker Ruins no longer show up as ERRORs.
    • Science are now able to print DNA Scanner boards. Boards associated with Genetics are now only printable in Science and have been removed from Medical printers.

    bobbahbrown updated:

    • You get a notice if you are unable to succumb to death
    • Icebox had many plumbing, and wiring issues fixed
    • Slicing foods now needs a tool with a sharp edge.
    • Cleaned up the gain of the no breath trait to clear moods and alerts
    • Removed exploitable world/topic command server_hop

    silicons updated:

    • Buffed gravitokinetic stands, and they can't hurt their user anymore.

    zxaber updated:

    • Added tablets to borgs. Go bug a human to get some apps installed.
    • Added RoboTact, a borg self-management app to said tablet. This replaces all borg verbs.
    • Removed all borg verbs in favor of the app.
    • Some lesser-used elements on the borg hud are now in the management app.

    23 September 2020

    ATHATH updated:

    • Adding a symptom to a virus that already has 4 or 5 symptoms in it no longer has a chance of removing a random symptom from that virus.

    AnturK updated:

    • Added custom statues. Create carving block from 5 sheets of material then use a chisel on it.

    Dennok updated:

    • Some fixes to map_template.load() to make it less runtime.

    Ryll/Shaps updated:

    • Projectiles now properly display impact messages on people as well as blood impact splatters
    • Embedded objects now properly use the "a" article rather than "the" when relevant
    • Dismemberment will no longer lead to phantom scars showing up on a person's missing limbs. Insert your own MGSV joke here.
    • Fixed some bad logic that made self-treating severe/critical broken bones with bone gel have 63%/83% base fail rates, instead of 25%/45% as intended. As such, self-treating these wounds is now far less likely to fail, though you'll still have to wait for the effect.
    • The bonuses to the above self-treatment success rates from drunkenness, morphine, and determination are a bit higher as well.
    • You can now see what wound types a detached limb is suffering by inspecting it

    Timberpoes updated:

    • The AI can now move its camera up z-levels as well as down by using the option in the IC tab. If you're an AI and you can't see anything, your camera may be on the wrong Z-level. Try moving it up or returning hitting the button to return to your core.

    TiviPlus updated:

    • Removed devil and affiliated shitcode
    • Mecha medical and other_equipment refactor

    imsxz updated:

    • you can now pat carbon mobs on the head.

    necromanceranne updated:

    • Makes the darkblade fit on your back instead of your belt.
    • Adds a whole bunch of missing sprites for: the nullrod, cult blade, spellblade, claymores and dark scythe, among others.
    • Updates the on-mobs for shotguns a little, and fixes several high powered firearms being concealable in suit storage slots.
    • Makes stunprods visible in suit storage slots.

    Couls updated:

    • Statpanel subsystem is now prioritized to run after the chat subsystem does

    Dennok updated:

    • fixed a few random ruin map issues

    Ghilker updated:

    • Added a minimum amount for healium knock down, added a warning when traces are present
    • Remove knockdown, added sleep (less intense effect) refractor: refractored sleeping debuff to take in consideration the TRAIT_SLEEPIMMUNE refractor: moved the healing effects to the reagent
    • removed oxyloss from the reagent effect
    • lowered the amount of healing done by the healium gas
    • increased the radiation amount of proto-nitrate bz response when less than 30 moles
    • increased the hallucination amount of the same reaction by a 0.2 factor

    Rohesie updated:

    • Keys no longer have a lifetime of 15 keypresses, meaning you can ctrl+movement keys ad infinitum again.
    • Pressing Esc now has the same effect as releasing all held/pressed keys from the keyboard. Handy if one gets stuck.
    • Removed the old functionality in which Esc would delete what's on the input bar when not focused. Remove/backspace still does that.

    Timberpoes updated:

    • Spamming the spin emote, also known as tactical combat spinning, no longer counters new flash mechanics.
    • Skeletons and other bloodless and/or heartless creatures should no longer suffer from heart attacks. This includes those whose hearts have been rendered obsolete via surgery.
    • Fixes issue where overweight characters would be eternally fat and starving characters would become eternally starving on changing species to one that doesn't eat.

    ArcaneMusic updated:

    • The QM office is now where the cargo warehouse is.

    19 September 2020

    ArcaneDefence updated:

    • Spinning while the emote is on cooldown will make you confused, dizzy, and eventually puke if you go too fast.

    Joe Berry updated:

    • The ice hermit ruin now properly falls from orbit onto icebox.

    LemonInTheDark updated:

    • The atmos subsystem costs represent the full use of the cost now, take a look and cry tears of blood

    Mickyan updated:

    • Added new siding floor decals for mapping
    • onZImpact no longer does throw_impact. This was broken anyways. Code must now manually handle multiz falling impacts. This fixes runtimes occuring whenever something fell.

    zxaber updated:

    • Nuke Ops (and Lone Ops) now start with a Syndicate-themed tablet, rather than the pinpointer. The Syndicate tablet comes pre-installed with an app that replaces the function of disk pinpointers.
    • Lifeline and Fission360, the apps that track suit sensors and nuke disks respectively, now show the tracking status on the screen of the tablet/laptop object itself, without needing to keep the window open.

    EdgeLordExe updated:

    • You can no longer raise the living as ghouls.

    Kathy Ryals updated:

    • The plant analyzer has been updated to be able to analyze a Podman health or chemical contents.

    • The singularity will no longer turn snow or ice on icebox into lattices when at stage 5

    Ryll/Shaps updated:

    • Empaths are able to detect deafness derived from hearing damage
    • Inacusiate and Sensory Restoration no longer instantly heal all hearing damage when applied, instead rapidly removing both ear damage and deafness.
    • MedHUDs and observers now display quirks as intended on examine
    • Nanotrasen's Central Shipping department has put limits on the free shipping it offers on goody crates, to discourage abuse of its bluespace packaging

    • Refactored intercom's code so that it doesn't need to process() and constantly check whether it's powered or EMP'd every few seconds.

    ATHATH updated:

    • pAIs no longer start with a medHUD, secHUD, and diagHUD turned on as soon as they're downloaded, even if they haven't bought any HUDs yet.

    • You can now take fire resistance grafts from lavaland plants.

    Iamgoofball updated:

    • Gangsters are, in fact, antags, and can totally kill, destroy, and murder all they want.
    • Fixes GARBAGE DAY

    • Space Cop Objectives have been changed in Families.

    ShizCalev updated:

    • Fixed a scenario that allowed infinite resource generation via ore machines.
    • Swarmers can no longer cut power lines by deconstructing catwalks underneath them.
    • Corrected a minor grammar error when attacking mobs with sharp stuff.
    • Clothing repair now works.
    • Fixed redundant "shredded x fell apart, completely shredded!" message when damaging clothing in your hands.
    • Added better pronoun handling for clothing that consist of a pair of items (ie shoes, gloves, ect)
    • Shredding clothing while holding it will no longer make you drop it.
    • Shredding clothing while holding it will no longer tell you that it fell off you.
    • Moths can no longer infinitely eat shredded clothing.
    • Tears in the very fabric of reality created by Eldritch gods can no longer be mended with acid, fire, and TK.

    Timberpoes updated:

    • Modular laptops and tablets will no longer experience abnormal behaviour including unclickable UI elements when placed in your bag, and will now close their interfaces appropriately.
    • The upper section of the robotics mech bay room on Metastation is no longer shielded from radiation and you now have to enter the maintenance section to be safe.
    • Flashes are now more reliable and flashes hit by EMP will appropriately blind or not blind people based on whether they are facing the flash or not.
    • Hilbert's Hotel and its associated ruin have been removed from the game.
    • Severing and almost severing a body part should now always display the proper gruesome wounds messages instead of occasionally runtiming.

    ATHATH updated:

    Ryll/Shaps updated:

    • Introduces medical wounds, new injuries that can happen to fleshy carbons when they sustain lots of damage on a bodypart. There's quite a lot of change here, but you can read the guide at: https://tgstation13.org/wiki/Guide_to_wounds and an extended changelog is available here: https://hackmd.io/l_FI9b3tSqa_woDadewJXA
    • Introduces scars and temporal scarring! Healing a wound leaves a scar behind that can be seen by examining someone twice rapidly, and if Temporal Scarring is enabled in character prefs, surviving a round with scars will save them to be granted at roundstart another round! Let your body tell stories!
    • Bleeding is now fully bodypart-focused, and 95% of bleeding comes from cut wounds from sharp weapons. Gauze is applied on a limb-by-limb basis, and helps staunch bloodflow rather than totally stop it. Notably, you no longer bleed just from having 40+ brute damage on a limb.
    • Organic bodyparts are no longer disabled at maximum damage, but are easier to cause wounds to
    • O2 medkits in emergency lockers have been replaced with new emergency medkits with basic tools for diagnosing and treating wounds and basic damage
    • Herapin now rapidly increases bleeding on all open cuts, rather than causing bleeding by itself. The more cuts on the target, the more it will affect them.
    • Neckgrab table slams now hit the targeted limb rather than just the head, with a large chance to dislocate or break a bone
    • Sharp weapons and burning weapons can now shred zones on jumpsuits, disabling protection on that limb. Damaged clothes can be repaired with cloth.
    • Slaughter demons now deal less raw damage, but gain the ability to cause cut wounds, which becomes more powerful with each attack on a humanoid but resets when bloodcrawling.

    Timberpoes updated:

    • Delta's Genetics Lab has been redesigned.
    • Pubby's Genetics Lab has been redesigned.
    • Science ID Card access levels have been redesigned. R&D now has its own dedicated access level with Toxins and Toxins Storage having their own dedicated access levels.
    • Science doors across all maps have had their access levels tweaked, especially around maintenance access and R&D access.
    • Geneticists now have R&D Access across all maps.
    • Xenobiology's Winter Coats now have a new set of pockets that can hold all the same equipment as a lab coat.
    • All Xenobiology secure containment areas there were missing them, now have Connector/Injector pairs for injecting gasses directly into secure containment.
    • Pubby's Xenobiology lab now has three slime spawns.
    • Pubby's Xenobiology lab has been expanded with addtional containment pens.
    • Meta's Xenobiology freezer no longer shares a pipe with Xenobio's air distribution pipes. Scientists should no longer freeze to death and space suits with internals are no longer necessary.
    • Delta's Xenobiology lab now requires Xenobiology access to enter.
    • Delta's Xenobiology lab has been expanded with additional containment pens.
    • Pubby's Toxins Mass Driver room now has an intercom.
    • Delta's Toxins Mass Driver room's intercom has been moved closer to the Tachyon-Doppler Research Array.
    • Prototype Hardsuits have been moved to the RD's Office on from Toxins on Meta and Pubby.
    • All Genetics Labs across all station now come fully equipped with Body Bags, Space Cleaner and Mutadone.
    • Box's Genetics Lab now has an air alarm.
    • Meta's Genetics Lab's camera has been moved so the AI can see the entire lab, including the Air Alarm.
    • Geneticists will no longer spawn in the monkey pen on Meta.
    • The Medical Laptop in Delta's Genetics lab can now be accessed by Geneticists.
    • Pubby's Robotics Lab now has a Cautery!
    • Probably more minor quality of life changes I forgot to document as I made them.

    11 June 2020

    Arkatos updated:

    • Tachyon-Doppler Array now uses tgui.

    Inept updated:

    • Card collectors, rejoice! The NTED has released a new binder for storing your TCG cards. Pick one up at the Fun vendor today!

    ShizCalev updated:

    • You will now no longer feel so eternally sad if you gain the a trait where you no longer need to breath or become a God while you are suffocating.
    • AIs should no longer experience weird interface disparities or module selection issues when assuming direct control over a shell for the first time when said shell is damaged.
    • Added two code paths to help catch and debug a runtime error in the fit_viewport verb.
    • Fixes runtime when attempting to start surgery on simple mobs and other non-humans/humanlikes
    • Fixes a runtime in the air subsystem, where deleted objects were still processed.
    • Microwaved cake batter and similar snack foods that create non-snack foods will no longer cause runtimes, meaning cakes now get filled with reagenty-goodness and are both delicious and nutritious.

    Putnam3145 updated:

    • made ventcrawling not intentionally obfuscated badcode

    Timberpoes updated:

    • Added a confirmation prompt before harvesting a fully grown Replica Pod that has been associated with a player, but the player is not yet dead or ready to be revived. Gives you the choice of backing out or harvesting them for seeds. Functionality unchanged.

    lordpidey updated:

    • The syndicate now provides a single empty syringe with it's dart gun.

    Arkatos updated:

    • Mass Driver Control now uses tgui.
    • Mass Driver Controls now process only when needed instead of all the time. In short, free performance for you.

    • new device, temperature pump

    Jimmius updated:

    • Adds door seals to the game, printable at engineering and security lathes after they've been researched. Makes airlocks much harder to smash down if you can't remove them.
    • Slightly changed how bonus health to an airlock works
    • I comes before E, except after C.
    • Wearing a gun on your armor / belt will no longer result in your waist turning purple and black.

    tmtmtl30 updated:

    • The Families gamemode and antagonist have been refactored and should perform more sanely in some cases.
    • Families can now appear in dynamic rounds.

    ATHATH updated:

    • The default EMP feedback message for arm implants has been improved.

    ArcaneMusic updated:

    • More cardboard box-adjacent things break down into cardboard, and are all made of cardboard.

    Couls updated:

    • Runechat no longer breaks when the tick lag is changed

    Dennok updated:

    • canisters no more give runtime error on shuttle loading

    Ghilker updated:

    • BETTER_DIST define to replace the get_dist() native proc
    • event crash fix by replacing the native proc with the define
    • monster damage overall reduced and boss spawning changed a bit
    • hydrogen + rads = trit
    • 5 new gases
    • Healium : made from Bz + Freon + cold, it knocks people down but have healing properties
    • Proto Nitrate : made from pluox and H2 + heat, it has different reaction with a bunch of other gases
    • Cyrion B : made from hypernoblium + stimulum around 0°C, it has heavy damage if breathed but is decomposed rapidly by N2
    • Halon : made from bz + trit + cold, it reacts with O2 at high temperature removing it and cooling the air, helping putting out fires
    • Hexane : made from bz + H2 + cold, it reacts with plasma and n2o and removes them from the air mix, filtering them.
    • stimulum no longer require plasma
    • canister sprites, gas sprites
    • crystal from gases formation and reaction
    • new metallic hydrogen recipes
    • elder atmosian statue
    • supermatter interactions
    • minor changes to fusion math to make it "easier" to start add : pluoxium can be also made without using rads (not removing the rad production one) (this also produces a minimal amount of h2)
    • lowered hypernoblium min temperature of reaction
    • metallic hydrogen production more common
    • cyrion-b bounty
    • all 5 gases are up to selling

    Helianthus00 updated:

    • Corrected the directions of arcades on delta, icebox, and pubby

    • cleaned up mech code some more
    • FIXES WEEWOO MAKING SERVER EXPLODE

    YPOQ updated:

    • The arena shuttle no longer teleports people into space.

    floyd updated:

    • moved cakes to newfood code
    • i fucked up some food lists because i misunderstood them, thats now fixed.
    • edible component now properly handles transfering reagents on processing, microwaving and crafting

    • Random arcade cabinets keep rotation on mapload

    07 September 2020

    CRITAWAKETS updated:

    • Nanotrasen has updated the cooling setup of telecommunications rooms in Delta-Pattern Stations. It now makes the simulation faster.

    Dennok updated:

    • passive gate description more precise

    Maurukas updated:

    • Cryo cells work again and are no longer permanent icy prisons
    • Material containers are better at managing local storage

    • SMES units now self-charge when containing yellow slime cores.

    • janibelt/medibelt can be opened from backpack
    • removed some defunct code (picking a color of cable but its all yellow in belt.dm)
    • bandoliers now hold their intended 18 shells.

    WarlockD updated:

    • Swapped a few arguments out of the materials container

    kevinz000 updated:

    • Hierophant now uses its ranged abilities in melee attacks, meaning the strategy of standing still and tanking the hits is no longer viable in 99% of circumstances.

    25 May 2020

    Cyberboss updated:

    • The `notify` TGS command will no longer work if the related config setting is disabled
    • Fixed not actually limiting chat sends to tagged channels as the config should allow when running under TGS4.
    • Fixed the `notify` command not working for IRC users.

    Fikou updated:

    • fixed science glasses recipe using beer goggles instead of science glasses

    Gamer025 updated:

    • Nanotrasen checked the last few expenses reports and decided to reduce payday spending. Because of this, the salary of all non human employees has been reduced by 25%. Please consult your local Head of Personal for more information.

    Kelenius updated:

    • Cyborgs (except Peacekeeper and Standard) now have access to their department's radio.

    LemonInTheDark updated:

    • Changed the way h2o interacts with the engine. It should acts similar to o2 normally, but in high concentrations it cools the engine down. Have fun :)
    • Mulebots no longer go insane when shit starts to lag
    • Refactored client.view into a datum, changed some zoom values to work properly
    • Spinning while using a binocular will work as expected
    • Fully adds widescreen support to zooming
    • I've moved the pixel scaling and zoom methods from the menu bar to the game preferences window. You'll need to reset them.
    • Pixel size will now automatically update on zoom, so you won't end up with ui buttons you can't see.
    • FIxed the epic gamer skill of binocular applied to advanced camera console

    LemonInTheDark, with thanks to ArcaneDefence for the pointer updated:

    • Reduced Diagnostics nanite program has been removed.
    • Nanite Debugging nanite program has been added. This program causes your nanites to display their program list when scanned, but comes with a 0.1/s nanite cost.
    • Reduced Diagnostics nanite program functionality is now default behaviour. The nanite program list is hidden from nanite scanners by default. You now now to include the Nanite Debugging program to show the program list on scan.
    • Researching Harmonic Nanite Programming now confers a passive boost of 0.1 regen rate to all nanite clouds. This boost takes effects as soon as the node is researched.
    • Harmonic Nanite Programming research node now requires 3000 General and 3000 Nanite research, an increase of 1000 each.

    06 September 2020

    Bumtickley00 updated:

    • The blood filter can now be put in medical belts and medical aid kits
    • Spray bottles, amputation shears, and surgical tape can now be put in the medical aid kit
    • Printing and recycling bonesetters no longer creates materials from nothing

    Radacitus updated:

    • Adds a new Ingredient Beacon and gives it to the Chef in-place of their Ingredient Box on spawn.
    • Adds some custom text that appears when you use the Chef and Curator Beacons.

    Ryll/Shaps updated:

    • Fixed an issue preventing zombies from being decappable. Krokodil addict zombies are also no longer immune to wounds
    • Eswords/dual sabers/armblades/light eaters/similar weapons no longer have significantly reduced wounding power and are similar in dismembering power to their old incarnations. In addition, they are moderately less hard-countered by armor.
    • Attacking a prone target will now hit the targeted limb 90% of the time rather than the standard 80% (50% less likely to hit a different limb)
    • Sutures and cauterization are more effective at patching up piercing wounds
    • Improvised cauterization (anything hot that isn't a cautery) is now slightly less efficient and requires an aggressive grab to apply to the target. No more accidentally trying to cauterize the guy you just attacked with an esword!

    YPOQ updated:

    • Fixed internal martyrdom.
    • Scrubbers no longer cool pipenets attached to them when scrubbing space

    MarioWizard119 updated:

    • Synthflesh now also works via vapor.

    NewSta updated:

    • You might potentially see better a/an usage

    Ryll/Shaps updated:

    • You can now use ! and ? at the end of 'spawn' chatbar verb commands to search for only the ends of paths, or to automatically select a random type of the paths your search returns! Happy badminning!
    • Adds a config option for OOC kindness commendations! When enabled, a small percentage of the crew gets asked if anyone made their round better, and those people will get a little heart next to their name in OOC for 24h!
    • lobby menu work again

    Shadark updated:

    • Manually printed barcodes are now working correctly.

    TetraK1 updated:

    • Ghosts can no longer control atmos stuff with alt/ctrl click.

    04 September 2020

    ATHATH updated:

    • The "plating repair tool" has been added to the game in the form of a printable upgrade for janiborgs. It's a subtype of the cautery that can repair burnt or damaged hull platings, allowing floor tiles to be placed over them once again.
    • The upgrade that adds it to a janiborg's list of tools can be printed once the Cyborg Upgrades: Utility tech node is researched.

    ArcaneMusic updated:

    • You can't use the civilain bounty console while depowered anymore.

    02 September 2020

    ATHATH updated:

    • Penthrite no longer makes you immune to staminacrit.
    • Penthrite no longer has an effect on people who can't metabolize it.
    • Spam-buckling and spam-unbuckling someone to/from a stasis bed while they have penthrite in their system will no longer cause them to enter a state of permanent critical condition.
    • If you regain the ability to metabolize chems while you have penthrite in your system, you'll also regain the special traits (immunity to hardcrit, immunity to softcrit, and immunity to the effects of heart failure) that penthrite's supposed to give you.
    • Penthrite now makes you immune to the damage over time that being in crit gives you, so as to better mimic its previous/intended effects.
    • Penthrite's description has been modified slightly.

    Arkatos updated:

    • Admin controlled shuttles will now redirect to an actual shuttle controls upon authorization request instead of always targeting CentCom ferry. Admin staff can now also alternatively unlock or relock the shuttle upon request.
    • Escape pods no longer start as admin controlled shuttles, they simply start locked until appropriate code level is set.

    Fikou updated:

    • fixes mechpad crowbar act
    • select equipment now includes basic plasmaman outfit

    Ghilker updated:

    • unlocked atmos full layer potential (now 5 layers avaiable instead of 3, not all objects can use the additional layers)
    • More flavor texts to crystal event related devices and structures to help players on what to do
    • Ability to close the portals by using the combination of Analizer+Signaler
    • Crystal monsters have now different ability but similar health and damage
    • You can sacrifice someone to the crystal to increase the spawn delay by 5 seconds permanently
    • sound effects to the destabilized crystal
    • spawned anomalies don't explode anymore
    • event will end in a reasonable time

    Jack7D1 updated:

    • Puddles are now infinite sources of water again.

    Jared-Fogle updated:

    • The searing tool now starts as a cautery, rather than a drill.
    • It is now easier to change the flags of turrets.
    • Quick swapping a suit will now properly check suit storage.

    LemonInTheDark updated:

    • Hello admins, I've made your view options better reflect reality, you can't crash parallax for yourself by using them now.

    Melbert updated:

    • Slightly made it easier for blind people to examine things in hand / examine things closer
    • Fixed delayed blind examinations
    • Fixed blind people examining things with disabled/detached hands
    • Fixed blind people being able to reach through windows

    MoonFalcon updated:

    • Allow heretic ghouls to use the sickly blade and ashen eyes

    Paxilmaniac updated:

    • Lesser summon bees, a spell that summons bees

    Ryll/Shaps updated:

    • Dying people can gasp and deathgasp again
    • Borgs can deathgasp (and normal gasp I guess) while stunned again
    • The message for disembowelment now properly displays

    Timberpoes updated:

    • Click-dragging behaviour has been restored to normal. Players will no longer attempt to buckle things to other things except when they quite intend to.
    • R&D Consoles are no longer required to operate other machinery including mechfabs, omni-protolathes, omni-imprinters and the destructive analyzer. These consoles have been removed and replaced with basic modular computers.
    • The destructive analyzer has lost its material reclaimation feature. It now only destroys items and unlocks techweb nodes.

    Wayland-Smithy updated:

    • Spectral Blade - Ghosts that orbit it or the holder are no longer forced to spectate it until the end of time. Huzzah!
    • For real. Not kidding. You can answer the call to aid someone with your spooky presence and then STOP ORBITING ON YOUR OWN AT ANY TIME just like any other object.
    • Ghosts no longer receive a redundant orbit link when the Spectral Blade is raised.
    • Alien larva can no longer evolve in vents and become stuck.

    oranges updated:

    • New achievements for science

    tralezab updated:

    • mafia lobby now refreshes correctly!

    uomo91 updated:

    • The public can now exit the labor shuttle arrivals area on Box and Delta, without having to wait for the AI or sec to let them out.
    • The gulag teleporter will now give prison jumpskirts, if the player's preference is set to jumpskirt.

    01 September 2020

    ArcaneMusic updated:

    • By using a TCG card on another TCG card, you can create piles of cards in order to play against each other.
    • Using a deck if tcg cards on a table allows you to shuffle, flip, and draw from the deck as well.

    • Pun Pun is Pun Pun again (except in rare cases where he is not)

    tralezab updated:

    uomo91 updated:

    • You can buckle yourself and others into chairs that you're right next to, instead of needing to be on top of the chair to do it.
    • You cannot pry up floor tiles in the holodeck photobooth anymore.
    • The advanced fire extinguisher now has an inhand sprite, and no longer looks like a regular extinguisher.

    29 August 2020

    ATHATH updated:

    • Blob spores from gold slime core and hostile life reactions are now marked as being independent, meaning that they can now drag things, but can no longer freely walk through blob tiles.
    • Independent blob spores and blobbernauts can now speak over blob chat like overmind-dependent blob mobs do.
    • Blob spores can no longer damage the environment, for realzies this time. This change does not affect blob zombies.
    • Removed an unused variable from tech nodes (and the unused proc that references it).

    ArcaneMusic updated:

    • Admins can now spawn the Teambuilding machine for assign teams, like Red or Blue, quickly!
    • Sinks and showers can now have reagents piped into them.
    • Using metal sheets on reagent dispensers will now produce a plumbing-enabled supply tank for station use.
    • Added a new stock part, the water recycler, used in building showers and sinks from scratch.
    • Hydroponics trays are now plumbing enabled. Water and nutrients will be sorted into their appropriate slots when piped in.
    • Sinks and showers now have internal water reservoirs, and start filled with water.
    • Showers and sinks must be constructed from a frame, then finished with a water recycler. remove: Hydroponics hoses have been removed in favor of actual plumbing between machines.

    Donkie updated:

    • Fixed regular pump on map icon north/south being misaligned by 1 pixel

    EdgeLordExe updated:

    • Rust_spread will no longer lag servers into oblivion
    • Changed a few flavour texts to better represent lore.
    • Rustbringer's oath now properly only heals while on rusted tiles.

    • Deltastation: made a maint area below the captain's office

    • granting a mob sentience, with the sentience potion also tames it.

    Cartographer-D updated:

    • The new isolation cell on Meta now has an observation monitor.
    • The floor safe in Meta Maintenance now has a nice treat!
    • Meta's prison and cargo have been touched up even more!

    Fikou updated:

    • new colossus sprites

    Qustinnus (sprites from Lohikar) updated:

    • Open-space now has a parent /transparent/ that handles the visuals of open-space besides the backdrop
    • Glass floors and reinforced glass floors. Look at those peasants down below in style.

    Qustinnus, AnturK updated:

    • Moved gun overlay updating to update_overlays(), removing lag from objects when you add a flashlight / baynonet to them

    uomo91 updated:

    • Metastation now has a science wardrobe vendor.

    willox updated:

    • unique combinations of custom_materials lists are now shared between objects

    06 May 2020

    ATHATH updated:

    • Unborks the sensory restoration symptom. It should work like having oculine and inacusiate in your system now.
    • Adjusts inacusiate's description to more accurately reflect what it actually does.
    • The eye_blind and eye_blurry healing from oculine is no longer instant, although oculine still has its 20% chance per chem tick to instantly remove the TRAIT_BLIND trait from you (if it was caused by eye damage).
    • Replaces the "You are now blinking manually." fake positive message from the hallucigen symptom with a "Your ears feel great." message.
    • Fixes a typo in one of the messages from the sensory restoration symptom.

    ArcaneMusic updated:

    • Almost all food items are now exportable from cargo.
    • Adjusts the Bananium Shield to be properly covered when held in the opposite hands.

    Arkatos updated:

    • Janitorial cart now uses a radial menu.

    Capsandi updated:

    • lavaland base turbine now charges SMES

    Dionant updated:

    • Renamed some 10mm ammo to 9mm.

    Fikou updated:

    • a new sprite for potty the potted plant
    • blood drunk miner's eye will no longer knock you out
    • you can uniquely rename the kinetic crusher

    Iamgoofball updated:

    • Fixed the missing texture for the ears slot having a floating white pixel.

    MMMiracles updated:

    • Goat King ruin has been remodeled to be more aesthetically pleasing

    MacBlaze1 updated:

    • fixed doomsday ai going boom after death

    Mickyan updated:

    • Fixed price of parasite candy bar

    RaveRadbury updated:

    • Light tiles now use a radial menu for color selection.
    • Light tiles need multitools to be adjusted
    • Light tiles can now display Orange
    • Light tiles have a secondary light cycle config
    • Mapper light tiles have also been updated and had their cycling times adjusted
    • Light tiles no longer cycle into white
    • Hands of cards now use radial menus

    Rodey125 updated:

    • gigachad fugu slimes can now break walls

    Timberpoes updated:

    • Fixed various broken functionality between defibrilators and defibrilator mounts.
    • Hardsuits now no longer drain cell charge when thermal regulators are off.

    Zytolg updated:

    • Added Regex to account for variations on X within the English language
    • Added The ability for lizards to use the word X at the beginning of a word again.
    • Doesn't make every" X" into "KSS"
    • Adjusts lizard Autohissing on "X" to be more phonetically accurate.

    babydoll updated:

    • Added missing headset mob display icons.

    nemvar updated:

    • Fixes a bug that could cause the ORM to scoop up ores although it was not anchored.
    • The ORM will now always scoop up from the correct turf.
    • Fixed a bug where the stabilized black crossbreed would not restore nutrition nor damage the target if you were at full health.

    steamp0rt updated:

    • You can now eat bees.
    • Yes, you can even eat live bees.

    05 May 2020

    Fikou updated:

    • goats in the king of goats lair are now affected by kinetic crusher

    FuryMcFlurry, Yeeye updated:

    • Missing textures and error models are now visible if an item has a broken icon. If you see broken assets in game, report it!

    Iamgoofball updated:

    • The clown now bleeds Colorful Reagent on April Fools.

    Timberpoes updated:

    • RnD Consoles will no longer list BEPIS-exclusive research nodes in list view as available for research.

    necromanceranne updated:

    • The stechkin pistol is now a makarov. It comes chambered in 9mm. Nothing has really changed for performance or ammo availability. It's just all in 9mm now.
    • The stechkin APS is now normal sized and available to nukies for 10 tc. It sprays bullets like mad and fires very quickly.
    • The caravan now has stechkin APS magazines.
    • The Spetznaz bundle uses incendiary magazines for the APS.
    • .45 is stronger across the board by about 5 damage, and has more bullet variety.
    • the c20-r is a 3 burst weapon and costs 13tc.
    • 5.56mm now has 30 armor penetration and has some bullet spread.. This only affects the m90gl and the Boarder assault rifles.
    • You can buy phasic ammo for the m90 for 8 tc out of the uplink. It passes through walls and objects, and does significantly less damage. (comparatively speaking of course)
    • X-Ray beams now pass through doors, machinery, and structures like lockers.

    uomo91 updated:

    • Pubby Station has had some small budget increases; the stasis bed room is no longer extremely crowded, and some extra IV drips have been supplied.
    • Nanotrasen has fixed a clerical error which gave medical doctors clearance to enter the genetics lab.

    willox updated:

    • removed some duplicate proc definitions
    • syndicate holster now properly sets itself as silent
    • rend tears and temporary object used by fulton extraction can no longer be eaten by singularity
    • hygiene bot no longer cleans objects twice when passed over

    04 May 2020

    EdgeLordExe updated:

    • Nitroglycerin : You now have to use exotic stabilizer.
    • TaTP : The more you use it, the more powerful it becomes. You now have to stabilize it with exotic stabilizer
    • RDX : produces slightly bigger heatwave and slightly bigger shockwave. Now requires gold.
    • Gunpowder : strengthdiv 8 - > 10 (nerf), modifier 2 - > 5 (buff).
    • Methamphetamine : strengthdiv 6 -> 12 (nerf), modifier 1 - > 5 (buff).
    • Moved some power from facid to nitric acid.
    • Hyper-plasmium oxide can be commonly found in lavaland geysers
    • Exotic stabilizer can now be crafted with hyper-plasmium oxide and stabilizing agent

    LemonInTheDark updated:

    • Fixes an issue with sentient diseases and darkness

    03 May 2020

    ATHATH updated:

    • The cortex folding and cortex imprint surgeries now check the BIOWARE_CORTEX slot (which is where they actually install their corresponding pieces of bioware) for competing pieces of bioware instead of the BIOWARE_LIGAMENTS slot, as almost certainly intended.

    Cartographer-D updated:

    • New Prison wing for MetaStation!
    • Visitation room for MetaStation Perma
    • Incorporates Box Perma balances for MetaStation

    DeltaFire15 updated:

    • exo-locomotion nanites now work again

    EgorDinamit updated:

    • Policy config for cybersun ship ruin is now the only text you will see when you spawn as its crew.

    Iamgoofball updated:

    • The Bogdanoffs have upgraded CRAB-17. You can't escape the dump.

    Koshenko updated:

    • Look up verb

    Ryll/Shaps updated:

    • Clusters of shrapnel mines will no longer kill the server when set off together.
    • Shooting over landmines will no longer trigger them
    • security crates briefly required forensics access instead of proper security access, this has been fixed
    • Buckshot shells no longer disappear into the void after being fired
    • Priming shrapnel grenades and then dropping them will no longer exempt you from being shredded by the shrapnel, nor will using shrapnel grenades on explosive lances
    • Armor penetration works again! Oops!! Turns out that's been broken for a bit

    Vondiech (Thank Quantum-M for the sprites) updated:

    • Nanotrasen has decided to provide the station with tables from their Sunset-Station branch

    bobbahbrown updated:

    • Fixed unstyled messages potentially causing null reference exceptions in runechat.
    • Fixed a client's qdeletion causing runtimes on chat messages they see.

    nemvar updated:

    • Fixed a bug that caused the hierophant to ignore all armor.

    qustinnus updated:

    • you can craft meat chairs again thank god man i was pretty shocked ngl

    uomo91 updated:

    • Fixed some things with signs, and you can now uncommonly find fountain pens in maint.

    02 May 2020

    Fikou updated:

    • you can no longer privately pay for stuff with departmental budgets and cant withdraw money, just deposit

    RaveRadbury updated:

    • Med records populate full from your quirk list

    Timberpoes updated:

    • Due to a need to lower manufacturing costs, all space suits are now made of inferior thermal material and no longer maintain the wearer's temperature indefinitely after their cells run out of charge.

    jdawg1290 updated:

    • canister exports should no longer runtime

    willox updated:

    • borg examine text describing hotkeys now always shows on non-broken doors/portable-turrets
    • cleans up some accidents around the & operator
    • Plastic spoons can now break when hitting things
    • Plastic spoons/forks breaking now shows the correct name of whoever broke them

    01 May 2020

    ATHATH updated:

    • Macrobomb implants now have a weak explosion radius of 20 (up from 16).
    • Macrobomb implants will now no longer refuse to implant themselves in someone that already has a macrobomb implant, and instead will add their stats to that existing macrobomb implant, as they would to a microbomb implant.

    Fikou updated:

    • gorilla cubes, gorilla injector and dna gun are now geneticist and rd uplink items, rather than geneticist and cmo

    Ghilker updated:

    • Canister frames helper descriptions fix

    LemonInTheDark updated:

    • fixes a runtime in the rsf

    Niknakflak updated:

    • Added two new pAIs to BoxStation

    RaveRadbury updated:

    • Foreigner Quirk - Removes Galactic Common
    • Galactic Uncommon - Given to Human and Felinid foreigners
    • Inverted Galactic Common sprite for Galactic Uncommon
    • Quirks sort into medical records rather than just dumping into notes.
    • Non-human/felinid Foreigners don't get Galuncom

    Skoglol updated:

    • Added a few new smites.

    Twaticus updated:

    • Resprites for existing area icons
    • Various new area icons

    nightred updated:

    • shivering symptom will now trigger

    senjx updated:

    • MA Arms Inc. has initiated a product recall of all compact combat shotguns due to faulty internal magazines that cause the weapon to explode after firing. Unfortunately, all of the weapons in our stock have already exploded. We're not going to acquire any replacements.

    30 April 2020

    Goonstation Coders, Beestation, Extools devs updated:

    • Explosions have been heavily optimized.

    actioninja updated:

    • Auto fit viewport is now the default, and everyone's setting for this has been reset to the default. If you don't know what this means, it's safe to ignore.

    29 April 2020

    Cenrus updated:

    • right pews are no longer left pews.

    MrDoomBringer with some code stolen from itseasytosee updated:

    • added the Airlock Authentication Override Card. Use it to open airlocks!
    • added Syndicate Jaws of Life to the nuke op uplink. Use it in it's crowbar configuration to open as many doors as you'd like!
    • The cryptographic sequencer can no longer open airlocks :(

    RaveRadbury updated:

    • Lizards now pronounce x's as "kss"

    qustinnus updated:

    • Nerfs the cybersun hardsuit and moves it out of the uplink

    uomo91 updated:

    • You can now craft plaques using gold in hand, and with a fountain pen can engrave a title and description on them. They can be mounted on walls. No good deed shall ever go forgotten now.
    • Refactored signs heavily. A bunch of sign types previously left out of using a pen on a sign to change it are now included. They're also sorted sensibly now. You can no longer change sign types that shouldn't be changeable (guidance signs, maps, etc)
    • Signs (and plaques) can now be repaired with a welder.
    • Signs placed on walls now are only placed on one side of that wall, and are not visible through the wall.

    willox updated:

    • Shaved Mohawk hair-style is now available
    • deleted redundant "Drill Hair" icon
    • deleted redundant "Drill Hair" hair-style

    28 April 2020

    Couls updated:

    • more islamic prefixes
    • end of ramadan now follows the islamic calendar

    MrDoomBringer updated:

    • More toys are available from the Autolathe's contraband selection.

    stylemistake updated:

    • Yet another Canister UI rework. But this time, it's perfection.

    zxaber updated:

    • A syndicate cyborg monitor program for modular computers, showing the status of syndicate borgs, is now available from syndicate repositories.
    • Clients that send a message to a borg using either of the monitor programs will now have it logged under Comms_Log, the same place as PDA logging is located.

    27 April 2020

    ArcaneMusic updated:

    • Plants above 60 instability with no new mutations will no longer halve their instability if they would otherwise mutate.

    Ghilker updated:

    • Added electrolite components
    • Added electrolite components to the node tree
    • changed the electrolyzer circuit board to use 2 electrolite, 2 capacitors, 5 cable coils and 1 glass sheet
    • reduced h2 gas export gain
    • Added electrolites sprites (Thanks Trollbreeder!)
    • Changed the H2 canister sprite

    Mickyan updated:

    • Added descriptions to the curator's hero bundles

    Vondiech updated:

    • Nanotrasen has overhauled Boxstations pipe-grid blueprint, and has so far found that Atmospheric Technicians & Station Engineers has had a decrease in deaths caused by extreme mental exhaustion.

    actioninja updated:

    • traitor uplink works properly in compact mode

    stylemistake updated:

    • Fixed lighting on Camera Console
    • Fixed lighting on Spy Bug (spy glasses in detective's spy glass kit)

    willox updated:

    • phobias use less regular expressions and don't instantiate them all the time

    26 April 2020

    Arkatos updated:

    • Fixed an issue where dextrous guardians lacked some of their HUD elements.

    EdgeLordExe updated:

    • Penthite now can extend your life span or something. Scientists warned me not to mix it with epinephrine or atropine, noone is allowed to tell me what to not do!

    Iamgoofball updated:

    • demos are gone, they were super duper laggy for little gain

    RaveRadbury updated:

    • Snake phobia now includes snake plushie
    • Lizard phobia now includes lizard shoes, lizard boots
    • Strangers phobia triggers have been expanded
    • Heard phobia words no longer drop out
    • Phobia words can show up multiple times within a phrase

    TheSilverNuke updated:

    • moved AI APC's inside the windoor areas

    bobbahbrown updated:

    • Added a new chat message overlay system; now you can see all those wacky messages people are shouting at you with ease! Welcome to the Runechat era.

    itseasytosee updated:

    • The honk mother is displeased. Clowns must wear their shoes in order to slip people lying down.

    25 April 2020

    Archanial updated:

    • Operation computers only recognize humans or monkeys as patients.

    Arkatos and actioninja updated:

    • RCD Access Control now uses tgui.
    • RCDs are now able to set unrestricted directional access for a newly built airlocks.

    Cartographer-D updated:

    • Meta Cargo Mining's APC is actually wired
    • More small fixes for Meta Cargo

    Ghilker updated:

    • New frame subtype (tier 3)
    • Added the ability to deconstruct the canisters (receive items back)
    • Changed the way canisters are made
    • Added canister frame tier 0 sprite

    LemonInTheDark updated:

    • Fixes teslas not containing properly sometimes
    • Maybe makes tesla coil power output more sane, not totally sure myself
    • Refactored tesla code a bit
    • RSF's now have a radial menu
    • You can now kill yourself by dispensing cookies
    • RSF's are now modular
    • Subtypes of RSFs can now have sublists. Hope it's helpful.

    SomeoneYouProbablyKnow updated:

    • The detective now has all his extra clothes in a vendor and not their locker.

    stylemistake updated:

    • Fixed Malf AI module picker, you can now buy modules.

    uomo91 updated:

    • Felinids now "pounce" instead of "leap" and "tackle" when using gripper gloves.

      • Dear out of date coders, you will now be yelled at to update to the correct version of byond, rather then an unsupported one.

      • Lighting corner updates are ever so slightly faster.

      10 May 2020

      Couls updated:

      • Give item keybind, default to G. Press it while holding an item to offer it to someone nearby, they can click the alert they get to accept it or move for it to go away
      • There is a right click menu option for giving

      Fikou updated:

      • the lord singulo syndie kit now has a mining id upgrade and a 10000 credits so you can actually bother with getting a singulo running

      Inept updated:

      • The Nanotrasen Entertainment Division would like to remind everyone that any resemblance Kotahi bears to any other card game, real or fictional, is a coincidence. Kotahi is legally distinct.
      • removed some old sprites they're unimportant please don't look

      MMMiracles updated:

      • Boxstation's AI core was moved back into the original position just below the bridge.
      • Boxstation's gravity generator was moved to the left of Engineering, accessed through the main Engineering section.

      MacBlaze1 updated:

      • Security PDA's now come with the Crew Manifest Program
      • fixed lesser form transformation not transferring stamina damage

      Mickyan updated:

      • empath quirk can now sense abnormal body temperature on examine
      • lowered the mood malus from examining people with low sanity as an empath
      • bubble gum lasts much longer
      • improved bubble gum sprites

      Nebulacrity for the sprites, LemonInTheDark for the mule work updated:

      • Improved on the singularity hammer, drop it on the ground and mire the way she shines.

      NoxVS updated:

      • Nanotrasen has (once again) discovered which direction is left and right, and have fixed the remaining cyborg limbs.

      Paxilmaniac updated:

      • icon for techpriest hood

      Qustinnus updated:

      • some ebic new lavaland ambience tracks.

      Qustinnus & MrDoomBringer updated:

      • Adds hardcore random mode, you get a random character with some random bad quirks. You can earn hardcore random score and get on the leaderboards if you survive and get on the shuttle. If the odds are stacked against you more, you will also earn more points.
      • Gold wheelchair, only for people with 5k hardcore random mode points

      Ryll/Shaps updated:

      • Projectiles with shrapnel now embed in the same limb they hit

      Shadark updated:

      • Contraband items in vending machines now display their correct price.
      • MULEbots can't be used as steamrollers anymore.

      Skoglol updated:

      • Dynamic config no longer overwrites ruleset restricted roles.

      SteelSlayer updated:

      • Fixed the recharger's sprite turning invisible when a screwdriver was used on it

      TemporalOroboros updated:

      • Plant grafts now work after their parent plant has been deleted.
      • Hydroponics trays now obey transfer amounts when dealing with water.

      TerraGS updated:

      • Potato Batteries display properly now

      Thebleh updated:

      • Metastations 'N2 to Pure' pump is now off by default

      Timberpoes updated:

      • Nanite Cloud Controllers now display stored rules for programs without requiring specific disks inserted.

      TiviPlus updated:

      • Kotahi decks will now Shuffle properly

      XDTM updated:

      • Abductor healing glands now properly check organ damage when detecting which organs to replace.
      • Abductor healing glands can now replace damaged stomachs and inflamed appendixes.
      • Abductor healing glands now also reject implants (like mindshield implants) on top of cybernetic organs.

      actioninja updated:

      • Fallback order of on mob icons was changed to match older versions, correcting some issues with missing sprites

      dootdoom updated:

      • Cargo supply console is now next to the supply shuttle on box and pubby.

      spessman-007 updated:

      • Removed unused files

      vuonojenmustaturska updated:

      • Cleaned up porta-turret code ever so slightly

      09 May 2020

      RaveRadbury updated:

      • light tiles are less picky about how you hold the multitool
      • Health Analyzers only detect Major Disabilities, rather than all quirks
      • Advanced Health Analyzers can detect Minor Disabilities as well

      Ryll/Shaps updated:

      • The INTERACTING_WITH macro now tracks all kinds of do_after

      Skoglol updated:

      • Trash bags can no longer be equipped on belt.

      TheVekter updated:

      • Removed the ability to print mini meteor toys from the autolathe and obtain them from cargo crates.

      • Staff of nothing now shoots nothing.
      • Wand of nothing shoots nothing again, instead of doing nothing.

      04 May 2020

      EdgeLordExe updated:

      • Nitroglycerin : You now have to use exotic stabilizer.
      • TaTP : The more you use it, the more powerful it becomes. You now have to stabilize it with exotic stabilizer
      • RDX : produces slightly bigger heatwave and slightly bigger shockwave. Now requires gold.
      • Gunpowder : strengthdiv 8 - > 10 (nerf), modifier 2 - > 5 (buff).
      • Methamphetamine : strengthdiv 6 -> 12 (nerf), modifier 1 - > 5 (buff).

      • exo-locomotion nanites now work again

      EgorDinamit updated:

      • Policy config for cybersun ship ruin is now the only text you will see when you spawn as its crew.

      Iamgoofball updated:

      • The Bogdanoffs have upgraded CRAB-17. You can't escape the dump.

      Koshenko updated:

      • Look up verb

      Ryll/Shaps updated:

      • Clusters of shrapnel mines will no longer kill the server when set off together.
      • Shooting over landmines will no longer trigger them
      • security crates briefly required forensics access instead of proper security access, this has been fixed
      • Buckshot shells no longer disappear into the void after being fired
      • Priming shrapnel grenades and then dropping them will no longer exempt you from being shredded by the shrapnel, nor will using shrapnel grenades on explosive lances
      • Armor penetration works again! Oops!! Turns out that's been broken for a bit

      Vondiech (Thank Quantum-M for the sprites) updated:

      • Nanotrasen has decided to provide the station with tables from their Sunset-Station branch

      bobbahbrown updated:

      • Fixed unstyled messages potentially causing null reference exceptions in runechat.
      • Fixed a client's qdeletion causing runtimes on chat messages they see.

      nemvar updated:

      • Fixed a bug that caused the hierophant to ignore all armor.

      qustinnus updated:

      • you can craft meat chairs again thank god man i was pretty shocked ngl

      uomo91 updated:

      • Fixed some things with signs, and you can now uncommonly find fountain pens in maint.

      02 May 2020

      Fikou updated:

      • you can no longer privately pay for stuff with departmental budgets and cant withdraw money, just deposit

      RaveRadbury updated:

      • Med records populate full from your quirk list

      Timberpoes updated:

      • Due to a need to lower manufacturing costs, all space suits are now made of inferior thermal material and no longer maintain the wearer's temperature indefinitely after their cells run out of charge.

      jdawg1290 updated:

      • canister exports should no longer runtime

      willox updated:

      • borg examine text describing hotkeys now always shows on non-broken doors/portable-turrets

      • Plastic spoons can now break when hitting things
      • Plastic spoons/forks breaking now shows the correct name of whoever broke them

      01 May 2020

      ATHATH updated:

      • Macrobomb implants now have a weak explosion radius of 20 (up from 16).
      • Macrobomb implants will now no longer refuse to implant themselves in someone that already has a macrobomb implant, and instead will add their stats to that existing macrobomb implant, as they would to a microbomb implant.

      Fikou updated:

      • gorilla cubes, gorilla injector and dna gun are now geneticist and rd uplink items, rather than geneticist and cmo

      senjx updated:

      • MA Arms Inc. has initiated a product recall of all compact combat shotguns due to faulty internal magazines that cause the weapon to explode after firing. Unfortunately, all of the weapons in our stock have already exploded. We're not going to acquire any replacements.

      30 April 2020

      Goonstation Coders, Beestation, Extools devs updated:

      • Explosions have been heavily optimized.

      actioninja updated:

      • Auto fit viewport is now the default, and everyone's setting for this has been reset to the default. If you don't know what this means, it's safe to ignore.

      29 April 2020

      Cenrus updated:

      • right pews are no longer left pews.

      MrDoomBringer with some code stolen from itseasytosee updated:

      • added the Airlock Authentication Override Card. Use it to open airlocks!
      • added Syndicate Jaws of Life to the nuke op uplink. Use it in it's crowbar configuration to open as many doors as you'd like!
      • The cryptographic sequencer can no longer open airlocks :(

      RaveRadbury updated:

      • Lizards now pronounce x's as "kss"

      qustinnus updated:

      • Nerfs the cybersun hardsuit and moves it out of the uplink

      uomo91 updated:

      • You can now craft plaques using gold in hand, and with a fountain pen can engrave a title and description on them. They can be mounted on walls. No good deed shall ever go forgotten now.
      • Refactored signs heavily. A bunch of sign types previously left out of using a pen on a sign to change it are now included. They're also sorted sensibly now. You can no longer change sign types that shouldn't be changeable (guidance signs, maps, etc)
      • Signs (and plaques) can now be repaired with a welder.
      • Signs placed on walls now are only placed on one side of that wall, and are not visible through the wall.

      willox updated:

      • Shaved Mohawk hair-style is now available
      • deleted redundant "Drill Hair" icon
      • deleted redundant "Drill Hair" hair-style

      zxaber updated:

      • A syndicate cyborg monitor program for modular computers, showing the status of syndicate borgs, is now available from syndicate repositories.
      • Clients that send a message to a borg using either of the monitor programs will now have it logged under Comms_Log, the same place as PDA logging is located.

      ArcaneMusic updated:

      ArcaneMusic updated:

      • Railings can now be crafted with metal rods, and deconstructed with wirecutters when unwrenched.
      • Railings can now be rotated with Alt Click.

      Archanial updated:

      • Cult stun no longer stuns mindshielded personnel. Instead it makes them drop items they are currently holding, applies a dizziness effect and does some stamina damage.

      • the jackhammer is now bulky instead of huge

      ArcaneMusic updated:

      • Papersacks now use a radial menu to choose their skins.
      • Dominate is now a cursor-guided spell.
      • Abyssal Gaze is now a cursor-guided spell.
      • Pointed spells now have aim assist. If there is a single valid target on a turf user has clicked on, the spell will be automatically redirected to the valid target.
      • Nullrod variants are now chosen via a radial menu. Fancy!
      • Cardboard cutouts now use a radial menu to choose their skins.

      21 April 2020

      ArcaneMusic updated:

      • Botanical Toolbelts can now be made at the biogenerator, and holds most botanical tools.
      • The Floral Somatoray has been given a new, 3rd mode, able to mutate plant species.
      • Using a Somatoray on a tray enables you to lock in a specific mutation if a plant has multiple mutations, at the cost of plant endurance.
      • Plant Analyzers now have a toggle-able mode to scan either the chemical traits or the plant stats, to cut down on chat spam.
      • Plant Trays and dirt patches now start with 10 units of EZ Nutrient.
      • Mutagen has been made slightly less toxic overall.
      • Plant trays now passively decrease their toxicity based on the tray's parts, without randomness.
      • Science goggles, or any other reagent scanning equipment will enable you to see plant reagent traits on examine.
      • Instability now affects plants with lower instability tiers. (100 instability would have the effects of the 20, 40, 60,and 80+ instability tiers).
      • Irrigation now works properly again.
      • Plant trays with full nutrient tanks can be watered again.

      Arkatos updated:

      • Radial menu options will now always be clearly visible to the user.

      Cartographer-D updated:

      • Completely New Cargo Layout
      • The Small Security Room by the Vault has been replaced with Maintenance
      • Crate Returns are now easier to find and use
      • Tool Storage is smaller but more interesting!
      • The Mail Room and Offices have been combined
      • Cargo Warehouse is now more prominent and easier to break into
      • MULEs now have their own isolated room.
      • There are now easier ways to mail "packages" to departments

      Ghilker updated:

      • Added H2 gas
      • Added H2 gas burn (reaction with o2, similar to tritium but without the radiations)
      • Added Electrolyzer (machine to make H2, requires power cell, once turned on and with h2o in the air will start converting it to h2 and o2 with the reaction 2H2O -> 2H2 + O2. Upgrading the parts will increase the amount of converted H2O and the efficency of the cell)
      • Added H2 interaction with SM (similar to trit, less radiation emission, same heat production and a bit of heat protection)
      • H2 reaction with N2 to make ammonia crystals (reaction in open air to make the crystals, temperatures between 0 °C and - 120° C, more N2 than H2)
      • H2 reaction with bz as catalyst at high heat and pressure (over 1e6 for both) to make metal hydrogen
      • metallic hydrogen golem (one of endish atmosian goal)
      • changed fusion to use h2 instead of co2, everything else is still the same
      • plasma burn now produces h2o too (a quarter of the produced co2)
      • H2O vapor now slip under 30 °C so that plasma fires are not hellish
      • added electrolyzer sprites (reuse of some unused ones)
      • added ammonia crystals sprites remove: fusion no longer generate stim and nitryl

      Toastgoats updated:

      • Nanotrasen's current stock of Buckin' Bronco© applejack liquor has been recalled after studies showed trace amounts of horse meat.
      • Buckin Bronco Brewing Co has recently announced the release of a new and improved recipe! Be sure to try some at your local Nanotrasen bar!

      stylemistake updated:

      • tgui 3.0
      • tgui: Fixed the personal crafting interface.

      Capsandi updated:

      • You can now make shuttle seats with titanium.

      Ghilker updated:

      • Added heat and pressure limit to portable pumps and scrubbers
      • changed the damage calculation from a max() to a clamp() between 5 and 50
      • reduced max pressure output of t3 canisters to the same as t2

      Mickyan updated:

      • Fixed botanists dropping their heirlooms on the ground. Plant bag is no longer a heirloom option.

      Onule updated:

      Qustinnus updated:

      • carps now dont look for 9 tiles around them every process to locate a single piece of plastic that they can only interact with if they're next to it. They're also able to see plastic under them, such advanced creatures.

      Ryll/Shaps updated:

      • Added AUTO_DEADMIN_TIMEGATE which allows config force deadmin settings to only apply for the first X seconds in a round. Starts disabled
      • New preference to ignore being summoned as a cult ghost while admin'd, starts disabled

      Timberpoes updated:

      • Enabled new button allowing observers the ability to see chemicals and reagents identical to the health analyzer's chem scan functionality.
      • Laptops can now utilise the AI Restorer program.

      bobbahbrown updated:

      EgorDinamit updated:

      Ghilker updated:

      • Added 3 tiers to the canisters
      • added canister frames (also tiered)
      • canisters rupture if there is too much pressure or heat inside (higher tiers have higher thresholds)
      • added images for frames and overlays
      • N2O formation reaction (n2 + o2 + bz as catalyst + cold = n2o)
      • N2O toxic behaviour (if you inhale it you can die in your sleep) changed: NO2 Formation reaction (n2 + o2 + bz + heat = no2)

      LemonInTheDark updated:

      • Fixes bolt colors being jank when exposed to high and then low power
      • The h2o interactions have been polished and readded. Fucking global variables.

      Mickyan updated:

      • Being at the epicenter of explosions no longer damage the contents of storage that is meant to prevent it (most commonly photos inside photo albums)

      ArcaneMusic updated:

      08 April 2020

      ArcaneMusic updated:

      • Seed Extractors now show seed instability.
      • Botany can now print shears capable of removing plant genes, after researching the botany node.
      • Uranium can now be solidified in a chemical reaction, similar to gold and plasma.
      • Removed Plant Thinner and Trait Thinner chemicals (Unused)
      • Hydroponics trays now have a starting chemical capacity of 20.
      • Using a beaker on a hydroponics tray while the tray is full no longer acts like it's transferring reagents.
      • Ctrl-Clicking a tray will only enable autogrow when it's anchored.

      • The hazard cone has a new object sprite.

      ArcaneDefence updated:

      Fikou updated:

      • you can no longer fireman carry someone who you are grabbing by neck or choking and they cant climb on you when being grabbed by neck or choked

      LemonInTheDark, with thanks to: Hugbug for helping me reproduce and test untold times, Dennok for brainstorming the round() issue, duncathan for guiding me through QUANTIZE changes, Ghilker for helping me test the more arcane atmos stuff, as334 for assisting with debugging.       • Outlaws negative molar counts from the atmos system.

      • Silicons can control- and alt-click pumps and other atmos devices wirelessly to turn them on and max them.

      Timberpoes updated:

      • DNA Consoles have received hardware upgrades and have a shiny new interface as a result.
      • New hardware has dropped legacy support for reading the genetic sequences of the dead and has only limited support for reading the genetic sequences of monkeys.
      • Weapons should now spawn chambered and with full magazines.

      TiviPlus updated:

      • All Maps now have an Altar of the gods
      • New "Kotahi" card game now available in fun vendors
      • Cards stacks will now display the top 3 cards in your hand instead of a static image

      actioninja updated:

      • Replay recorder backend

      antropod updated:

      • Six new skins for medical gels. Default skin changed to gray. Alt+click to reskin. Medical gels bought from vendors cannot be reskinned.
