    20 June 2020

    Caldony updated:

    • NT finally decided to update the arcade battle video game after its terrible space game reviews from syndicate gaming.

    LemonInTheDark updated:

    • Fixed a "Feature" from 2 years ago. The sm will now pull objects closer to it based on the eer. This includes you, so be careful.
    • I've documented all of the sms variables.
    • Refactored sm code to be more modular. Badmins do not rejoice!

    19 June 2020

    Kathy Ryals updated:

    • The plant analyzer has been updated to be able to analyze a Podman health or chemical contents.

    LemonInTheDark updated:

    • The singularity will no longer turn snow or ice on icebox into lattices when at stage 5

    Ryll/Shaps updated:

    • Empaths are able to detect deafness derived from hearing damage
    • Inacusiate and Sensory Restoration no longer instantly heal all hearing damage when applied, instead rapidly removing both ear damage and deafness.
    • MedHUDs and observers now display quirks as intended on examine
    • Nanotrasen's Central Shipping department has put limits on the free shipping it offers on goody crates, to discourage abuse of its bluespace packaging

    SteelSlayer updated:

    • Removed a handful of unnecessary variables from intercoms.
    • Refactored intercom's code so that it doesn't need to process() and constantly check whether it's powered or EMP'd every few seconds.

    WarlockD updated:

    • Cyborgs can now use multi layer cable interface

    genessee596 updated:

    • TCG brand trading cards now show their rarity on the card, with tiers of rarity attached to a background color on the 'N' box on the bottom right corner.

    18 June 2020

    ATHATH updated:

    • pAIs no longer start with a medHUD, secHUD, and diagHUD turned on as soon as they're downloaded, even if they haven't bought any HUDs yet.
    • You can now take obligate carnivory grafts from jupiter cups.
    • You can now take fire resistance grafts from lavaland plants.

    Iamgoofball updated:

    • Gangsters are, in fact, antags, and can totally kill, destroy, and murder all they want.
    • Fixes GARBAGE DAY
    • Dynamic Families now goes from 30 to 15 minutes, instead of 60 to 30 minutes.
    • Space Cop Objectives have been changed in Families.

    ShizCalev updated:

    • Fixed a scenario that allowed infinite resource generation via ore machines.
    • Swarmers can no longer cut power lines by deconstructing catwalks underneath them.
    • Corrected a minor grammar error when attacking mobs with sharp stuff.
    • Clothing repair now works.
    • Fixed redundant "shredded x fell apart, completely shredded!" message when damaging clothing in your hands.
    • Added better pronoun handling for clothing that consist of a pair of items (ie shoes, gloves, ect)
    • Shredding clothing while holding it will no longer make you drop it.
    • Shredding clothing while holding it will no longer tell you that it fell off you.
    • Moths can no longer infinitely eat shredded clothing.
    • Tears in the very fabric of reality created by Eldritch gods can no longer be mended with acid, fire, and TK.

    TheSpaghetti updated:

    • orang

    Timberpoes updated:

    • Added scroll bar to ghost Orbit target selection menu.

    Tlaltecuhtli updated:

    • organ transport box, if filled with cryostylene or ice it ll keep organs and bodyparts like heads inside frozen ( they dont decay)

    WarlockD updated:

    • Added markdown for paper

    tralezab updated:

    • heretics raising the living into ghouls

    17 June 2020

    EdgeLordExe updated:

    • Having Codex Cicatrix in a pocket while sacrificing someone will give you charges now.

    Firecage updated:

    • Clown cars are now unable to be driven over ice chasms.

    LoserWasTaken updated:

    • ooc no longer checks if message is ic if round hasn't started

    Melbert updated:

    • Fixed staff of animation being able to spawn animated objects inside containers (ie bags)

    Mickyan updated:

    • fixed missing icon appearing while wearing wigs, again!
    • wigs will once again change inventory icon based on hairstyle

    Ryll/Shaps updated:

    • You can no longer embed items into walls

    ShizCalev updated:

    • Engineering scanner goggles are now the correct color when their modes are switched.
    • Fixed cable coils always showing as a full stack.

    TheChosenEvilOne updated:

    • emergency shuttle console no longer lists authorizations twice.

    15 June 2020

    Cobby kills medbots!!! updated:

    • Medbots that are suppose to heal other damage types than brute now actually do so

    IradT updated:

    • Added a doorjack to the Metaops bundle
    • added wound armor to the wizard hat

    Jared-Fogle updated:

    • The health analyzer is now the first item in the first aid kits.
    • You will now see an alert when you are drunk.

    Shadark updated:

    • Deltastation Morgue is now accessible from the main hallway.

    ShizCalev updated:

    • Fixed a bunch of errors appearing on arcade machines and various monitors / computers when powered off.

    14 June 2020

    Arkatos updated:

    • Airlocks will now immediately show their unrestricted access sides when created via RCD.

    Fikou updated:

    • you can no longer have fun in ctf with metal

    Iamgoofball updated:

    • Members of the crew with mindshields have remembered that anti-gang PSA they watched back in space high school.

    Jared-Fogle updated:

    • Added a new organized orbit menu.
    • Fixed ghosting making your body look undefibbable to a medical HUD.

    a few Sprites from Kryson updated:

    • Heretics have been spotted near your area, don't let them succed.
    • Added a sane version of GetAllContents called get_all_gear().

    bobbahbrown updated:

    • Fixed malformed SQL queries for logging admin permission changes.

    dragomagol updated:

    • Nanotrasen has begun producing Peacekeeper plushes to improve public reception of silicons

    ~~yorii~~ Space updated:

    • lava boat oars work now

    13 June 2020

    ATHATH updated:

    • The message that you receive when you try to use a gang induction package as a mindshielded person no longer implies that your mindshield has given you fake memories of attending an anti-gang seminar.

    Arkatos updated:

    • Unrestricted directional access settings will now show correct directions in the related UIs.
    • Theoretical radiuses will now show properly in the Tachyon-Doppler Array UI.

    Ryll/Shaps updated:

    • Medbot interaction menus are fixed
    • You can no longer queue multiple medbot flips at once
    • Medbots now have lots more to say, especially if you knock them over!

    Shadark updated:

    • Detective gets roundstart normal sunglasses instead of SecHUDs at PubbyStation.
    • Balanced access to arrest option through SecHUDs, now requiring Security access instead of Brig access.
    • Balanced access to portable turrets, now requiring Security access instead of Brig access.

    ShizCalev updated:

    • Fixed a scenario where changelings would have missing textures when disguised.
    • Fixed a scenario where camouflage items would have missing textures.
    • Items in your suit storage should have less missing textures now.
    • Restore the ion rifle's unique belt texture.
    • Fixed a few more belt items having missing textures.
    • Fixed washing machines sometimes fucking up an item's worn texture.

    tmtmtl30 updated:

    • dynamic families rulesets can now be forced and will execute instead of runtiming

    12 June 2020

    ATHATH updated:

    • Borgs and AIs now start with their borgHUDs/siliconHUDs on by default.

    Jared-Fogle updated:

    • Ghosts will now be revealed when the round is over.

    Ryll/Shaps updated:

    • Introduces medical wounds, new injuries that can happen to fleshy carbons when they sustain lots of damage on a bodypart. There's quite a lot of change here, but you can read the guide at: https://tgstation13.org/wiki/Guide_to_wounds and an extended changelog is available here: https://hackmd.io/l_FI9b3tSqa_woDadewJXA
    • Introduces scars and temporal scarring! Healing a wound leaves a scar behind that can be seen by examining someone twice rapidly, and if Temporal Scarring is enabled in character prefs, surviving a round with scars will save them to be granted at roundstart another round! Let your body tell stories!
    • Bleeding is now fully bodypart-focused, and 95% of bleeding comes from cut wounds from sharp weapons. Gauze is applied on a limb-by-limb basis, and helps staunch bloodflow rather than totally stop it. Notably, you no longer bleed just from having 40+ brute damage on a limb.
    • Organic bodyparts are no longer disabled at maximum damage, but are easier to cause wounds to
    • O2 medkits in emergency lockers have been replaced with new emergency medkits with basic tools for diagnosing and treating wounds and basic damage
    • Herapin now rapidly increases bleeding on all open cuts, rather than causing bleeding by itself. The more cuts on the target, the more it will affect them.
    • Neckgrab table slams now hit the targeted limb rather than just the head, with a large chance to dislocate or break a bone
    • Sharp weapons and burning weapons can now shred zones on jumpsuits, disabling protection on that limb. Damaged clothes can be repaired with cloth.
    • Slaughter demons now deal less raw damage, but gain the ability to cause cut wounds, which becomes more powerful with each attack on a humanoid but resets when bloodcrawling.

    Timberpoes updated:

    • Delta's Genetics Lab has been redesigned.
    • Pubby's Genetics Lab has been redesigned.
    • Science ID Card access levels have been redesigned. R&D now has its own dedicated access level with Toxins and Toxins Storage having their own dedicated access levels.
    • Science doors across all maps have had their access levels tweaked, especially around maintenance access and R&D access.
    • Geneticists now have R&D Access across all maps.
    • Xenobiology's Winter Coats now have a new set of pockets that can hold all the same equipment as a lab coat.
    • All Xenobiology secure containment areas there were missing them, now have Connector/Injector pairs for injecting gasses directly into secure containment.
    • Pubby's Xenobiology lab now has three slime spawns.
    • Pubby's Xenobiology lab has been expanded with addtional containment pens.
    • Meta's Xenobiology freezer no longer shares a pipe with Xenobio's air distribution pipes. Scientists should no longer freeze to death and space suits with internals are no longer necessary.
    • Delta's Xenobiology lab now requires Xenobiology access to enter.
    • Delta's Xenobiology lab has been expanded with additional containment pens.
    • Pubby's Toxins Mass Driver room now has an intercom.
    • Delta's Toxins Mass Driver room's intercom has been moved closer to the Tachyon-Doppler Research Array.
    • Prototype Hardsuits have been moved to the RD's Office on from Toxins on Meta and Pubby.
    • All Genetics Labs across all station now come fully equipped with Body Bags, Space Cleaner and Mutadone.
    • Box's Genetics Lab now has an air alarm.
    • Meta's Genetics Lab's camera has been moved so the AI can see the entire lab, including the Air Alarm.
    • Geneticists will no longer spawn in the monkey pen on Meta.
    • The Medical Laptop in Delta's Genetics lab can now be accessed by Geneticists.
    • Pubby's Robotics Lab now has a Cautery!
    • Probably more minor quality of life changes I forgot to document as I made them.

    11 June 2020

    Arkatos updated:

    • Tachyon-Doppler Array now uses tgui.

    Inept updated:

    • Card collectors, rejoice! The NTED has released a new binder for storing your TCG cards. Pick one up at the Fun vendor today!

    ShizCalev updated:

    • I comes before E, except after C.
    • Wearing a gun on your armor / belt will no longer result in your waist turning purple and black.

    tmtmtl30 updated:

    • The Families gamemode and antagonist have been refactored and should perform more sanely in some cases.
    • Families can now appear in dynamic rounds.

    10 June 2020

    ATHATH updated:

    • The in-game podcloning guide (The Human Harvest: From Seed to Market) has been updated.
    • Venus human traps now have x-ray and thermal vision.

    ArcaneMusic updated:

    • The Seed Vault ruin now comes equip with the complete modern arsenal of new botany tools and equipment.

    Arkatos updated:

    • Holopad now uses tgui.

    Cobby updated:

    • craftable medbots now only heal brute unless they are built with specialized medkits.
    • medbots built with the brute medkit heal 10% more
    • medbots built with the advance medkit heal all damage types

    Fox McCloud updated:

    • Fixes attack animations being stuttery and twitchy; they should, once again, be buttery smooth

    GoldenAlpharex updated:

    • New Modular Console Preset added: /obj/machinery/modular_computer/console/preset/id

    Inept updated:

    • The Nanotrasen Entertainment Division has released a new product: Tarot cards! They're available from the Fun vendor for all your divination needs.

    Jared-Fogle updated:

    • Fixed the medical HUD sometimes reporting undefibbable bodies as defibbable and vice versa.
    • Fixed plasmamen needing hearts in order to be defibbed.
    • Fixed crew with HARS needing a brain to be defibbed.
    • Fixed defibrillators being borked. Sorry!

    Kelenius updated:

    • Hygienebot construction has been fixed.
    • Hygienebots now require a proximity sensor between welding and tubing.
    • Hygienebots no longer slip their path while chasing someone.
    • Hygienebots are less spammy.

    Ryll/Shaps updated:

    • You can now tip over medbots!

    ShizCalev updated:

    • Defibbing now works properly on ALL species that don't require hearts to survive, as opposed to just plasmamen.
    • Defibbing now works properly on mobs with the Muscled Veins trait if their heart was removed.

    TheChosenEvilOne updated:

    • Fixed dynamic giving antagonist roles to jobs that shouldn't get them (again).

    TiviPlus updated:

    • Succesful restart votes will now complete instantly

    bababooey updated:

    • bababooey

    bobbahbrown updated:

    • Improved performance of lighting code

    tmtmtl30 updated:

    • removed deprecated check_win() proc

    08 June 2020

    IndieanaJones updated:

    • Lavaland elite loot drops for Broodmother and Legionnaire now have in-hand use functions
    • Lavaland elites now have more health in their arena fights, along with several other balance changes
    • Fixed lavaland elites not being able to damage mechs

    SpaceManiac updated:

    • BSQL has been replaced with rust-g, improving SQL reliability and safety.

    07 June 2020

    LemonInTheDark updated:

    • Breaking a canister while it's wrenched down will no longer cause it to look "goofy"

    TheChosenEvilOne updated:

    • Removed high population override from dynamic.
    • fixed dynamic runtiming with invalid configurations.

    tmtmtl30 updated:

    • Dynamic roundstart ruleset scaling on second-rolled roundstart rulesets has been slightly tweaked.

    06 June 2020

    IradT updated:

    • fixed changeling reset function not giving the right values after absorbing another changeling

    Ryll/Shaps updated:

    • Having a circle hand or slapper in hand no longer protects you from xeno tackles or borg buckling

    05 June 2020

    LemonInTheDark updated:

    • The singularity no longer turns reinforced floor tiles into infinite rods
    • Added some unit tests for cards, hopefully you'll see fun things with this soon.

    MrDoomBringer updated:

    • Supplypods can once again have custom falling sounds

    nemvar updated:

    • Icelag fix boxed

    04 June 2020

    ATHATH updated:

    • The 16 second hardstun that non-pAI mulebots with cut avoidance wires apply to living creatures they bump into has been replaced with a much more tame 8 second knockdown.

    ArcaneMusic updated:

    • Organic Pest Killer is now available in the biogenerator.
    • Pest Killer and Weed Killer now applies the correct amount of toxicity and doesn't individually harm the plant's health.
    • Pest/Week killer bottles now have a transfer rate of 1 ,2, and 5 units per use, and a max capacity of 30 units.

    Fikou updated:

    • atmos jumpsuit now has the same armor values as engi jumpsuit
    • replaces plasma in bluespace beaker design with plastic

    Ryll/Shaps updated:

    • Cigarette packets now have coupons on the back for small cargo items! Smoking DOES pay!
    • Single/small items in cargo have been rebranded as goodies, come in lockboxes rather than crates, and can only be purchased with private accounts. They also are immune to the 10% private account fee, obviously.

    Skoglol updated:

    • Removed some dead unused code in languages.
    • Box gravity generator and AI core APC rewired to smes, will not run out roundstart anymore. P.A.C.M.A.N. added to grav gen for emergencies.

    TheChosenEvilOne updated:

    • Dynamic will no longer give antagonist roles to jobs who shouldn't have them when restricted roles is set in the config.

    Tlaltecuhtli updated:

    • lightfloor makes colored lights and are more visible
    • you can turn them off/on by using your screwdriver
    • you can emp em
    • breaking them actually works
    • using a broken bulb wont fix em sprites: flicker states for each colour

    necromanceranne updated:

    • Neckgrabs and especially floor neckgrabs are no longer near impossible to escape.
    • Resisting a grab is more consistent across the board, but you get less chances at resisting a grab and take more stamina damage.

    02 June 2020

    ArcaneMusic updated:

    • The hallway on icebox mining is slightly longer. and the ladder deposits you in the locker room.
    • The icebox mining ladder works again.

    EOBGames, ArcaneMusic, LemonInTheDark updated:

    • Nanotrasen is pleased to announce the 2560 Core Set of the NT TCG has been released! Aspiring collectors can purchase booster packs from the Fun Vendor, as well as bulk purchases at cargo. Happy hunting!

    Kelenius updated:

    • DNA scanner can now store any amount of mutations and chromosomes.

    01 June 2020

    Fhaxaris updated:

    • baton, health analyzer, classic baton, PDA and pinpointer.

    Fikou updated:

    • Our Nanotrasen Elite Anti-Animal Team hunted down King Goat and stopped his reign forever. As a memorial of this event you can now get a cute goat plushie from the arcades.

    PrimordialOoze updated:

    • Split the Ignore verb into two verbs (Ignore and Unignore)
    • Unignore allows you to view your ignore list
    • Unignore allows you to unignore players who are offline
    • Ignore and Unignore should not interfere with Stealth Mode

    SomeoneYouProbablyKnow updated:

    • Psychologists gets a new Hud icon that's not a P
    • The "incarcerated" sec hud icon gets a new sprite that is not a P

    TemporalOroboros updated:

    • Firesuits and radiation suits can now fit most internals tanks.

    Timberpoes updated:

    • Only the Descendents of Asclepius who have taken the Hippocratic Oath may perform the Healing Touch miracle and conduct multiple concurrent surgeries. Everyone else is limited to a single surgery step at a time.

    nemvar updated:

    • Glow will now always be a random color.
    • Antiglow will now absorb all light equally.
    • Improved waddling for big things.

    31 May 2020

    Fikou updated:

    • a bunch of items no longer give illegal tech

    Helianthus00 updated:

    • Fixed the air supply and scrubber pipes to be more neat, as well as fixing a few displaced vents in medbay
    • removed the double cable on one of the AI upload doors.

    MacBlaze1 updated:

    • fixed no one showing up on crew monitor or #51332

    30 May 2020

    ArcaneMusic updated:

    • Plant sprites no longer ERROR when just planted.

    Kathy Ryals updated:

    • The Nanite Programmer and Nanite Program Hub can now be properly deconstructed.

    MrDoomBringer updated:

    • You should seriously consider playing for over five thousand hours, okay?

    Ryll/Shaps updated:

    • Characters of "Other" gender can now choose between male and female sprites in their preferences

    Shadark updated:

    • Plant analyzer can now be used on planted glowshrooms.
    • Planted glowshrooms are more influenced by their stats.
    • Planted glowshrooms expand more rapidly, but decay over time.

    29 May 2020

    ArcaneMusic updated:

    • Standard Engineering tools now show up on the player when worn on the belt.

    AsphaltEvidence updated:

    • added directional sprites to the arcade machines
    • added directional sprites to the arcade machine screens

    MrDoomBringer updated:

    • Nanotrasen is pleased to announce that their employee's inner monologues will now be able to properly spell intricacies

    Qustinnus updated:

    • fixes a critical bug where you couldn't build toilets out of pizza or meat.

    TheVekter updated:

    • Nanotrasen is experimenting further regarding the interaction between hydrogen and plasma. A new cargo bounty has been added for a single tank of hydrogen.
    • Centcom no longer needs Phazon mechs delivered to them.

    nemvar updated:

    • Nerfed the power chromosome + (anti)-glowy mutation

    willox updated:

    • remove unnecessary var/id from /datum/material

      • You should seriously consider playing for over five thousand hours, okay?

      Ryll/Shaps updated:

      • Characters of "Other" gender can now choose between male and female sprites in their preferences

      • Plant analyzer can now be used on planted glowshrooms.
      • Planted glowshrooms are more influenced by their stats.
      • Planted glowshrooms expand more rapidly, but decay over time.

      • Adds Enduro Grow, a botany biogenerator chem that improves a plant's endurance stat, but decreases it's yield and potency.

      LemonInTheDark updated:

      • Changed the way h2o interacts with the engine. It should acts similar to o2 normally, but in high concentrations it cools the engine down. Have fun :)
      • Mulebots no longer go insane when shit starts to lag
      • Refactored client.view into a datum, changed some zoom values to work properly
      • Spinning while using a binocular will work as expected
      • Fully adds widescreen support to zooming
      • I've moved the pixel scaling and zoom methods from the menu bar to the game preferences window. You'll need to reset them.
      • Pixel size will now automatically update on zoom, so you won't end up with ui buttons you can't see.

      • Fixed grammar stuff on crystal consume announcement

      • Performing a head transplant will now properly preserve the appearance.

      • adds a helper to see if something is edible
      • You can now use ! and ? at the end of 'spawn' chatbar verb commands to search for only the ends of paths, or to automatically select a random type of the paths your search returns! Happy badminning!

      07 September 2020

      CRITAWAKETS updated:

      • Nanotrasen has updated the cooling setup of telecommunications rooms in Delta-Pattern Stations. It now makes the simulation faster.

      Dennok updated:

      • passive gate max out limit pressure settings increased
      • passive gate description more precise

      Maurukas updated:

      • Cryo cells work again and are no longer permanent icy prisons

      Timberpoes updated:

      • Reduced Diagnostics nanite program has been removed.
      • Nanite Debugging nanite program has been added. This program causes your nanites to display their program list when scanned, but comes with a 0.1/s nanite cost.
      • Reduced Diagnostics nanite program functionality is now default behaviour. The nanite program list is hidden from nanite scanners by default. You now now to include the Nanite Debugging program to show the program list on scan.
      • Researching Harmonic Nanite Programming now confers a passive boost of 0.1 regen rate to all nanite clouds. This boost takes effects as soon as the node is researched.
      • Harmonic Nanite Programming research node now requires 3000 General and 3000 Nanite research, an increase of 1000 each.

      06 September 2020

      Bumtickley00 updated:

      • The blood filter can now be put in medical belts and medical aid kits
      • Spray bottles, amputation shears, and surgical tape can now be put in the medical aid kit
      • Printing and recycling bonesetters no longer creates materials from nothing

      Radacitus updated:

      • Adds a new Ingredient Beacon and gives it to the Chef in-place of their Ingredient Box on spawn.
      • Adds some custom text that appears when you use the Chef and Curator Beacons.

      Ryll/Shaps updated:

      • Fixed an issue preventing zombies from being decappable. Krokodil addict zombies are also no longer immune to wounds
      • Eswords/dual sabers/armblades/light eaters/similar weapons no longer have significantly reduced wounding power and are similar in dismembering power to their old incarnations. In addition, they are moderately less hard-countered by armor.
      • Attacking a prone target will now hit the targeted limb 90% of the time rather than the standard 80% (50% less likely to hit a different limb)
      • Sutures and cauterization are more effective at patching up piercing wounds
      • Improvised cauterization (anything hot that isn't a cautery) is now slightly less efficient and requires an aggressive grab to apply to the target. No more accidentally trying to cauterize the guy you just attacked with an esword!

      YPOQ updated:

      • Fixed internal martyrdom.

      nightred updated:

      • Many stomach issues
      • Health Analyzers, and medical kiosk now show stomach contents

      • And the achievement code is much nicer :)

    04 September 2020

    ATHATH updated:

    • The "plating repair tool" has been added to the game in the form of a printable upgrade for janiborgs. It's a subtype of the cautery that can repair burnt or damaged hull platings, allowing floor tiles to be placed over them once again.
    • The upgrade that adds it to a janiborg's list of tools can be printed once the Cyborg Upgrades: Utility tech node is researched.

    ArcaneMusic updated:

    • You can't use the civilain bounty console while depowered anymore.

    Couls updated:

    • Prevents fire from becoming permanent

    02 September 2020

    ATHATH updated:

    • Penthrite no longer makes you immune to staminacrit.
    • Penthrite no longer has an effect on people who can't metabolize it.
    • Spam-buckling and spam-unbuckling someone to/from a stasis bed while they have penthrite in their system will no longer cause them to enter a state of permanent critical condition.
    • If you regain the ability to metabolize chems while you have penthrite in your system, you'll also regain the special traits (immunity to hardcrit, immunity to softcrit, and immunity to the effects of heart failure) that penthrite's supposed to give you.
    • Penthrite now makes you immune to the damage over time that being in crit gives you, so as to better mimic its previous/intended effects.
    • Penthrite's description has been modified slightly.

    Arkatos updated:

    • Admin controlled shuttles will now redirect to an actual shuttle controls upon authorization request instead of always targeting CentCom ferry. Admin staff can now also alternatively unlock or relock the shuttle upon request.
    • Escape pods no longer start as admin controlled shuttles, they simply start locked until appropriate code level is set.

    Fikou updated:

    • fixes mechpad crowbar act
    • select equipment now includes basic plasmaman outfit

    Ghilker updated:

    • unlocked atmos full layer potential (now 5 layers avaiable instead of 3, not all objects can use the additional layers)
    • More flavor texts to crystal event related devices and structures to help players on what to do
    • Ability to close the portals by using the combination of Analizer+Signaler
    • Crystal monsters have now different ability but similar health and damage
    • You can sacrifice someone to the crystal to increase the spawn delay by 5 seconds permanently
    • sound effects to the destabilized crystal
    • spawned anomalies don't explode anymore
    • event will end in a reasonable time
    • Added a word to fix messaging with the slot machine.
    • Kotahi decks will now Shuffle properly

    XDTM updated:

    • Abductor healing glands now properly check organ damage when detecting which organs to replace.
    • Abductor healing glands can now replace damaged stomachs and inflamed appendixes.
    • Abductor healing glands now also reject implants (like mindshield implants) on top of cybernetic organs.

    actioninja updated:

    • Fallback order of on mob icons was changed to match older versions, correcting some issues with missing sprites

    dootdoom updated:

    • Cargo supply console is now next to the supply shuttle on box and pubby.

    spessman-007 updated:

    • Removed unused files

    vuonojenmustaturska updated:

    • Cleaned up porta-turret code ever so slightly

    09 May 2020

    RaveRadbury updated:

    • light tiles are less picky about how you hold the multitool
    • Health Analyzers only detect Major Disabilities, rather than all quirks
    • Advanced Health Analyzers can detect Minor Disabilities as well

    Ryll/Shaps updated:

    • The INTERACTING_WITH macro now tracks all kinds of do_after

    Jack7D1 updated:

    • Puddles are now infinite sources of water again.

    • The searing tool now starts as a cautery, rather than a drill.
    • It is now easier to change the flags of turrets.
    • Quick swapping a suit will now properly check suit storage.

    LemonInTheDark updated:

    • Hello admins, I've made your view options better reflect reality, you can't crash parallax for yourself by using them now.

    Melbert updated:

    • Slightly made it easier for blind people to examine things in hand / examine things closer
    • Fixed delayed blind examinations
    • Fixed blind people examining things with disabled/detached hands
    • Fixed blind people being able to reach through windows

    MoonFalcon updated:

    • Allow heretic ghouls to use the sickly blade and ashen eyes

    Paxilmaniac updated:

    • Lesser summon bees, a spell that summons bees

    Ryll/Shaps updated:

    • Dying people can gasp and deathgasp again
    • Borgs can deathgasp (and normal gasp I guess) while stunned again
    • The message for disembowelment now properly displays

    Timberpoes updated:

    • Click-dragging behaviour has been restored to normal. Players will no longer attempt to buckle things to other things except when they quite intend to.
    • R&D Consoles are no longer required to operate other machinery including mechfabs, omni-protolathes, omni-imprinters and the destructive analyzer. These consoles have been removed and replaced with basic modular computers.
    • The destructive analyzer has lost its material reclaimation feature. It now only destroys items and unlocks techweb nodes.

    Wayland-Smithy updated:

    • Spectral Blade - Ghosts that orbit it or the holder are no longer forced to spectate it until the end of time. Huzzah!
    • For real. Not kidding. You can answer the call to aid someone with your spooky presence and then STOP ORBITING ON YOUR OWN AT ANY TIME just like any other object.
    • Ghosts no longer receive a redundant orbit link when the Spectral Blade is raised.
    • Alien larva can no longer evolve in vents and become stuck.

    oranges updated:

    • New achievements for science

    tralezab updated:

    • mafia lobby now refreshes correctly!

    uomo91 updated:

    • The public can now exit the labor shuttle arrivals area on Box and Delta, without having to wait for the AI or sec to let them out.
    • The gulag teleporter will now give prison jumpskirts, if the player's preference is set to jumpskirt.

    01 September 2020

    ArcaneMusic updated:

    • By using a TCG card on another TCG card, you can create piles of cards in order to play against each other.
    • Using a deck if tcg cards on a table allows you to shuffle, flip, and draw from the deck as well.

    Ryll/Shaps updated:

    • Pun Pun is Pun Pun again (except in rare cases where he is not)
    • Keep an eye out for Furious George though, he's a serious loose cannon

    tralezab updated:

    • New swab for netherworld critters! Make sure you put them into a different vat system than your other ones, as they do not react well with normal reagents!
    • Hypernoblium now turns into a reagent when inhaled, which stops the combustion if on a Plasmaman system.
    • Plasmaman interaction with Hypernoblium in the air, stop combustion and extinguishes if they are already on fire.
    • Trash bags can no longer be equipped on belt.

    TheVekter updated:

    • Removed the ability to print mini meteor toys from the autolathe and obtain them from cargo crates.

    nemvar updated:

    • Staff of nothing now shoots nothing.
    • Wand of nothing shoots nothing again, instead of doing nothing.

    06 May 2020

    ATHATH updated:

    • Unborks the sensory restoration symptom. It should work like having oculine and inacusiate in your system now.
    • Adjusts inacusiate's description to more accurately reflect what it actually does.
    • The eye_blind and eye_blurry healing from oculine is no longer instant, although oculine still has its 20% chance per chem tick to instantly remove the TRAIT_BLIND trait from you (if it was caused by eye damage).
    • Replaces the "You are now blinking manually." fake positive message from the hallucigen symptom with a "Your ears feel great." message.
    • Fixes a typo in one of the messages from the sensory restoration symptom.

    ArcaneMusic updated:

    • Almost all food items are now exportable from cargo.
    • Adjusts the Bananium Shield to be properly covered when held in the opposite hands.

    Arkatos updated:

    • Janitorial cart now uses a radial menu.

    • lavaland base turbine now charges SMES

    Dionant updated:

    • Renamed some 10mm ammo to 9mm.

    uomo91 updated:

    • You can buckle yourself and others into chairs that you're right next to, instead of needing to be on top of the chair to do it.
    • You cannot pry up floor tiles in the holodeck photobooth anymore.
    • The advanced fire extinguisher now has an inhand sprite, and no longer looks like a regular extinguisher.

    ArcaneMusic updated:

    • Adds map_generator datums, which will handle terrain generation for a specific area
    • Adds a jungle generator datum, which uses rust-g noise to generate 3 layers of perlin noise to make a somewhat coheisve and seamless jungle based on height humidity and heat.

    • Silicons and parrots can speak into their radios again.

    29 August 2020

    ATHATH updated:

    • Blob spores from gold slime core and hostile life reactions are now marked as being independent, meaning that they can now drag things, but can no longer freely walk through blob tiles.
    • Independent blob spores and blobbernauts can now speak over blob chat like overmind-dependent blob mobs do.
    • Blob spores can no longer damage the environment, for realzies this time. This change does not affect blob zombies.
    • Removed an unused variable from tech nodes (and the unused proc that references it).

    ArcaneMusic updated:

    • Admins can now spawn the Teambuilding machine for assign teams, like Red or Blue, quickly!
    • Sinks and showers can now have reagents piped into them.
    • Using metal sheets on reagent dispensers will now produce a plumbing-enabled supply tank for station use.
    • Added a new stock part, the water recycler, used in building showers and sinks from scratch.
    • Hydroponics trays are now plumbing enabled. Water and nutrients will be sorted into their appropriate slots when piped in.
    • Sinks and showers now have internal water reservoirs, and start filled with water.
    • Showers and sinks must be constructed from a frame, then finished with a water recycler. remove: Hydroponics hoses have been removed in favor of actual plumbing between machines.

    Donkie updated:

    • Fixed regular pump on map icon north/south being misaligned by 1 pixel

    EdgeLordExe updated:

    • Rust_spread will no longer lag servers into oblivion
    • Changed a few flavour texts to better represent lore.
    • Rustbringer's oath now properly only heals while on rusted tiles.

    Helianthus00 updated:

    • Deltastation: made a maint area below the captain's office

    Krysonism updated:

    • granting a mob sentience, with the sentience potion also tames it.

    Melbert updated:

    • You can now remove items from food storage by clicking on them on grab intent.
    • Componentizes food storage from food/snacks/store.

    TiviPlus updated:

    • A bunch of 1 and 0 use the true/false define now and changed up a bunch of returns

    VexingRaven updated:

    • Plasmaman Supply Kit description now properly lists the envirosuit gloves it contains

    Wayland-Smithy updated:

    • A vulnerability in the AI chamber anti-abduction foil lining has been fixed.

    ATHATH updated:

    • You can now print stethoscopes from autolathes and medical protolathes.

    • Station AI cores are now stored in a tin foil-lined room, in response to reports of mysterious teleporting AI thieves.

    • Removed hidden racks, less torture on station.

    silicons updated:

    • freon should not have you stuck immobilized anymore

    stylemistake updated:

    • tgchat: Unread message count is now smarter and won't increase on other tabs if you have already read the same message in the active tab.
    • tgchat: Admin PMs are now properly annotated and can be filtered into separate tabs.
    • tgchat: Fix: Highlighted message overlay no longer blocks clicks. Clicking a highlighted `(F)` link should work as it should.
    • tgui: Fixed NTOS bluescreen due to calling `.includes()` on a stylesheet href which could be null on certain browsers.
    • tgchat: Chat schema bumped to version 5. All chat-related settings were reset to avoid breakage.
    • tgchat: Fixed adminsay to no longer show up as [object Object].

    05 May 2020

    Fikou updated:

    • goats in the king of goats lair are now affected by kinetic crusher

    FuryMcFlurry, Yeeye updated:

    • Missing textures and error models are now visible if an item has a broken icon. If you see broken assets in game, report it!

    Iamgoofball updated:

    • The clown now bleeds Colorful Reagent on April Fools.

    Timberpoes updated:

    • RnD Consoles will no longer list BEPIS-exclusive research nodes in list view as available for research.

    necromanceranne updated:

    • The stechkin pistol is now a makarov. It comes chambered in 9mm. Nothing has really changed for performance or ammo availability. It's just all in 9mm now.
    • The stechkin APS is now normal sized and available to nukies for 10 tc. It sprays bullets like mad and fires very quickly.
    • The caravan now has stechkin APS magazines.
    • The Spetznaz bundle uses incendiary magazines for the APS.
    • .45 is stronger across the board by about 5 damage, and has more bullet variety.
    • the c20-r is a 3 burst weapon and costs 13tc.
    • 5.56mm now has 30 armor penetration and has some bullet spread.. This only affects the m90gl and the Boarder assault rifles.
    • You can buy phasic ammo for the m90 for 8 tc out of the uplink. It passes through walls and objects, and does significantly less damage. (comparatively speaking of course)
    • X-Ray beams now pass through doors, machinery, and structures like lockers.

    uomo91 updated:

    • Pubby Station has had some small budget increases; the stasis bed room is no longer extremely crowded, and some extra IV drips have been supplied.
    • Nanotrasen has fixed a clerical error which gave medical doctors clearance to enter the genetics lab.

    willox updated:

    • removed some duplicate proc definitions
    • syndicate holster now properly sets itself as silent
    • rend tears and temporary object used by fulton extraction can no longer be eaten by singularity
    • hygiene bot no longer cleans objects twice when passed over

    04 May 2020

    EdgeLordExe updated:

    • Nitroglycerin : You now have to use exotic stabilizer.
    • TaTP : The more you use it, the more powerful it becomes. You now have to stabilize it with exotic stabilizer
    • RDX : produces slightly bigger heatwave and slightly bigger shockwave. Now requires gold.
    • Gunpowder : strengthdiv 8 - > 10 (nerf), modifier 2 - > 5 (buff).
    • Methamphetamine : strengthdiv 6 -> 12 (nerf), modifier 1 - > 5 (buff).
    • Moved some power from facid to nitric acid.
    • Hyper-plasmium oxide can be commonly found in lavaland geysers
    • Exotic stabilizer can now be crafted with hyper-plasmium oxide and stabilizing agent

    LemonInTheDark updated:

    • Fixes an issue with sentient diseases and darkness

    • New Status Panel!

    Donkie updated:

    • Footprints and bloody shoes major update. Hardsuits and bare feet can now get bloody as well. Improved blood spreading behaviour.
    • Shoes will no longer get bloody while wearing something that covers them.

    Iamgoofball updated:

    • Electric bolts no longer explode shit.
    • Electric bolts no longer lag the server as a result.
    • Med records populate full from your quirk list

    Timberpoes updated:

    • Due to a need to lower manufacturing costs, all space suits are now made of inferior thermal material and no longer maintain the wearer's temperature indefinitely after their cells run out of charge.

    jdawg1290 updated:

    • You will now be able to succumb through the use of a button on your HUD.

    Kylerace updated:

    • All holodeck sims now 9x10,
    • All stations can accommodate the enlarged holodecks
    • added skatepark sim
    • added space checkers sim

    Melbert updated:

    • Bees, if placed in a container, will pop out at the next person to open it

    OnlineGirlfriend updated:

    • wedding crate
    • tuxedo, wedding dress, veil, cummerbund, craftable bouquets

    Qustinnus updated:

    • undress the clown and swab his clothing, I wonder what kind of gross cell samples they have.

    Ryll/Shaps updated:

    • Quickswapping clothing now properly unequips the swapped-out clothing, removing any traits they granted while worn
    • You can now grab your own bleeding limbs to slow your bloodloss! Target your bleeding limb and click on yourself with grab intent and an open hand. This won't speed the clotting, but you'll lose blood more slowly.
    • You can now juice/grind banana peels to act as makeshift coagulant. hahaha ewwwwww
    • Most wound treatments (besides manipulating dislocated limbs) now respect thick clothing, so you can no longer suture through space suits.
    • Scars are a bit less noticeable, and it takes twice as much scar severity to reach a state of "absolutely fucked up" when examined. They're also a bit more varied in description.
    • Whetstones now make things sharp edged instead of pointy edged, so they'll now deal slashing wounds instead of piercing (which means sharpening a cleaver or knife won't make it suddenly suck at hacking people apart). They also increase wounding power!
    • Romerol zombies can now be wounded properly
    • Using sutures to treat slashes and pierces now correctly consumes the sutures. You can also no longer use unopened regen mesh for treating wounds.
    • You can no longer repeatedly disembowel people who have already lost their guts.
    • Execution and gunpoint shots now increase the wounding power of the shot as well as the damage, and apply their bonuses to each pellet fired rather than just one
    • Piercing wounds make further wounds slightly easier to deal
    • Hellguns now cost 2250 credits instead of 2000
    • You can no longer punch yourself while holding someone up to trigger the charged shot
    • You can no longer purposely fail executions or gunpoints to spike the damage in a loaded round for later

    TheVekter updated:

    • Admins will now hear a sound and get a screen flash when someone tries to rename the station.
    • Fixed an exploit involving distance checks and the Voting Box.

    VexingRaven updated:

    • fixed grammar of "its" in several item descriptions.
    • fixed grammar of plasmaman suits' descriptions.
    • A few tweaks have been made to DeltaStation's surgery atmos piping
    • Added a missing air alarm in DeltaStation's Surgery Room B
    • Added an air alarm in DeltaStation's surgery observation area
    • canister exports should no longer runtime

    willox updated:

    • borg examine text describing hotkeys now always shows on non-broken doors/portable-turrets
    • cleans up some accidents around the & operator
    • Plastic spoons can now break when hitting things
    • Plastic spoons/forks breaking now shows the correct name of whoever broke them

    01 May 2020

    ATHATH updated:

    • Macrobomb implants now have a weak explosion radius of 20 (up from 16).

    25 August 2020

    ATHATH updated:

    • The Summon Equipment spell, which formerly asked you to choose between its two possible effects whenever you casted it, has been split into the Summon Combat Equipment and Summon Ritual Dagger spells.
    • Summon Combat Equipment can now only be used on cultists, as its description implies.

    ATHATH and Rohesie updated:

    • Slavers (and particularly strict employers) have begun using anti-teleportation implants to keep their slaves (and wagies, respectively) from using teleporters to escape their grasp.
    • The staff (and sec force) of the currently-disabled (on /tg/) space hotel ruin now spawn with anti-teleportation implants.

    ArcaneMusic updated:

    • Your sector has upgraded the BSA with a new specialty lens, Remote Economic Punishment Bombardment.

    Thebleh updated:

    • RCDs can build doors over firelocks again

    uomo91 updated:

    • To change the ammo type the detective's revolver can fire you must now use a wrench instead of a screwdriver, removing the need to take out or destroy its firing pin, and you must be holding it to do so.
    • When the detective's revolver misfires from using 357 ammo, the chambered round will actually be spent now.

    24 August 2020

    ATHATH updated:

    • The robotic limbs of androids now have the damage reduction values that normal augmented limbs do.
    • The amount of favor received per point of cell charge for a cell sacrificed to the Technophile chaplain sect has been multiplied by 10 (1 point of favor per 3,000 points of cell charge -> 1 point of favor per 300 points of cell charge).
    • The amount of favor required to perform the Rite of Synthetic Conversion has been multiplied by 2 (500 points of favor ->1,000 points of favor).
    • The amount of time required to perform the Rite of Synthetic Conversion has been reduced from 1 minute to 30 seconds.

    Bald People updated:

    • Bull terriers are now added into the game. Buy one at your local cargo department today.

    Fikou updated:

    • fixes nukie base fake glass smoothing
    • shuttle navigation consoles can no longer dock at tiles that the shuttle is on
    • border firelocks will now be opaque after closing, regular now wont be opaque on spawn

    IndieanaJones updated:

    • Various blob reagents have received changes. Distributed Neurons and Networked Fibers have been nerfed, while the rest have been buffed or stayed the same.
    • Blob spores can no longer damage the environment. This change does not affect blob zombies.
    • Reflective blobs are now capable of taking more damage.
    • Reroll Strain now offers a blob 5 choices, up from 3.

    LemonInTheDark updated:

    • Power no longer get fuckey when a ship moves with connected machines

    Paxilmaniac updated:

    • disposable sentry gun deployment system, a toolbox that transforms into a turret when attacked with a wrench

    Qustinnus updated:

    • When using tools you no longer smash the fuck out of whatever you're fixing.
    • pistols missing sprites when loaded no longer do that
    • spiderlings not getting flattened by a fly swatter in one hit
    • replaced jetpacks in eva on icebox with those random things that were on the floor for some reason
    • some strange area mistakes on meta xenobio
    • Auto fit viewport is now the default, and everyone's setting for this has been reset to the default. If you don't know what this means, it's safe to ignore.

    29 April 2020

    Cenrus updated:

    • right pews are no longer left pews.

    MrDoomBringer with some code stolen from itseasytosee updated:

    • added the Airlock Authentication Override Card. Use it to open airlocks!
    • added Syndicate Jaws of Life to the nuke op uplink. Use it in it's crowbar configuration to open as many doors as you'd like!
    • The cryptographic sequencer can no longer open airlocks :(

    RaveRadbury updated:

    • Lizards now pronounce x's as "kss"

    qustinnus updated:

    • Nerfs the cybersun hardsuit and moves it out of the uplink

    uomo91 updated:

    • You can now craft plaques using gold in hand, and with a fountain pen can engrave a title and description on them. They can be mounted on walls. No good deed shall ever go forgotten now.
    • Refactored signs heavily. A bunch of sign types previously left out of using a pen on a sign to change it are now included. They're also sorted sensibly now. You can no longer change sign types that shouldn't be changeable (guidance signs, maps, etc)
    • Signs (and plaques) can now be repaired with a welder.
    • Signs placed on walls now are only placed on one side of that wall, and are not visible through the wall.

    willox updated:

    • Shaved Mohawk hair-style is now available
    • deleted redundant "Drill Hair" icon
    • deleted redundant "Drill Hair" hair-style

    28 April 2020

    Couls updated:

    • more islamic prefixes
    • end of ramadan now follows the islamic calendar

    MrDoomBringer updated:

    • More toys are available from the Autolathe's contraband selection.

    stylemistake updated:

    • Yet another Canister UI rework. But this time, it's perfection.

    zxaber updated:

    • A syndicate cyborg monitor program for modular computers, showing the status of syndicate borgs, is now available from syndicate repositories.
    • Clients that send a message to a borg using either of the monitor programs will now have it logged under Comms_Log, the same place as PDA logging is located.

    27 April 2020

    ArcaneMusic updated:

    • Plants above 60 instability with no new mutations will no longer halve their instability if they would otherwise mutate.

    Ghilker updated:

    • Added electrolite components
    • Added electrolite components to the node tree
    • changed the electrolyzer circuit board to use 2 electrolite, 2 capacitors, 5 cable coils and 1 glass sheet
    • reduced h2 gas export gain
    • Added electrolites sprites (Thanks Trollbreeder!)
    • Changed the H2 canister sprite

    Mickyan updated:

    • Added descriptions to the curator's hero bundles

    Vondiech updated:

    • Nanotrasen has overhauled Boxstations pipe-grid blueprint, and has so far found that Atmospheric Technicians & Station Engineers has had a decrease in deaths caused by extreme mental exhaustion.

    actioninja updated:

    • traitor uplink works properly in compact mode

    stylemistake updated:

    • Fixed lighting on Camera Console
    • Fixed lighting on Spy Bug (spy glasses in detective's spy glass kit)

    willox updated:

    • phobias use less regular expressions and don't instantiate them all the time

    26 April 2020

    Arkatos updated:

    • Fixed an issue where dextrous guardians lacked some of their HUD elements.

    Rohesie updated:

    • Refactored health status procs to improve quality and allow easier reaction to change events.
    • You can use the normal say verb while on crit, and it will be automatically converted into a whisper in soft crit, or just not work while unconscious, without risk of accidentally succumbing.
    • You can only whisper-succumb by explicitly whispering while in hard crit. Use the succumb verb otherwise.
    • Martyrdom mutation works only when on hard critical, the owner will no longer die by taking a nap.
    • Pets and some pushover bots (don't try it on beespky) can now be shoved away. No need to beat them up any longer.

    Ryll/Shaps updated:

    • Gripper glove tackles now disable throw mode when you hit something (whether it's a person, a window, or whatever)
    • You can no longer suffer head wounds from bad rolls on tackling other people, but you can if you hit an object/wall
    • Tackling solid objects/walls is now slightly less prone to maim you

    ShizCalev updated:

    • Fixed the broken circuit board in delta's electronic marketing den.

    TemporalOroboros updated:

    • Added defines for the damage flags. Please use them!

    TiviPlus updated:

    • Removed a var for bloodcrawling

    dragomagol updated:

    • Removed the get red/blue secret documents traitor objective

    nightred updated:

    • Icebox medical security check point has power

    • and some events have been forbidden from centcom. stop messing with my events on the OOC zlevel!

    uomo91 updated:

    • You can now sign your name on paper again. Remember: %s.
    • Being polled as a ghost for things like imaginary friends will now show the player's real name, rather than their displayed name.

    tralezab updated:

    • when admins change the emergency shuttle timer, it gives a way more accurate estimate.

    uomo91 updated:

    • Waving a picket sign now animates the user and displays a runechat emote.
    • You can wave picket signs less often, making them less spamable.
    • Bookshelves do not show shelves inside anymore when you crowbar them out.
    • Toolbelts can now hold pipe painters.
    • Borg renaming is now logged in game.txt

    22 August 2020

    ArcaneMusic updated:

    • Invasive spreading on plant trays now correctly updates the tray's name with the new plant's species.
    • Plants mutated via wild mutation now spawn at the correct size based on the mutated seed's potency.
    • Plants getting random reagents due to high instability now properly upgrade instead of stack.

    EOBGames updated:

  • Pacifists can no longer harm people with baseball bats, powerfists, hierophant clubs, flamethrowers, pneumatic cannons, or syringe guns mounted on mechs.
  • Felinids now "pounce" instead of "leap" and "tackle" when using gripper gloves.

    • 24 April 2020

    ArcaneMusic updated:

    • Railings can now be crafted with metal rods, and deconstructed with wirecutters when unwrenched.
    • Railings can now be rotated with Alt Click.

    Archanial updated:

    • Cult stun no longer stuns mindshielded personnel. Instead it makes them drop items they are currently holding, applies a dizziness effect and does some stamina damage.

    Fikou updated:

    • Bounties now properly give less profit when completed, but decrease the number of items needed with high inflation.
    • The station target rate has been lowered at a base, to improve the impact of inflation.
    • Civilian bounty beacons take less time to deploy.
    • you can now craft an improvised pickaxe with a crowbar, a knife and some sticky tape
    • the jackhammer is now bulky instead of huge
    • some clothing recipes are now in clothing category

    Fikou, Onule updated:

    • Gamers, rejoice, as Nanotrasen has finally recalled faulty stocks of arcade carpet, replacing them with new authentic carpet. Just add pizza stains and spilled soda for the authentic arcade experience!

    Iamgoofball updated:

    • The ORM no longer receives benefits from upgrades.

    Jared-Fogle updated:

    • There is now an animation for shaking someone.

    Rohesie updated:

    • Smooth movable lighting system implemented. Projectiles, sparks, thrown flashlights or moving mobs with lights should be much smoother and less laggy.
    • Light sources no longer stack in range, though they still do in intensity.

    TheVekter updated:

    • The obsessed trauma now includes a policy config option like other antagonists.

    bobbahbrown updated:

    • Runechat messages now overlap (roughly) based on the time at which they were said, this means newer messages will be on top of older ones.

    nightred updated:

    • Delta removed an extra intercom in toxins
    • Slime People can swap between their bodies more freely.

    21 August 2020

    ATHATH updated:

    • You can now activate an away mission's exit gateway regardless of whether or not the station-side gateway is still open.

    20 August 2020

    ArcaneMusic updated:

    • Medical bounties will no longer accept tier 1 cybernetic organs, but will still take tiers 2 and 3.
    • Newscasters no longer chirp in your ear every 5 minutes for a news update, but will still provide regular updates if you check the Station Announcements channel.
    • Station inflation has been rebalanced, with roundstart balance staying in the ballpark of 200% until the first paycheck, and now using averages to determine how high inflation should be.
    • Market crash and CRAB17 both lock down market prices of vending machines until their event ends.
    • The Civilian Budget now gets more pay as more civilian bounties are completed over the course of the shift.

    • Lift platform that works like moving catwalk
    • Lift now on MultiZ debug station

    • The Advanced Camera Console camera network now includes the integrated cameras on cyborgs.

    uomo91 updated:

    • Petting more animals than just cats and dogs now makes you happy.

    Jared-Fogle updated:

    • Syringe guns will now show if they are loaded or not.
    • Syringe guns now play a sound when giving them a syringe.

    Melbert updated:

    • NanoTrasen has added braille support to literally everything. If a blind person has an empty hand, they can now shift-click examine (or right click -> examine) nearby things via touch after a short timer.

    Ryll/Shaps updated:

    • Observers can examine immovable rods to see how many mobs/sentient mobs/sentient carbons it has penetrated

    zxaber updated:

    • Cyborgs can no longer be synced to an AI on another Z level (except if both Z levels are part of the station as would be the case for multi-Z stations).

    23 April 2020

    ArcaneMusic updated:

    • Non-sheet items can no longer be sold for their worth in materials.
    • Added logging to the most common interactions for economy.

    Arkatos updated:

    • Papersacks now use a radial menu to choose their skins.
    • Dominate is now a cursor-guided spell.
    • Abyssal Gaze is now a cursor-guided spell.
    • Pointed spells now have aim assist. If there is a single valid target on a turf user has clicked on, the spell will be automatically redirected to the valid target.
    • Nullrod variants are now chosen via a radial menu. Fancy!
    • Cardboard cutouts now use a radial menu to choose their skins.

    • Fixed several issues with the new cargo layout.

    21 April 2020

    ArcaneMusic updated:

    • Voice analyzers will no longer accept any message when nothing is recorded.
    • Disarming a monkey is now the same as disarming a human.
    • Monkeys can now be shoved into humans and vice versa.

    msgerbs updated:

    • Fixes broken span classes in mutation loss messages and other locations.

    nightred updated:

    • Meta bar access
    • Meta kitchen has an air alarm again

    tralezab updated:

  • Botanical Toolbelts can now be made at the biogenerator, and holds most botanical tools.
  • The Floral Somatoray has been given a new, 3rd mode, able to mutate plant species.
  • Using a Somatoray on a tray enables you to lock in a specific mutation if a plant has multiple mutations, at the cost of plant endurance.
  • Plant Analyzers now have a toggle-able mode to scan either the chemical traits or the plant stats, to cut down on chat spam.
  • Plant Trays and dirt patches now start with 10 units of EZ Nutrient.
  • Mutagen has been made slightly less toxic overall.
  • Plant trays now passively decrease their toxicity based on the tray's parts, without randomness.
  • Science goggles, or any other reagent scanning equipment will enable you to see plant reagent traits on examine.
  • Instability now affects plants with lower instability tiers. (100 instability would have the effects of the 20, 40, 60,and 80+ instability tiers).
  • Irrigation now works properly again.
  • Plant trays with full nutrient tanks can be watered again.

    • Arkatos updated:

    • Radial menu options will now always be clearly visible to the user.

    Cartographer-D updated:

    • Completely New Cargo Layout
    • The Small Security Room by the Vault has been replaced with Maintenance
    • Crate Returns are now easier to find and use
    • Tool Storage is smaller but more interesting!
    • The Mail Room and Offices have been combined
    • Cargo Warehouse is now more prominent and easier to break into
    • MULEs now have their own isolated room.
    • There are now easier ways to mail "packages" to departments

    Ghilker updated:

    • Added H2 gas
    • Added H2 gas burn (reaction with o2, similar to tritium but without the radiations)
    • Added Electrolyzer (machine to make H2, requires power cell, once turned on and with h2o in the air will start converting it to h2 and o2 with the reaction 2H2O -> 2H2 + O2. Upgrading the parts will increase the amount of converted H2O and the efficency of the cell)
    • Added H2 interaction with SM (similar to trit, less radiation emission, same heat production and a bit of heat protection)
    • H2 reaction with N2 to make ammonia crystals (reaction in open air to make the crystals, temperatures between 0 °C and - 120° C, more N2 than H2)
    • H2 reaction with bz as catalyst at high heat and pressure (over 1e6 for both) to make metal hydrogen
    • metallic hydrogen golem (one of endish atmosian goal)
    • changed fusion to use h2 instead of co2, everything else is still the same
    • plasma burn now produces h2o too (a quarter of the produced co2)
    • H2O vapor now slip under 30 °C so that plasma fires are not hellish
    • added electrolyzer sprites (reuse of some unused ones)
    • added ammonia crystals sprites remove: fusion no longer generate stim and nitryl

    Toastgoats updated:

    • Highlanders now keep their race if it won't be a problem

    19 August 2020

    ATH1909 updated:

    • Fixed an exploit that made it possible to use more shuttle curse orbs in a single round than you were supposed to as a blood cultist.
    • Increased the number of shuttle curse orbs that can be used in a single round from 2 to 3.
    • Added better feedback for shuttle curse orbs.

    ATHATH updated:

    • The expanded medkits that medical doctors start the round with now come with epinephrine medipens (the kind normally found in white medkits/roundstart internals boxes), not emergency first aid kit medipens (the kind normally found in emergency first aid kits from oxygen lockers).

    ATHATH (and ShizCalev) updated:

    • The in-hand crafting menu for runic metal now mentions which cult structure makes which cult items.
    • The descriptions of cult structures now remind you which cult items they can create, but only if you're a cultist or an observer.

    ArcaneDefence updated:

    • Hydrating monkey powder no longer circumvents bluespace harmonic limitations.

    ArcaneMusic updated:

    • The Heck Brewing Factory now has wires outside of it's walls.
    • Runtime station now comes equip with plumbing, modular computer, and newscaster equipment.
    • Plants now show their maximum reagent capacity on plant analyzer examine with reagent mode on.

    Bampotio updated:

    • adds floral somatory to botany belt storage

    CRITAWAKETS updated:

    • Nanotrasen has "accidentally" had a virus implanted in their nanite servers which somehow caused some nanite programs to be less effective.
    • Numerous bluespace artilery units have been recalled following incidents of their components being made out of air. This manufacturing defect has been fixed.

    Donkie updated:

    • Cleaning system is now more intuitive. Scrubbing action = forensic wiping, only spraying = forensics kept.
    • Cleaning machines (janicart, etc) and the cleanbot will now get rid of forensic evidence

    Fikou updated:

    • shuttles should now smooth properly with heaters and engines

    Guillaume H. Prata updated:

    • Hypernoblium now turns into a reagent when inhaled, which stops the combustion if on a Plasmaman system.
    • Plasmaman interaction with Hypernoblium in the air, stop combustion and extinguishes if they are already on fire.

    Jared-Fogle updated:

    • Messages sent by yourself no longer highlight.
    • Calling a proc while another admin is calling one will no longer wait for the first to finish. You will simply just have to call it again.
    • Hitting animations now correctly have more randomness when hitting above or below.

    Krysonism updated:

    • Botany can create a new type of medical stack: mourning poultices. This item converts brute and burn into oxy and can even be used on corpses.

    Melbert updated:

    • organs no longer have interactions for being found in food they shouldn't be in
    • Blinded people can no longer use camera consoles
    • Blinded people can no longer activate all types of advanced camera consoles, including navigation consoles (They were already not intended to be able to use them)
    • adds a machine interaction flag for machines that require the user not be blind to use

    Rohesie updated:

    • Mechs no longer block sight. It's a non-trivial cost for the lighting system with little to no gain.

    Skoglol updated:

    • Adds nekomimetic.

    TheSmallBlue updated:

    • changed cult communion text

    Timberpoes updated:

    • The Hierophant Club has received a number of changes. It is no longer able to attack at range or mine and instead has been given a 5-tile range instant teleport on a 15 second cooldown. It still retains the teleport beacon functionality.
    • With so much bloat removed, the Hierophant Club has shrunk down to the size of an ordinary item and can now fit nicely in most backpacks.
    • Runtime in wounds system fixed for projectiles that can't wound. As a result, non-woundy weapons will now complete code execution and apply appropriate damage. In particular, this fixes the DRAGnet not dealing stamina damage on net mode, may fix other weapons too.

    TiviPlus updated:

    • isdiagonaldir macro

    Wallem updated:

    • Recent surveys show 1% of nanotrasen employees have been misinformed on the concept of baseball.
    • You will keep your angle when you drift through space now. Oh and immovable rods do the same, so things might get a bit more messy then usual.
    • Nanotrasen's current stock of Buckin' Bronco© applejack liquor has been recalled after studies showed trace amounts of horse meat.
    • Buckin Bronco Brewing Co has recently announced the release of a new and improved recipe! Be sure to try some at your local Nanotrasen bar!

    stylemistake updated:

    • tgui 3.0
    • tgui: Fixed the personal crafting interface.

    20 April 2020

    Capsandi updated:

    • You can now use metal rods to retract skin during surgery if you are that desperate
    • forks are now viable alternatives to surgical instruments when extracting organs and implants

    Fikou updated:

    • You can now make shuttle seats with titanium.

    Ghilker updated:

    • Added heat and pressure limit to portable pumps and scrubbers
    • changed the damage calculation from a max() to a clamp() between 5 and 50
    • reduced max pressure output of t3 canisters to the same as t2

    Mickyan updated:

    • Fixed botanists dropping their heirlooms on the ground. Plant bag is no longer a heirloom option.

    Onule updated:

    • Recent changes in the manufacture of titanium sheets introduces a fresh new look! Expect your shuttles to look different.

    Qustinnus updated:

    • carps now dont look for 9 tiles around them every process to locate a single piece of plastic that they can only interact with if they're next to it. They're also able to see plastic under them, such advanced creatures.

    Ryll/Shaps updated:

    • Added AUTO_DEADMIN_TIMEGATE which allows config force deadmin settings to only apply for the first X seconds in a round. Starts disabled
    • New preference to ignore being summoned as a cult ghost while admin'd, starts disabled

    Timberpoes updated:

    • Enabled new button allowing observers the ability to see chemicals and reagents identical to the health analyzer's chem scan functionality.
    • Laptops can now utilise the AI Restorer program.

    bobbahbrown updated:

    • Peacekeeper cyborgs have had an update to their firmware which corrects dampening fields remaining active after severe damage or death.

    ominousgrace updated:

    • Mad Scientist Wormhole Projector no longer requires an anomaly core.

    tralezab updated:

    • new secrets button, anonymous names (roundstart required)
    • things are a bit cleaner in the AI Triumvirate code

    19 April 2020

    EgorDinamit updated:

    • Cybersun hardsuit added to traitors(14TC) and nuke ops(8TC) uplinks.
    • Adds and replaces a few items on the ship, such as firing pins, materials and encryption keys.
    • Cost and weight values of most space ruins changed.
    • Cybersun hardsuit armour values increased.
    • Syndicate ship ruin turrets armour and rate of fire changed.
    • Empty sleeper, that emits GPS signal is now indestructible.
    • Adds config to edit "important_info" for both, crewmembers and captain of forgotten ship ruin.

    WarlockD updated:

    • Replacing damaged eyes actually fixes your eyes.
    • You cannot fix your eyes by just putting on glasses
    • Added day counter to the round time
    • Food can no longer be grilled repeatedly to the point of breaking their name with an endless string.

    18 April 2020

    Akrilla updated:

    • Equipment swapping, defaulted to V. Allows you to equip items while swapping out what you're already wearing after a small delay.

    AnturK updated:

    • Fixed mobs wearing insulated gloves being unable to open electrified doors by walking into them (they had to click it to open.)
    • Fixed aliens being unable to open electrified doors that were unpowered / on cooldown.
    • Fixed simple animals doing damage to electrified doors even if they were shocked by them.
    • Fixed being unable to open electrified doors with the jaws of life when the door was unable to shock the user.

    Ziiro updated:

    • xenos can now climb ladders properly

    actioninja updated:

    • better impaired vision overlays

    floyd updated:

    • resisting is now on atom level so it can be used on mobs too

    kriskog updated:

    • Check antagonists now has a button to force war for nuclear operatives.

    nightred updated:

    • Prevent duplicate vent and scrubber names in the air alarm interface.
    • Slapping the floor with glass will shatter the glass.
    • Removed beaker teleportation
    • Lattice now smooths with plating
    • Meta service area request consoles have been fixed up.

    stylemistake updated:

    • tgui: Pressing Ctrl+F will no longer make you flip (or trigger any other custom keybind on F).

    tralezab updated:

    • Flyperson biology has been more defined... to be less defined. Good luck, CMO!
    • Goodbye corporate species. I can't even pretend like you were good at all.
    • Clown's Tears now takes bananium sheets instead of ore to craft.
    • station stuck component now has a murder mode, that doesn't gib.
    • skeleton ghost role on away missions can no longer go stationwide. They'll collapse the moment they enter the portal.
    • moved all those fuckin' ghost role spawners out of corpse.dm and into ghost_role_spawners.dm
    • cleaned up stationstuck component a ton.
    • New Event: Shuttle Catastrophe
    • species no longer have organs they do not use!
    • fixed a few typos with plasmamen envirosuits
    • fixed all the typos where people say "availible" instead of "available"

    uomo91 updated:

  • The ammo boxes in the comms agent base now use the same ammo type as the magazines that are literally in the same crate as them. In other words, they're compatible with stetchkins now.
  • fixes arena shuttle

    • Arkatos updated:

    • Fixed an issue where Artificer spell icon was invisible.

    Dennok updated:

    • Hub layer related coloring

    FloranOtten updated:

    • Deadminned themselves.

    Ghilker updated:

    • Added 3 tiers to the canisters
    • added canister frames (also tiered)
    • canisters rupture if there is too much pressure or heat inside (higher tiers have higher thresholds)
    • added images for frames and overlays
    • N2O formation reaction (n2 + o2 + bz as catalyst + cold = n2o)
    • N2O toxic behaviour (if you inhale it you can die in your sleep) changed: NO2 Formation reaction (n2 + o2 + bz + heat = no2)

    LemonInTheDark updated:

    • Fixes bolt colors being jank when exposed to high and then low power
    • The h2o interactions have been polished and readded. Fucking global variables.

    Mickyan updated:

    • Being at the epicenter of explosions no longer damage the contents of storage that is meant to prevent it (most commonly photos inside photo albums)

    TheVekter updated:

    • Anomalies should no longer spawn at the toxins testing range.
    • Added an R&D console to the Research Director's office on Meta, Pubby, Box, Delta, and Donut.
    • The CMO should now have a stamp in their office on Metastation

    Thunder12345 updated:

    • Nanotrasen software division has fixed an issue with station holodecks creating invisible tables and floor decals.
    • Tool belts can now hold airlock and decal painters inside them.
    • Holsters should now hold appropriate weapons and their ammo types.

    zxaber updated:

    • If anyone noticed that you were sometimes unable to examine a modular computer with no primary ID slot, that's been fixed now.

    ArcaneMusic updated:

    17 April 2020

    ArcaneMusic updated:

    • Station AI cores are now stored in a tin foil-lined room, in response to reports of mysterious teleporting AI thieves.
    • Mafia achievments now display their correct icons.
    • tgui now has new components: Knobs and Sliders
    • Improved SMES interface with new Slider component.
    • Improved Canister interface with new Knob component.
    • tgui performance improvements, up to 25%.
    • Fixed Flex component bugs on IE11.
    • Box property, "content", is now deprecated.
    • Grid component is now deprecated.

    08 April 2020

    ArcaneMusic updated:

    • Seed Extractors now show seed instability.
    • Botany can now print shears capable of removing plant genes, after researching the botany node.
    • Uranium can now be solidified in a chemical reaction, similar to gold and plasma.
    • Removed Plant Thinner and Trait Thinner chemicals (Unused)
    • Hydroponics trays now have a starting chemical capacity of 20.
    • Using a beaker on a hydroponics tray while the tray is full no longer acts like it's transferring reagents.
    • Ctrl-Clicking a tray will only enable autogrow when it's anchored.

    Krysonism updated:

    • The hazard cone has a new object sprite.

    XDTM updated:

    • Removed hidden racks, less torture on station.

    silicons updated:

    • freon should not have you stuck immobilized anymore

    stylemistake updated:

    • tgchat: Unread message count is now smarter and won't increase on other tabs if you have already read the same message in the active tab.
    • tgchat: Admin PMs are now properly annotated and can be filtered into separate tabs.
    • tgchat: Fix: Highlighted message overlay no longer blocks clicks. Clicking a highlighted `(F)` link should work as it should.
    • tgui: Fixed NTOS bluescreen due to calling `.includes()` on a stylesheet href which could be null on certain browsers.
    • tgchat: Chat schema bumped to version 5. All chat-related settings were reset to avoid breakage.
    • tgchat: Fixed adminsay to no longer show up as [object Object].

    • Request console announcements no longer double encode. This means, for example, you can use apostrophes.

    • The tesla coil can no longer make infinite energy
